@roblox/globaltype/ContextActionService..documentation: 一个代表着正在执行动作的字符串（例如 "HonkHorn" 或 "OpenDoor"）
触发绑定的输入时，使用以下参数调用动作处理函数：string (actionName), Enum.UserInputState and an InputObject
是否应为触摸输入设备上的动作创建 GUI 按钮
绑定动作时应该使用的优先等级（高优先级优先）
Enum.KeyCode 或 Enum.UserInputType 的任意编号，用于表示要绑定到动作的输入
行为类似于 ContextActionService:BindAction，但允许为重叠输入类型的绑定动作分配优先级（从高优先级到低优先级）
@roblox/globaltype/ContextActionService..code_sample:
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local INPUT_KEY = Enum.KeyCode.Q
local INPUT_KEY2 = Enum.KeyCode.E

local function handleThrow() print("Throw") end
local function handePunch() print("Punch") end

-- 注意， Throw 这个动作的优先级会比 Punch 这个动作的优先级要高 (2>1)
-- 因此，无论绑定顺序如何（先 Throw 再 Punch ），
-- 当按下 INPUT_KEY (Q) 时， handleThrow 仍会比 handlePunch 优先调用。
ContextActionService:BindActionAtPriority("Throw", handleThrow, false, 2, INPUT_KEY)
ContextActionService:BindActionAtPriority("Punch", handePunch, false, 1, INPUT_KEY)
-- 这里，我们不使用优先级 (BindAction) ，所以绑定顺序很重要。
-- 由于 Punch2 后于Throw2 绑定，所以它能优先使用 INPUT_KEY2 (E)。
ContextActionService:BindAction("Throw2", handleThrow, false, INPUT_KEY2)
ContextActionService:BindAction("Punch2", handePunch, false, INPUT_KEY2)

@roblox/globaltype/ContextActionService..documentation: 必须是 Keyboard 或 Gamepad1 至 Gamepad8
要绑定的 KeyCode（例如 ButtonX）
将 Enum.KeyCode 与特定 Enum.UserInputType 绑定以触发 Tool.Activation
得到所有绑定动作的信息表（键是传送给ContextActionService:BindAction的名称，值是用键调用时从ContextActionService:GetBoundActionInfo那里返回的表格）
根据一开始传送到ContextActionService:BindAction的绑定动作名称来获取该绑定动作的信息表格。
来自 Tool 的 TextureId 的内容字符串，若无法找到则为 nil
返回当前由Player``Tool.Equipped的Tool的BackpackItem.TextureId
一开始传送给 BindAction 的动作名称
动作的一段文本描述，比如“鸣响车子的喇叭”或者“打开物品栏”
根据配有一个触摸按钮的绑定动作名称来设置该动作的描述。
@roblox/globaltype/ContextActionService..code_sample:
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local ACTION_INSPECT = "Inspect"
local INPUT_INSPECT = Enum.KeyCode.E
local IMAGE_INSPECT = "rbxassetid://1826746856" -- 对话气泡的图像，里面有 ? 

local function handleAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject)
	if actionName == ACTION_INSPECT and inputState == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		print("调查中")
	end
end

-- 对于触摸设备，一个按钮会自动地通过第三个参数创建在屏幕上
ContextActionService:BindAction(ACTION_INSPECT, handleAction, true, INPUT_INSPECT)
-- 我们可以使用这些函数来对按钮进行自定义：
ContextActionService:SetImage(ACTION_INSPECT, IMAGE_INSPECT)
ContextActionService:SetTitle(ACTION_INSPECT, "Look")
ContextActionService:SetDescription(ACTION_INSPECT, "Inspect something.")
ContextActionService:SetPosition(ACTION_INSPECT, UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0))
-- 我们可以直接使用 ContextActionService:GetButton 来操纵按钮 
local imgButton = ContextActionService:GetButton(ACTION_INSPECT)
if imgButton then -- Remember: non-touch devices won't return anything!
	imgButton.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(.5, 1, .5) -- 将 ImageButton 染成绿色
end

@roblox/globaltype/Controller.ButtonChan.documentation: 绑定按钮的按键状态被更改时触发。此事件可与 Controller:GetButton 配合使用，以检查是否有绑定按钮被按下。

@roblox/globaltype/CookiesService.documentation: Roblox 用来控制 HTTP cookies 的后端服务。它的功能对开发人员不可用。

@roblox/globaltype/CoreGui.documentation: CoreGui 是一项 Roblox 所提供的服务项，用于储存各种 GUI ，主要为那些所有游戏中都会用到的核心用户界面（如游戏菜单、玩家列表、背包等等）。它也可以被 Roblox Studio 中的 Plugin 使用。

@roblox/globaltype/CoreGui.Version.documentation: 当前 CoreGui 的版本。每当 CoreGui 出现较大型的变动时，该数值会增加。

@roblox/globaltype/CorePackages.documentation: 一种内部服务，用来存储 Roblox 的 CoreScript 所使用的 ModuleScript 。

@roblox/globaltype/CSGDictionaryService.documentation: CSGDictionaryService 是一个内部服务，它存储 BinaryStringValue 对象的缓存，各个值代表实体建模数据的唯一数据集。

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEvent.SetValue.documentation: 设置 CustomEvent 的值，并为所有连接的 CustomEventReciever 触发 CustomEventReceiver.SourceValueChanged 事件

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEvent.ReceiverC.documentation: 在 receiver （接收器）连接到了 CustomEvent 时触发

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEvent.ReceiverD.documentation: 在 receiver （接收器）从 CustomEvent 断开连接时触发

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEventReceiver.G.documentation: 返回接收方的 CustomEventReciever.Source 属性的当前值。

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEventReceiver.E.documentation: 若 receiver 接收器被附加到不同的 CustomEvent，当 CustomEventReciever.Source 属性更改时，会触发该事件。
若 receiver 接收器被附加到不同的 CustomEvent 实例，当 CustomEventReciever.Source 属性更改时，会触发该事件。

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEventReceiver.S.documentation: 在 CustomEvent 源的值被更改时触发，传递 CustomEvent 的新值。

@roblox/globaltype/CylinderMesh.documentation: CylinderMesh 对象给自己的父项BasePart施加一个‘cylinder’网格
@roblox/globaltype/CylinderMesh.code_sample:
-- 实例化一个带有 cylindermesh 的部件
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
    part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 2, 5) -- 10 x 5 to demonstrate resizing
    part.Anchored = true 
    local mesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh", part)
    
    -- 设置好网格的缩放和偏移
    mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
    mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
    
    -- 给高亮的部件添加一个 selectionbox
    local adornment = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
    adornment.Adornee = part
    
    -- 设置为 workspace 的子项
    part.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/CylindricalConstraint.documentation: 角驱动器类型：None、Motor 或者 Servo。
两个极限的恢复系数，或者说是它们的弹性程度，在 [0, 1] 区间内。
目标角速度。这个值没有符号，因为伺服系统总会朝向它的目标移动，单位是弧度每秒，值的区间是 [0, inf) 。
环绕旋转轴的电机的目标角速度，单位是弧度每秒，值的区间是 [0, inf) 。
在旋转轴周围的Attachment1 的基准轴和副轴之间带符号的夹角（单位是度），值的区间在 [-180, 180]。
以Attachment0 的 xy 平面中的x轴与旋转轴的夹角作为旋转轴的方向，值的区间是 [-180, 180] 。
位于旋转轴周围 Attachment1 的基准轴和副轴之间的夹角（单位是度）的下限，值区间是 [-180, 180] 。
电机的最大角加速度值 ，单位是弧度每秒，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
为达到目标角速度，电机可以施加的最大扭矩。单元是 mass * studs^2 / second^2 ，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
伺服系统的电机能施加的最大扭矩，单元是 mass * studs^2 / second^2 ，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
位于旋转轴周围的 Attachment1 副轴和基准轴之间的目标夹角（单位是度），值区间为 [-180, 180] 。
位于旋转轴周围 Attachment1 的基准轴和副轴之间的夹角（单位是度）的上限，值区间是 [-180, 180] 。
世界坐标中旋转轴的单位矢量方向。

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.documentation: The DataModel (commonly known as game after the global variable used to access it) is the root of Roblox's parent-child hierarchy. Its direct children are services (such as the Workspace and Lighting) that act as the fundamental components of a Roblox game.
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.code_sample: game.Workspace.Part:Destroy() --'game' 是对 DataModel 的引用

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.CreatorId.documentation: 描述拥有Articles.Place的用户或组的 ID
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.CreatorId.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    if game.CreatorType == Enum.CreatorType.User then
        if player.UserId == game.CreatorId then
            print("The place owner has joined the game!")
        end
    elseif game.CreatorType == Enum.CreatorType.Group then
        if player:IsInGroup(game.CreatorId) then
            print("A member of the group that owns the place has joined the game!")
        end
    end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.CreatorType.documentation: 描述Articles.Place的 Enum.CreatorType，该场景是属于用户还是属于某个群组
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.CreatorType.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    if game.CreatorType == Enum.CreatorType.User then
        if player.UserId == game.CreatorId then
            print("The place owner has joined the game!")
        end
    elseif game.CreatorType == Enum.CreatorType.Group then
        if player:IsInGroup(game.CreatorId) then
            print("A member of the group that owns the place has joined the game!")
        end
    end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GameId.documentation: 描述在服务器上运行的Articles.Place所属的Articles/Multi Place Games|游戏的 ID

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.Genre.documentation: 不再起作用。曾用于描述在 Roblox 网站上设置的Articles.Place的 Enum.Genre

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.JobId.documentation: 正在运行的游戏服务器实例的唯一标识符。在 Roblox Studio 中默认为一个空字符串

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PlaceId.documentation: 描述正在服务器上运行的Articles.Place的 ID

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PlaceVersio.documentation: 描述服务器正在运行的Articles.Place的版本
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PlaceVersio.code_sample:
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")

-- 创建 screenGui
local versionGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")

-- 创建 textLabel
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")

-- 将其放在屏幕右下角
textLabel.Position = UDim2.new(1, -10, 1, 0)
textLabel.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 1)
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 150, 0, 40)

-- 对文本设定进行配置
textLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0
textLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Right
textLabel.TextScaled = true

-- 显示版本号
local placeVersion = game.PlaceVersion
textLabel.Text = string.format("Server version: %s", placeVersion)
textLabel.Parent = versionGui

-- 将其父项设为 StarterGui
versionGui.Parent = StarterGui

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.documentation: 用于描述该服务器的私人服务器 ID，前提是该服务器是 Articles/Creating a VIP Server on Roblox|VIP 服务器或TeleportService/ReserveServer|预留服务器。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.code_sample:
local function getServerType()
	if game.PrivateServerId ~= "" then
		if game.PrivateServerOwnerId ~= 0 then
			return "VIPServer"
		else
			return "ReservedServer"
		end
	else
		return "StandardServer"
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.documentation: 在当前服务器为 VIP 服务器的前提下，描述拥有该 Articles/Creating a VIP Server on Roblox|VIP 服务器的 Player 的 Player.UserId
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.code_sample:
local function getServerType()
	if game.PrivateServerId ~= "" then
		if game.PrivateServerOwnerId ~= 0 then
			return "VIPServer"
		else
			return "ReservedServer"
		end
	else
		return "StandardServer"
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GearGenreSe.documentation: 不再起作用。曾用于描述在 Roblox 网站上设置的Articles.Place的装备权限

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.VIPServerId.documentation: 可以将当前服务器标识为 VIP 服务器的字符串

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.VIPServerOw.documentation: 拥有此 VIP 服务器的账号的 Player.UserId

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.BindToClose.documentation: 绑定要在游戏关闭前调用的函数。游戏将等待所有绑定的函数完成后才会关闭
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.BindToClose.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local dataStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Data")

local playerData = {
    -- [UserId] = data
}

game:BindToClose(function()
    -- 如果当前进程为 studio，则什么都不做
    if RunService:IsStudio() then
        return
    end

    print("正在保存玩家数据")

    -- 处理所有玩家，保存其数据
    local players = Players:GetPlayers()
    for _, player in pairs(players) do
        local userId = player.UserId
        local data = playerData[userId]
        if data then
            -- 打包 pcall 来处理任何错误
            local success, result = pcall(function()
                -- SetAsync 暂停将暂缓关闭
                dataStore:SetAsync(userId, data)
            end)
            if not success then
                warn(result)
            end    
        end
    end

    print("保存玩家数据完成")

end)

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetJobsInfo.documentation: 一个包含任务计划程序执行的任务信息的表格，格式见上文
返回一个包含任务计划程序执行的任务的基本信息的表格
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetJobsInfo.code_sample:
local jobInfo = game:GetJobsInfo()
local jobTitles = jobInfo[1]

table.remove(jobInfo,1)

local divider = string.rep("-",120)
print(divider)
warn("JOB INFO:")
print(divider)

for _,job in pairs(jobInfo) do
	for jobIndex,jobValue in pairs(job) do
		local jobTitle = jobTitles[jobIndex]
		warn(jobTitle,"=",jobValue)
	end
	print(divider)
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetObjects.documentation: 返回与给定Articles.Content URL 关联的一组Instance
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetObjects.code_sample:
local Selection = game:GetService("Selection")

local function downloadPlugin(webURL)
    -- 获取内容 URL
    local contentID = string.match(webURL, "%d+")
    local contentURL = "rbxassetid://"..contentID

    -- 下载对象
    local objects = game:GetObjects(contentURL)

    -- 决定其父项
    local selection = Selection:Get()
    local parent = #selection == 1 and selection[1] or workspace

    -- 为对象设置父项
    for _, object in pairs(objects) do
        object.Parent = parent
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded/re.documentation: 客户端是否已完成第一次游戏加载

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded.documentation: 如果客户端已完成第一次游戏加载，则返回 true
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- 创建一个基本加载屏幕
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- 将整个屏幕 GUI 设为玩家 GUI 的子项
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- 移除默认的加载屏幕
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- 可选择强制此屏幕最少显示几秒
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.Load.documentation: 从 URL 加载 Roblox 场景文件。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.Load.code_sample:
local baseurl="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=%d"
game:Load(baseurl:format(1818)) -- 加载 Roblox 原创的*未锁定复制*的游戏（Crossroads）
 
-- 注意：如果尝试访问非当前登录用户拥有的锁定复制的场景，或者如果在安全上下文小于 4 的任何代码中使用锁定复制的场景，则该操作将不起作用，并且会出错。

将当前游戏实例的 DataModel.GameId 设置为给定的 universeId

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.OnClose.documentation: 在游戏关闭之前进行调用。当此回调返回或者超时期限到期时，游戏结束关闭过程。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.OnClose.code_sample:
game.OnClose = function()

end

game.GraphicsQualityChangeRequest:Connect(function (betterQuality)

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.Loaded.documentation: 当游戏第一次完成加载时在客户端上触发

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.AllowedGear.documentation: 在使用不同的 allowedGenres 值调用 SetGearSettings 时触发

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.ItemChanged.documentation: 当 DataModel 中的任何对象的属性发生变动时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.ItemChanged.code_sample:
game.ItemChanged:Connect(function(item, property)
  print(string.format("%s.%s 进行了变更", item.Name, property))
end)

--> Workspace.DistributedGameTime 进行了变更

@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.documentation: DataModelMesh 是一个抽象类，其子项为网格类。

@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.Offset.documentation: 网格的 Offset（偏移）决定了网格显示位置与 BasePart 的 BasePart.Position 的相对位置。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.Offset.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 将部件和网格实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)

-- 用于显示部件范围的选择框
local box = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
box.Adornee = part

-- 将部件作为工作区的子项
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建偏移和缩放的补间动画
local tween = TweenService:Create(
  mesh,
  TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -1, true, 0),
  {Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)}
)

tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.Scale.documentation: 网格的 Scale（缩放）决定了网格相对于其原始尺寸的大小。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.Scale.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 将部件和网格实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)

-- 用于显示部件范围的选择框
local box = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
box.Adornee = part

-- 将部件作为工作区的子项
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建偏移和缩放的补间动画
local tween = TweenService:Create(
  mesh,
  TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -1, true, 0),

tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.VertexC.documentation: 更改网格纹理的色相。仅当与 SpecialMesh（网格） 对象一起使用时才起作用，因为它包含 SpecialMesh.TextureId 属性。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModelMesh.VertexC.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 对部件和网格进行实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

-- 将部件父项设为 Workspace
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建渐变效果
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out)
local blackTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)})
local redTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)})
local greenTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)})
local blueTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1)})
local resetTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)})

-- 开始动画效果
while true do 
	blackTween:Play()
	blackTween.Completed:Wait()
	redTween:Play()
	redTween.Completed:Wait()
	greenTween:Play()
	greenTween.Completed:Wait()
	blueTween:Play()
	blueTween.Completed:Wait()
	resetTween:Play()
	resetTween.Completed:Wait()
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataStore.GetVersionA.documentation: Key name for which the version info is requested. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".
Version number of the key for which the version info is requested

The value of the key at the specified version and a DataStoreKeyInfo instance that includes the version number, date and time the version was created, and functions to retrieve Player.UserId and metadata.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStore.ListKeysAsy.documentation: （可选） 用于定位键的前缀。
（可选） 每个页面中要返回的项目数。
DataStoreKeyPages （数据存储键页面）实例会以 DataStoreKey （数据存储键）实例的形式枚举键。
返回一个 DataStoreKeyPages （数据存储键页面）对象，用于枚举遍历数据存储中的键。

@roblox/globaltype/DataStore.ListVersion.documentation: Key name for the versions to list. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".
(Optional) Enum specifying ascending or descending sort order. Default is ascending.
(Optional) Date after which the versions should be listed.
(Optional) Date up to which the versions should be listed.
(Optional) Number of items to be returned in each page.
A DataStoreVersionPages instance that enumerates all the versions of the key as DataStoreObjectVersionInfo instances.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStore.RemoveVersi.documentation: Key name for which a version is to be removed. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".
Version number of the key to remove.
Permanently deletes the specified version of a key.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreIncrementOpt.documentation: Gets the custom metadata set with this DataStoreIncrementOptions instance.
Metadata values to set for the key.
Sets custom metadata to be associated with the key.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreInfo.Created.documentation: Indicates when the data store was created in milliseconds since epoch.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreInfo.Updated.documentation: Indicates the last time the data store was updated in milliseconds since epoch.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKey.documentation: Object representing a key on a DataStoreKeyPages object.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.documentation: An object specifying information about a particular version of the key.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.Crea.documentation: The date and time the object was created.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.Upda.documentation: The date and time the object was last updated.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.Vers.documentation: Uniquely identifies the version of the object.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.GetM.documentation: Returns the metadata associated with the object.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyInfo.GetU.documentation: An array of Player.UserId associated with the object.
An array of Player.UserId tagged with a key.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreKeyPages.documentation: A special type of Pages object whose pages contain DataStoreKey instances.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreListingPages.documentation: A special type of Pages object whose pages contain DataStoreInfo instances.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreObjectVersio.documentation: An instance describing version information for a key.
Indicates when the version was created in milliseconds since epoch.
Whether the version has been marked as deleted.
Uniquely identifies a particular version of the key.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreOptions.documentation: Object used to provide additional parameters to DataStoreService:GetDataStore.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreOptions.AllS.documentation: Whether the GlobalDataStore should work with all scopes.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreOptions.SetE.documentation: Lua table in key = value format where the key is the experimental feature name and the value is a boolean which specifies whether to enable.

@roblox/globaltype/DataStorePages.documentation: 一个允许通过 OrderedDataStore 键值对进行迭代的 Pages 对象。
@roblox/globaltype/DataStorePages.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local PointsODS = DataStoreService:GetOrderedDataStore("Points") 

local function printTopTenPlayers()
	local isAscending = false
	local pageSize = 10
	local pages = PointsODS:GetSortedAsync(isAscending, pageSize)
	local topTen = pages:GetCurrentPage()

	-- 'topTen' 内的数据存储在页面上的索引中
	-- 对于每一项来说，'data.key' 为 OrderedDataStore 内的 key，而 'data.value' 为其值
	for rank, data in ipairs(topTen) do
		local name = data.key
		local points = data.value
		print(data.key .. " is ranked #" .. rank .. " with " .. data.value .. "points")
	end

	-- 加载下一页（如有）……
	--pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

-- 创建数据
PointsODS:SetAsync("Alex", 55)
PointsODS:SetAsync("Charley", 32)
PointsODS:SetAsync("Sydney", 68)

-- 显示前十名玩家（topten）
printTopTenPlayers()

@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreService.GetR.documentation: 返回给定请求类型可提出的请求数。
@roblox/globaltype/DataStoreService.GetR.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local globalStore = DataStoreService:GetGlobalDataStore()

local function printBudget()
	local budget = DataStoreService:GetRequestBudgetForRequestType(Enum.DataStoreRequestType.SetIncrementAsync)
	print("Current set/increment budget:", budget)
end

for i = 1, 5 do
	local key = "key" .. i
	local success, err = pcall(function()
		globalStore:SetAsync(key, true)
	end)
	if success then
		printBudget()
	else
		print(err)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Debris.documentation: The Debris service allows the developer to schedule the removal of the object without yielding any code, through the usage of the Debris:AddItem method.
@roblox/globaltype/Debris.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local ball = Instance.new("Part")
ball.Anchored = false
ball.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball
ball.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

while true do
	newBall = ball:Clone()
	newBall.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
	newBall.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, 30, 0)
	newBall.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-10, 10), 0, math.random(-10, 10))
	newBall.Parent = game.Workspace
	Debris:AddItem(newBall, 2)
	wait(0.1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.documentation: The Decal object is an object which applies an image to a face of a BasePart.
@roblox/globaltype/Decal.code_sample:
-- 创建部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 0.5, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Toothpaste")

-- 创建贴花
local decal = Instance.new("Decal", part)
decal.Face = Enum.NormalId.Top

-- 创建音效
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" --被踩到的声效

-- 定义面
local happyFace = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=26424652"
local sadFace = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=147144198"

decal.Texture = happyFace

-- 触碰事件
local cooldown = false
part.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
	if not cooldown then
		if hit and hit.Parent then
			cooldown = true
			sound:Play()
			decal.Texture = sadFace
			wait(1)
			decal.Texture = happyFace
			wait(0.2)
			cooldown = false
		end
	end
end)

-- 添加至工作区
part.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.Color3.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 创建部件 1
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 10, 1)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Transparency = 1

-- 创建贴花
local decal = Instance.new("Decal", part)
decal.Face = Enum.NormalId.Front
decal.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1145367640" -- 白色圆形

-- 添加至工作区
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建渐变
local redTween = TweenService:Create(decal, 
	TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out),
	{Color3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)}
)
local greenTween = TweenService:Create(decal, 
	TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out),
	{Color3 = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)}
)
local blueTween = TweenService:Create(decal, 
	TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out),
	{Color3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 1)}
)

-- 播放渐变
while true do
	redTween:Play()
	redTween.Completed:Wait()
	greenTween:Play()
	greenTween.Completed:Wait()
	blueTween:Play()
	blueTween.Completed:Wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Ge.documentation: Samples the 3 FloatCurves (X, Y, Z) at the time passed as argument. Returns the result as 3 Euler angles. If a channel curve is missing or no key is found in the curve the channel is evaluated as nil.
Samples the EulerRotationCurve at a given time and returns the corresponding rotation. Empty Euler angles channels are interpreted as zero.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.X.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the X Euler angle channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named X. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.documentation: An Explosion applies force to BaseParts within the explosion's Explosion.BlastRadius. This force breaks joints between parts and kills Humanoid characters not protected by a ForceField.
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastPressu.documentation: 用来确定当BasePart被卷入Explosion.BlastRadius时所受到的力的大小。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastPressu.code_sample:
local function customExplosion(position, radius, maxDamage)
	local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
	explosion.BlastPressure = 0 -- this could be set higher to still apply velocity to parts
	explosion.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0 -- 关节安全
	explosion.BlastRadius = radius
	explosion.Position = position
	
	-- 设立一个表格来追踪模型被击打的情况
	local modelsHit = {}

	-- 监听碰触情况
	explosion.Hit:Connect(function(part, distance)
		local parentModel = part.Parent
		if parentModel then 
			-- 检查这个模型是否已经被击打 
			if modelsHit[parentModel] then
				return
			end
			-- 把这个模型在日志上记录为被击打
			modelsHit[parentModel] = true

			-- 寻找一个人形对象
			local humanoid = parentModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
			if humanoid then
				local distanceFactor = distance / explosion.BlastRadius -- get the distance as a value between 0 and 1
				distanceFactor = 1 - distanceFactor -- flip the amount, so that lower == closer == more damage
				humanoid:TakeDamage(maxDamage * distanceFactor) -- TakeDamage to respect ForceFields
			end	
		end
	end)

	explosion.Parent = game.Workspace
end

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastRadius.documentation: 此属性将确定 Explosion 的半径（以格为单位）。此半径确定爆炸效果面积，而不是爆炸视觉效果大小。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastRadius.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.DestroyJoin.documentation: 用于Explosion.BlastRadius的比例设置，值在 0 和 1 之间，在其范围内所有的关节都会被毁，在其范围外的东西只会受到Explosion力的影响。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.DestroyJoin.code_sample:
-- 添加到 workspace 的新 Explosion 的列表
workspace.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(instance)
	if instance:IsA("Explosion") then
		local explosion = instance
		-- 将 DestroyJointRadiusPercent 设置为 0
		explosion.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0
		-- 实现我们自己的 DestroyJointRadiusPercent
		local destroyJointRadiusPercent = 1
		explosion.Hit:Connect(function(part, distance)
			-- 检查下部件是否在可以破坏关节的范围内
			if distance <= destroyJointRadiusPercent * explosion.BlastRadius then
				-- 确认部件不属于角色
				if not game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(part.Parent) then
					-- 破坏部件
					part:BreakJoints()
				end
			end
		end)
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.ExplosionTy.documentation: 此属性决定 Explosion 与 Terrain 的交互方式。用于设置爆炸是否会破坏地形。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.ExplosionTy.code_sample:
game.Workspace.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(descendant)
	if descendant:IsA("Explosion") then
		descendant.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters
		descendant:GetPropertyChangedSignal("ExplosionType"):Connect(function()
			descendant.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters
		end)
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Position.documentation: 此属性是 Explosion 的中心位置。它是定义在世界空间中的，不受 Explosion 的父级的影响。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Position.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Visible.documentation: 此属性决定是否显示Explosion的视觉效果。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Visible.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local function customExplosion(position)
	local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
	explosion.Position = position
	explosion.Visible = false 
	
	local attachment = Instance.new("Attachment", workspace.Terrain)
	attachment.Position = position
	
	local particleEmitter = Instance.new("ParticleEmitter")
	particleEmitter.Enabled = false 
	particleEmitter.Parent = attachment 
	particleEmitter.Speed = NumberRange.new(5, 30)
	particleEmitter.SpreadAngle = Vector2.new(-90, 90)

	explosion.Parent = workspace 
	particleEmitter:Emit(20)

	Debris:AddItem(attachment, 5) -- 清除附件
end

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Hit.documentation: 当 Explosion 在其 Explosion.BlastRadius 内命中 BasePart 时触发。将返回命中的部件及其与 Explosion.Position 的距离。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Hit.code_sample:
local function customExplosion(position, radius, maxDamage)
	local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
	explosion.BlastPressure = 0 -- this could be set higher to still apply velocity to parts
	explosion.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0 -- 关节安全
	explosion.BlastRadius = radius
	explosion.Position = position
	
	-- 设立一个表格来追踪模型被击打的情况
	local modelsHit = {}

	-- 监听碰触情况
	explosion.Hit:Connect(function(part, distance)
		local parentModel = part.Parent
		if parentModel then 
			-- 检查这个模型是否已经被击打 
			if modelsHit[parentModel] then
				return
			end
			-- 把这个模型在日志上记录为被击打
			modelsHit[parentModel] = true

			-- 寻找一个人形对象
			local humanoid = parentModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
			if humanoid then
				local distanceFactor = distance / explosion.BlastRadius -- get the distance as a value between 0 and 1
				distanceFactor = 1 - distanceFactor -- flip the amount, so that lower == closer == more damage
				humanoid:TakeDamage(maxDamage * distanceFactor) -- TakeDamage to respect ForceFields
			end	
		end
	end)

	explosion.Parent = game.Workspace
end

@roblox/globaltype/FileMesh.documentation: The FileMesh object applies a mesh to a BasePart when parented to it. Its properties are inherited by the SpecialMesh object.
@roblox/globaltype/FileMesh.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 将部件和网格实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("FileMesh", part) -- 建议改为使用 SpecialMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)

-- 用于显示部件范围的选择框
local box = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
box.Adornee = part

-- 确立部件与工作区的父子项关系
part.Parent = workspace

-- 使用渐变以动画呈现偏移和比例
local tween = TweenService:Create(
	mesh,
	TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -1, true, 0),
	{Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)}
)

tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/FileMesh.MeshId.documentation: MeshId 是将要显示的网格的内容 ID。
@roblox/globaltype/FileMesh.MeshId.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 对部件和网格进行实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

-- 将部件父项设为 Workspace
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建渐变效果
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out)
local blackTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)})
local redTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)})
local greenTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)})
local blueTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1)})
local resetTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)})

-- 开始动画效果
while true do 
	blackTween:Play()
	blackTween.Completed:Wait()
	redTween:Play()
	redTween.Completed:Wait()
	greenTween:Play()
	greenTween.Completed:Wait()
	blueTween:Play()
	blueTween.Completed:Wait()
	resetTween:Play()
	resetTween.Completed:Wait()
	wait()
end

spawnLocation.Anchored = true

@roblox/globaltype/ForceField.Visible.documentation: 确定 ForceField 的粒子特效是否可见。
@roblox/globaltype/ForceField.Visible.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local function createCustomForcefield(player, duration)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			-- 寻找 Torso （躯干）
			local torsoName = humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 and "UpperTorso" or "Torso"
			local torso = character:FindFirstChild(torsoName)
			if torso then
				-- 创建 ForceField （力场）
				local forceField = Instance.new("ForceField")
				forceField.Visible = false -- not visible
				-- 创建粒子特效
				local particleEmitter = Instance.new("ParticleEmitter")
				particleEmitter.Enabled = true 
				particleEmitter.Parent = torso
				-- 监听 ForceField （力场）移除事件
				forceField.AncestryChanged:Connect(function(child, parent)
					if not parent then
						if particleEmitter and particleEmitter.Parent then
							particleEmitter:Destroy()
						end	
					end
				end)
				-- 成为 ForceField （力场）的父级，并对其过期时间进行设置
				forceField.Parent = character
				if duration then
					Debris:AddItem(forceField, duration)
				end
			end
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/FormFactorPart.documentation: FormFactorPart 类是抽象类。它继承自 BasePart 类并将 FormFactor 属性添加至从其继承的类。

@roblox/globaltype/FriendPages.documentation: Pages 的特殊版本包含有关玩家好友的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/FriendPages.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local USERNAME = "Shedletsky"

local function iterPageItems(pages)
	return coroutine.wrap(function()
		local pagenum = 1
		while true do
			for _, item in ipairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
				coroutine.yield(item, pagenum)
			end
			if pages.IsFinished then
				break
			end
			pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
			pagenum = pagenum + 1
		end
	end)
end

-- 首先获取玩家的用户 ID
local userId = Players:GetUserIdFromNameAsync(USERNAME)
-- 然后获取其 FriendPages 对象
local friendPages = Players:GetFriendsAsync(userId)
-- 遍历该页面中的项目。对于 FriendPages ，表中
-- 为好友的信息，包括有 Username 用户名
-- 收集表中各个用户名
local usernames = {}
for item, pageNo in iterPageItems(friendPages) do
	table.insert(usernames, item.Username)
end
-- 最后进行显示！
print("Friends of " .. USERNAME .. ": " table.concat(usernames, ", "))

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	local scope = "Player_" .. player.UserId
	local playerStats = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Stats", scope)
	local playerResources = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Resources", scope)
	-- GetAsync()/UpdateAsync() 现在可以在‘Stats’和‘Resources’数据存储上调用了
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.GetAs.documentation: The key name for which the value is requested. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".

The value of the entry in the data store with the given key and a DataStoreKeyInfo instance that includes the version number, date and time the version was created, and functions to retrieve Player.UserId and metadata.
返回具有指定键的数据存储和 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例的条目的值。
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.GetAs.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- 启用实验性功能（仅限测试阶段）
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local experienceStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerExperience", nil, options)
 
local success, currentExperience, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return experienceStore:GetAsync("User_1234")
end)
if success then
	print(currentExperience)
	print(keyInfo.Version)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo.UpdatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetUserIds())
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Incre.documentation: 待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
（可选） 用于与键关联的 Player.UserId （用户 ID ）表格。
（可选） DataStoreIncrementOptions （数据存储增量选项）实例，可将多个额外参数组合为自定义元数据并且具备未来可拓展性。
具有指定键的数据存储中的条目的值。
增加特定键的值并返回增量值（都必须是整数）。
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Incre.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- Enable experimental features (beta period only)
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local experienceStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerExperience", nil, options)

local incrementOptions = Instance.new("DataStoreIncrementOptions")
incrementOptions:SetMetadata({["ExperienceElement"] = "Fire"})

local success, newExperience, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return experienceStore:IncrementAsync("User_1234", 10, {1234}, incrementOptions)
end)
if success then
	print(newExperience)
	print(keyInfo.Version)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo.UpdatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetUserIds())
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Remov.documentation: 待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
删除之前的数据存储的值和一个 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例，该实例包括版本号、创建版本的日期和时间，以及检索 Player.UserId和metadata 的函数。
从数据存储中移除指定键并返回与该键相关联的值。
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Remov.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local nicknameStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Nicknames", nil, options)

local success, removedValue, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return nicknameStore:RemoveAsync("User_1234")
end)
if success then
	print(removedName)
	print(keyInfo.Version)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo.UpdatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetUserIds())
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.SetAs.documentation: Key name for which the value should be set. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".
具有指定键的数据存储中的条目的值。
Player.UserId（用户 ID）表格，强烈建议配合 articles/managing personal information|GDPR 跟踪/移除使用。
(Optional) DataStoreSetOptions instance that allows for metadata specification on the key.
新创建版本的版本标识符。它可以使用 GlobalDataStore.GetVersionAsync 检索关键信息或使用 GlobalDataStore.RemoveVersionAsync 删除它。
设置键的值，覆盖存储在键中的现有数据。
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.SetAs.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- Enable experimental features (beta period only)
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local experienceStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerExperience", nil, options)

local setOptions = Instance.new("DataStoreSetOptions")
setOptions:SetMetadata({["ExperienceElement"] = "Fire"})

local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
	experienceStore:SetAsync("User_1234", 50, {1234}, setOptions)
end)
if not success then
	print(errorMessage)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Updat.documentation: 待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
Transform 函数，接受当前值和 DataStoreKeyInfo 作为参数，并返回新值以及可选的 Player.UserId 和元数据。
删除之前的数据存储的值和一个 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例，该实例包括版本号、创建版本的日期和时间，以及检索 Player.UserId 和 metadata 的函数。
从数据存储中检索一个指定键值并更新为一个新的值
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Updat.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- Enable experimental features (beta period only)
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local nicknameStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Nicknames", nil, options)

local function makeNameUpper(currentName, keyInfo)
	local nameUpper = string.upper(currentName)
	local userIDs = keyInfo:GetUserIds()
	local metadata = keyInfo:GetMetadata()
	return nameUpper, userIDs, metadata
end

local success, updatedName, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return nicknameStore:UpdateAsync("User_1234", makeNameUpper)
end)
if success then
	print(updatedName)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.OnUpd.documentation: 识别从数据存储中检索的条目的键
在任何时候更改与键相关联的值时要执行的函数
指向被跟踪的键以进行更新的连接
将回调设置为在任何时候更改与键相关联的值时要执行的函数
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.OnUpd.code_sample:
local sampleDataStore = game:GetService("DataStoreService"):GetDataStore("MyDataStore")

local connection

local function printOut(input)
	print(input)
	-- 断开连接
	connection:Disconnect()
end
 
connection = sampleDataStore:OnUpdate("myKey", printOut)

local success, err = pcall(function()
	sampleDataStore:SetAsync("myKey", 11)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.code_sample:
local GroupService = game:GetService("GroupService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- 在此定义群组 id
local GROUP_ID = 271454

-- 处理页面的效用函数
local function pagesToArray(pages)
    local array = {}
    while true do
        for _, v in ipairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
            table.insert(array, v)
        end
        if pages.IsFinished then
            break
        end
        pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
    end
    return array
end

-- 获得盟友和敌人的列表
local alliesPages = GroupService:GetAlliesAsync(GROUP_ID)
local enemiesPages = GroupService:GetEnemiesAsync(GROUP_ID)

-- 转换为数组
local allies = pagesToArray(alliesPages)
local enemies = pagesToArray(enemiesPages)

local function playerAdded(player)
    -- 检查玩家是否在该群组内
    if player:IsInGroup(GROUP_ID) then
        print(player.Name .. " is a member!")
    else
        local isAlly, isEnemy = false, false

        -- 检查玩家是否在盟友群组内
        for _, groupInfo in ipairs(allies) do
            local groupId = groupInfo.Id
            if player:IsInGroup(groupId) then
                isAlly = true
                break
            end
        end

        -- 检查玩家是否在敌人群组内
        for _, groupInfo in ipairs(enemies) do
            local groupId = groupInfo.Id
            if player:IsInGroup(groupId) then
                isEnemy = true
                break
            end
        end

        if isAlly and not isEnemy then
            print(player.Name .. " is an ally!")
        elseif isEnemy and not isAlly then
            print(player.Name .. " is an enemy!")
        elseif isEnemy and isAlly then
            print(player.Name .. " is both an ally and an enemy!")
        else
            print(player.Name .. " is neither an ally or an enemy!")
        end
    end
end

-- 监听新添加玩家事项
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded)

-- 处理已经在游戏中的玩家
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    playerAdded(player)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetAllie.documentation: 返回一个 StandardPages 对象，其中包含给定群组所有盟友的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetAllie.code_sample:
local Players = Game:GetService("Players")

--创建包含给定群组所有盟友的表格
local allies = {}
local groupID = 57

local pages = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetAlliesAsync(groupID)
while true do
   for _,group in pairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
      table.insert(allies, group)
   end
   if pages.IsFinished then
      break
   end
   pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

function OnPlayerAdded(player)
   for _,group in pairs(allies) do
      if player:IsInGroup(group.Id) then
         print("Player is an ally!")
      end
   end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(OnPlayerAdded)
--处理在盟友列表加载时就进入游戏的玩家
for _,player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
   OnPlayerAdded(player)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetEnemi.documentation: 返回一个 StandardPages 对象，其中包含给定群组所有敌人的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetEnemi.code_sample:
-- creates a list of all of the enemies of a given group
local enemies = {}
local groupId = 57

local pages = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetEnemiesAsync(groupId)
while true do
   for _, group in pairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
      table.insert(enemies, group)
   end
   if pages.IsFinished then
      break
   end
   pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

function onPlayerAdded(player)
   for _, enemyGroup in pairs(enemies) do
      if player:IsInGroup(enemyGroup.Id) then
          print("Player is an enemy!")
          break
       end
    end
end

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)
-- handle players who joined while the enemies list was still loading
for _,player in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do
   onPlayerAdded(player)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.documentation: 返回一个表，其中包含有给定群组的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.code_sample:
local groupId = 377251
local group = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetGroupInfoAsync(groupId)

print(group.Name .. " has the following roles:")
for _, role in ipairs(group.Roles) do
   print("Rank " .. role.Rank .. ": " .. role.Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.documentation: 字典的数组，包含有关 Player 所属群组的信息
返回表列表，这些列表中包含有关指定玩家所有所属群组的信息
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.code_sample:
local GroupService = game:GetService("GroupService")
    local Players = game:GetService("Players")
    
    local function playerAdded(player)
    	-- 加载玩家所有所属群组的信息列表
    	local groups = GroupService:GetGroupsAsync(player.UserId)
    	
    	-- 浏览该列表
    	for _, groupInfo in pairs(groups) do
    
    		-- 打印所有条目
    		for key, value in pairs(groupInfo) do 
    			print(key..": "..tostring(value))
    		end
    
    		-- 打印分隔线
    		print("--")
    	end
    end
    
    -- 监听新玩家
    Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded)
    
    -- 浏览已有玩家
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    	playerAdded(player)
    end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiBase.documentation: GuiBase 是一个抽象类别，大多数图形用户界面对象都继承自该对象。

@roblox/globaltype/GuiBase2d.documentation: GuiBase2d 是由 2D GUI 对象继承的抽象类。

@roblox/globaltype/GuiBase2d.AbsolutePos.documentation: 描述 UI 元素的实际屏幕位置（以像素为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/GuiBase2d.AbsolutePos.code_sample:
-- 放置在 Frame、 TextLabel 等等中。
local guiObject = script.Parent

-- 要渲染此对象，它必须是 ScreenGui 的子项
local screenGui = guiObject:FindFirstAncestorOfClass("ScreenGui")

-- 创建备份
local copycat = Instance.new("Frame")
copycat.BackgroundTransparency = 0.5
copycat.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(.5, .5, 1) -- Light blue
copycat.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) -- White

--将副本按原样放置；做到 “absolutely”
copycat.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0) 
copycat.Position = UDim2.new(0, guiObject.AbsolutePosition.X, 0, guiObject.AbsolutePosition.Y)
copycat.Size = UDim2.new(0, guiObject.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, guiObject.AbsoluteSize.Y)
copycat.Rotation = guiObject.AbsoluteRotation

-- 插入父项 ScreenGui
copycat.Parent = screenGui

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Active.documentation: 确定 UI 元素是否会隐藏输入
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Active.code_sample:
-- 将该 LocalScript 放置于 TextButton 中 (或是 ImageButton 中)
local textButton = script.Parent

-- 初始化按钮的状态
textButton.Text = "Click me"
textButton.Active = true

local function onActivated()
	-- 防止将来发生的 Activations
	-- 这就像防抖动一样
	textButton.Active = false

	-- 从 5 开始倒数
	for i = 5, 1, -1 do
		textButton.Text = "Time: " .. i
		wait(1)
	end
	textButton.Text = "Click me"
	
	-- 重新允许发生 activations 
	textButton.Active = true
end

textButton.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.AnchorPoint.documentation: 确定 GuiObject 相对于其绝对尺寸的原点
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.AnchorPoint.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

while true do
	-- 左上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 左
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 死亡中心
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 左下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BackgroundC.code_sample:
-- 将该编码放入处于 Frame 内的 LocalScript 中
local frame = script.Parent

while true do
	for hue = 0, 255, 4 do
		-- HSV = hue, saturation, value
		-- 如果我们一直循环 0 到 1，就能得到彩虹！ 
		frame.BorderColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, 1, 1)
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, .5, .8)
		wait()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BackgroundT.documentation: 定义 GuiObject 的背景和边框的透明度
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BackgroundT.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local MIN_TRANSPARENCY = 0
local MAX_TRANSPARENCY = 0.9
local delta = 0

local function fadeGui()
	local element = script.Parent
	
	if element.BackgroundTransparency <= MIN_TRANSPARENCY then 
		delta = 0.01
	elseif element.BackgroundTransparency >= MAX_TRANSPARENCY then
		delta = -0.01
	end
	
	element.BackgroundTransparency = element.BackgroundTransparency + delta
end

RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(fadeGui)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BorderColor.code_sample:
-- 将该编码放入处于 Frame 内的 LocalScript 中
local frame = script.Parent

while true do
	for hue = 0, 255, 4 do
		-- HSV = hue, saturation, value
		-- 如果我们一直循环 0 到 1，就能得到彩虹！ 
		frame.BorderColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, 1, 1)
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, .5, .8)
		wait()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BorderMode.documentation: 决定 GuiObject 的边框相对于其维度的布局方式。

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BorderSizeP.code_sample:
-- 将此代码放在 GuiObject 中，最好是一个 ImageButton/TextButton
local button = script.Parent

local function onEnter()
	button.BorderSizePixel = 2
	button.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) -- 黄色
end

local function onLeave()
	button.BorderSizePixel = 1
	button.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
end

-- 连接事件
button.MouseEnter:Connect(onEnter)
button.MouseLeave:Connect(onLeave)
-- 我们默认的状态是“没有悬停”
onLeave()

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.ClipsDescen.documentation: 确定是否应该渲染超出父 GUI 元素边界的子 GuiObject

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.LayoutOrder.documentation: 与 UIGridStyleLayout 结合使用时，控制 GuiObject 的排序顺序
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.LayoutOrder.code_sample:
-- 将一个脚本放入 UIListLayout
local uiGridLayout = script.Parent

-- 一些要处理的数据
local scores = {
	["Player1"] = 2048;
	["Ozzypig"] = 1337;
	["Shedletsky"] = 1250;
	["Builderman"] = 1000;  
}

-- 创建一个得分板
for name, score in pairs(scores) do
	local tl = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	tl.Text = name .. ": " .. score
	tl.Parent = script.Parent
	tl.LayoutOrder = -score -- We want higher scores first, so negate for descending order
	tl.Name = name
	tl.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)
	tl.Parent = uiGridLayout.Parent
end

while true do
	-- 名称为玩家名称
	uiGridLayout.SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.Name
	uiGridLayout:ApplyLayout()
	wait(2)
	-- 由于我们将 LayoutOrder 设置为得分，因此这将按照降序排序！
	uiGridLayout.SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.LayoutOrder
	uiGridLayout:ApplyLayout()
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.NextSelecti.documentation: 设置游戏手柄选择器朝此方向移动时将选择的 GuiObject
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.NextSelecti.code_sample:
-- ========================================
-- 使用以下代码设置游戏手柄选择栅格
local container = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Container")
local grid = container:GetChildren()
local rowSize = container:FindFirstChild("UIGridLayout").FillDirectionMaxCells

for i, gui in pairs (grid) do
	if gui:IsA("GuiObject") then
		local pos = gui.Name
		
		-- 左边缘
		gui.NextSelectionLeft = container:FindFirstChild(pos-1)		
		-- 右边缘
		gui.NextSelectionRight = container:FindFirstChild(pos+1)		
		-- 上
		gui.NextSelectionUp = container:FindFirstChild(pos-rowSize)		
		-- 下
		gui.NextSelectionDown = container:FindFirstChild(pos+rowSize)
	end
end
-- ========================================

-- ========================================
-- 使用以下代码测试游戏手柄选择
local GuiService = game:GetService("GuiService")
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

GuiService.SelectedObject = container:FindFirstChild("1")

function updateSelection(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local key = input.KeyCode

		local selectedObject = GuiService.SelectedObject
		if not selectedObject then return end
		
		if key == Enum.KeyCode.Up then
			if not selectedObject.NextSelectionUp then
				GuiService.SelectedObject = selectedObject
			end
		elseif key == Enum.KeyCode.Down then
			if not selectedObject.NextSelectionDown then
				GuiService.SelectedObject = selectedObject
			end
		elseif key == Enum.KeyCode.Left then
			if not selectedObject.NextSelectionLeft then
				GuiService.SelectedObject = selectedObject
			end
		elseif key == Enum.KeyCode.Right then
			if not selectedObject.NextSelectionRight then
				GuiService.SelectedObject = selectedObject
			end
		end
	end
end

UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(updateSelection)
-- ========================================

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Position.documentation: 确定 GUI 的像素和标量尺寸
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Position.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

while true do
	-- 左上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右上
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 0)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 左
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 死亡中心
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 0.5)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0.5, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 左下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
	-- 右下
	guiObject.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 1)
	guiObject.Position = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Rotation.documentation: 确定 UI 元素的旋转度数
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Rotation.code_sample:
-- 放置在 Frame、 TextLabel 等等中。
local guiObject = script.Parent

-- 要渲染此对象，它必须是 ScreenGui 的子项
local screenGui = guiObject:FindFirstAncestorOfClass("ScreenGui")

-- 创建备份
local copycat = Instance.new("Frame")
copycat.BackgroundTransparency = 0.5
copycat.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(.5, .5, 1) -- Light blue
copycat.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) -- White

--将副本按原样放置；做到 “absolutely”
copycat.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0) 
copycat.Position = UDim2.new(0, guiObject.AbsolutePosition.X, 0, guiObject.AbsolutePosition.Y)
copycat.Size = UDim2.new(0, guiObject.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, guiObject.AbsoluteSize.Y)
copycat.Rotation = guiObject.AbsoluteRotation

-- 插入父项 ScreenGui
copycat.Parent = screenGui

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Selectable.documentation: 决定 GuiObject 是否可以被游戏手柄选择
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Selectable.code_sample:
local GuiObject = script.Parent
local GuiService = game:GetService("GuiService")

local function gainFocus(gui)
	GuiObject.Selectable = true
	GuiService.SelectedObject = GuiObject
end

local function loseFocus(gui)
	GuiService.SelectedObject = nil
	GuiObject.Selectable = false
end

-- FocusLost 和 FocusGained 事件会触发，因为 GuiObject
-- 是 TextBox 类型的
GuiObject.Focused:Connect(gainFocus)
GuiObject.FocusLost:Connect(loseFocus)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.SelectionIm.documentation: 覆盖默认的选择装饰物（用于游戏手柄）。

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Size.documentation: 确定 GuiObject 的像素和标量尺寸
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Size.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- 将脚本贴在 LocalScript 上 
-- 该 LocalScript 为 Frame 内 Frame 的父项
local frame = script.Parent
local container = frame.Parent
container.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- black

-- 当人形生物的生命值发生改变时，该函数被调用
local function onHealthChanged()
	local human = player.Character.Humanoid
	local percent = human.Health / human.MaxHealth
	-- 更改内部栏的大小
	frame.Size = UDim2.new(percent, 0, 1, 0)
	-- 更改生命条颜色
	if percent < .1 then
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- black
	elseif percent < .4 then
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) -- yellow
	else
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) -- green
	end
end

-- 当玩家重生时，运行函数被调用
local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	local human = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
	-- 模式：当前先更新一次，之后每当生命值发生改变时更新
	human.HealthChanged:Connect(onHealthChanged)
	onHealthChanged()
end

-- 连接我们的重生监听器； 调用它（如果已经重生）
player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
if player.Character then
	onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Visible.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

while true do
	guiObject.Visible = true
	wait(1)
	guiObject.Visible = false
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.ZIndex.documentation: 确定相对于其他 GUI 渲染 GuiObject 的顺序
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.ZIndex.code_sample:
-- 将此放置在 LocalScript 中
-- 该LocalScript是两个名为 “ FrameA” 和 “ FrameB” 的 GuiObject 同级对象
local gui = script.Parent
local frameA = gui:WaitForChild("FrameA")
local frameB = gui:WaitForChild("FrameB")

while true do
	-- 由于 A < B, 所以 A 优先渲染 (在底部) 
	frameA.ZIndex = 1
	frameB.ZIndex = 2
	wait(1)
	-- 由于 A > B, 所以 A 之后渲染 (在顶部)
	frameA.ZIndex = 2
	frameB.ZIndex = 1
	wait(1)
end

渐变动画完成时执行的回调函数
平滑地移动一个 GUI 到一个新的 DataType.UDim2

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSize/p.documentation: 此渐变动画是否覆盖正在运行的渐变动画
渐变动画完成时执行的回调函数

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSize.documentation: 平滑地将一个 GUI 的尺寸变为一个新的 DataType.UDim2
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSize.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

local function callback(didComplete)
	if didComplete then
		print("The tween completed successfully")
	else
		print("The tween was cancelled")
	end
end

local willTween = guiObject:TweenSize(
	UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0),  -- endSize （目标尺寸，必须）
	Enum.EasingDirection.In,    -- easingDirection （缓动方向，默认为 Out）
	Enum.EasingStyle.Sine,      -- easingStyle （缓动样式，默认为 Quad）
	2,                          -- 时间（默认为 1）
	true,                       -- 此渐变应该覆盖正在运行的渐变动画吗？（默认为 false）
	callback                    -- 渐变完成时调用的函数（默认为 nil）
)

if willTween then
	print("The GuiObject will tween") 
else
	print("The GuiObject will not tween")
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSizeAn.documentation: GUI 到 endSize 和 endPosition 的缓动方向
GUI 到 endSize 和 endPosition 的缓动样式
此渐变动画是否覆盖正在运行的渐变动画
渐变动画完成时执行的回调函数
平滑地变化一个 GUI 为新的尺寸和位置

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputBegan.documentation: 当用户通过人机接口设备（按下鼠标按钮、开始触摸、按下键盘按钮等）开始交互时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputBegan.code_sample:
-- 为了使用 InputBegan 事件，必须指定 GuiObject
local gui = script.Parent

-- 示例函数为各种类型的用户输入提供了多种使用案例
local function inputBegan(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key is being pushed down! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has started at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button is being pressed on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end
end

gui.InputBegan:Connect(inputBegan)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputChange.documentation: 当用户改变他们通过人机接口设备（按下鼠标按钮、开始触摸、按下键盘按钮等）交互的方式时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputChange.code_sample:
-- 要使用 InputChanged 事件，您必须指定一个 GuiObject
local gui = script.Parent

-- 打印当前的输入位置和位置的改变（delta）
local function printMovement(input)
	print("\tPosition:",input.Position)
	print("\tMovement Delta:",input.Delta)
end
 
-- 一个示例多种用户输入的函数
local function inputChanged(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement then
		print("The mouse has been moved!")
		printMovement(input)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseWheel then
		print("The mouse wheel has been scrolled!")
		print("\tWheel Movement:",input.Position.Z)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		if input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Thumbstick1 then
			print("The left thumbstick has been moved!")
			printMovement(input)
		elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Thumbstick2 then
			print("The right thumbstick has been moved!")
			printMovement(input)
		elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.ButtonL2 then
			print("The pressure being applied to the left trigger has changed!")
			print("\tPressure:",input.Position.Z)
		elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.ButtonR2 then
			print("The pressure being applied to the right trigger has changed!")
			print("\tPressure:",input.Position.Z)
		end
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("The user's finger is moving on the screen!")
		printMovement(input)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gyro then
		local rotInput,rotCFrame = UserInputService:GetDeviceRotation()
		local rotX,rotY,rotZ = rotCFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ()
		local rot = Vector3.new(math.deg(rotX),math.deg(rotY),math.deg(rotZ))
		print("The rotation of the user's mobile device has been changed!")
		print("\tPosition",rotCFrame.p)
		print("\tRotation:",rot)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Accelerometer then
		print("The acceleration of the user's mobile device has been changed!")
		printMovement(input)
	end	
end

gui.InputChanged:Connect(inputChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputEnded.documentation: 当用户结束通过人机接口设备（按下鼠标按钮、开始触摸、按下键盘按钮等）的交互时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputEnded.code_sample:
-- 要使用 InputEnded 事件，您必须指定一个 GuiObject
local gui = script.Parent
 
-- 一个示例多种用户输入的函数
local function inputEnded(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key has been released! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button has been released on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end
end

gui.InputEnded:Connect(inputEnded)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseEnter.documentation: 当用户的鼠标进入 GUI 元素时触发

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseLeave.documentation: 当用户的鼠标离开 GUI 元素时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseLeave.code_sample:
-- 服务
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- GUI 元素
local Canvas = script.Parent
local ClearButton = script.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("ClearButton")
local pointer = Canvas:FindFirstChild("Pointer")

-- 玩家的鼠标
local mouse = game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse()

-- 指示玩家的 MouseButton1 按下的全局 boolean
local hold = false

function paint(X, Y)	
	local gui_X = Canvas.AbsolutePosition.X
	local gui_Y = Canvas.AbsolutePosition.Y
		
	local offset = Vector2.new(math.abs(X - gui_X), math.abs(Y - gui_Y - 36))
	pointer.Position = UDim2.new(0, offset.X, 0, offset.Y)
	
	if hold == false then return end
		
	local pixel = pointer:Clone()
	pixel.Name = "Pixel"
	pixel.Parent = Canvas
end

function clear()
	local children = Canvas:GetChildren()
	
	for i, child in pairs (children) do
		if child.Name == "Pixel" then
			child:Destroy()
		end
	end
end

function showPointer()
	pointer.Visible = true
end

function hidePointer()
	pointer.Visible = false
end

function inputBegan(input)
	local inputType = input.UserInputType
	  if inputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
        hold = true
    end
end

function inputEnded(input)
	local inputType = input.UserInputType
	if inputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		hold = false
	end
end

-- 事件
ClearButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(clear)

UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(inputBegan)
UserInputService.InputEnded:Connect(inputEnded)

Canvas.MouseMoved:Connect(paint)
Canvas.MouseEnter:Connect(showPointer)
Canvas.MouseLeave:Connect(hidePointer)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseWheelB.documentation: 当用户的鼠标在 GUI 元素上方向后滚动滚轮时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseWheelB.code_sample:
local CustomScrollingFrame = script.Parent
local SubFrame = CustomScrollingFrame:FindFirstChild("SubFrame")

function scrollUp(x, y)
	if SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale < 0  then
		SubFrame.Position = SubFrame.Position + UDim2.new(0, 0, .015, 0)
	elseif SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale > 0 then
		SubFrame.Position = UDim2.new(SubFrame.Position.X.Scale, 
			SubFrame.Position.X.Offset, 0, SubFrame.Position.Y.Offset)
	end
end

function scrollDown(x, y)
	if SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale > -1 then
		SubFrame.Position = SubFrame.Position - UDim2.new(0, 0, .015, 0)
	elseif SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale < -1 then
		SubFrame.Position = UDim2.new(SubFrame.Position.X.Scale, 
			SubFrame.Position.X.Offset, -1, SubFrame.Position.Y.Offset)
	end
end

CustomScrollingFrame.MouseWheelForward:Connect(scrollUp)
CustomScrollingFrame.MouseWheelBackward:Connect(scrollDown)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchLongPr.documentation: 在玩家开始、继续或停止长按 UI 元素时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchLongPr.code_sample:
local frame = script.Parent
frame.Active = true

local dragging = false
local basePosition
local startTouchPosition
local borderColor3
local backgroundColor3

local function onTouchLongPress(touchPositions, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		-- 开始拖拽 
		dragging = true
		basePosition = frame.Position
		startTouchPosition = touchPositions[1]
		--着色框架以示拖拽开始
		borderColor3 = frame.BorderColor3
		backgroundColor3 = frame.BackgroundColor3
		frame.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) -- 白色
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) -- 蓝色
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		local touchPosition = touchPositions[1]
		local deltaPosition = UDim2.new(
			0, touchPosition.X - startTouchPosition.X,
			0, touchPosition.Y - startTouchPosition.Y
		)
		frame.Position = basePosition + deltaPosition
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		-- 停止拖拽
		dragging = false
		frame.BorderColor3 = borderColor3
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = backgroundColor3
	end
end

frame.TouchLongPress:Connect(onTouchLongPress)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPan.documentation: 当玩家移动手指到 UI 元素上时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPan.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local basePosition

local function onTouchPan(touchPositions, totalTranslation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		basePosition = innerFrame.Position
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		innerFrame.Position = basePosition + UDim2.new(
			0, totalTranslation.X,
			0, totalTranslation.Y
		)
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchPan:Connect(onTouchPan)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPinch.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上使用两根手指执行聚拢或展开手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPinch.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local uiScale = Instance.new("UIScale")
uiScale.Parent = innerFrame
local baseScale

local function onTouchPinch(touchPositions, scale, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		baseScale = uiScale.Scale
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		uiScale.Scale = baseScale * scale -- 注意这里的乘法
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchPinch:Connect(onTouchPinch)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchRotate.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上使用两根手指执行旋转手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchRotate.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local baseRotation = innerFrame.Rotation

local function onTouchRotate(touchPositions, rotation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		baseRotation = innerFrame.Rotation
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		innerFrame.Rotation = baseRotation + rotation
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchRotate:Connect(onTouchRotate)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchSwipe.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上执行滑动手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchSwipe.code_sample:
local frame = script.Parent
frame.Active = true

-- 成功滑动一次后，框架应该弹跳多远
local BOUNCE_DISTANCE = 50

-- 框架当前的状态
local basePosition = frame.Position
local hue = 0
local saturation = 128

local function updateColor()
	frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, saturation/256, 1)
end

local function onTouchSwipe(swipeDir, touchCount)
	-- 根据滑动的方向改变 BackgroundColor3
	local deltaPos
	if swipeDir == Enum.SwipeDirection.Right then
		deltaPos = UDim2.new(0, BOUNCE_DISTANCE, 0, 0)
		hue = (hue + 16) % 255
	elseif swipeDir == Enum.SwipeDirection.Left then
		deltaPos = UDim2.new(0, -BOUNCE_DISTANCE, 0, 0)
		hue = (hue - 16) % 255
	elseif swipeDir == Enum.SwipeDirection.Up then
		deltaPos = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, -BOUNCE_DISTANCE)
		saturation = (saturation + 16) % 255
	elseif swipeDir == Enum.SwipeDirection.Down then
		deltaPos = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, BOUNCE_DISTANCE)
		saturation = (saturation - 16) % 255
	else
		deltaPos = UDim2.new()
	end
	-- 更新框架的颜色，并使其弹跳
	updateColor()
	frame.Position = basePosition + deltaPos
	frame:TweenPosition(basePosition, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, Enum.EasingStyle.Bounce, .7, true)
end

frame.TouchSwipe:Connect(onTouchSwipe)
updateColor()

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchTap.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上执行触摸手势时触发

	else

	end
