@roblox/globaltype/MarketplaceService.Th.documentation: 当第三方购买操作完成时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/MarketplaceService.Pr.documentation: 当某一开发者产品的购买提示关闭时触发。警告：切勿用于处理开发者产品购买！

@roblox/globaltype/MDIInstance.documentation: 此成员作用于尚未发布的内容。

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.AddA.documentation: The value of the item to add to the queue.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the queue.
Item priority. Items with higher priority are retrieved from the queue before items with lower priority.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.documentation: Number of items to read. The maximum allowed value of this parameter is 100.

Controls the behavior of the method in the case the queue has fewer than count items: if set to false the method returns all available items; if set to true, it returns no items. The default value is false.

The duration, in seconds, for which the method will wait if the required number of items is not immediately available in the queue. This parameter can be set to zero to indicate no wait. If this parameter is not provided or set to -1, the method will wait indefinitely.

A tuple of two elements. The first element is an array of item values read from the queue. The second element is a string identifier that should be passed to MemoryStoreQueue:RemoveAsync to permanently remove these items from the queue.
Reads one or more items from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.documentation: Identifies the items to delete. Use the value returned by MemoryStoreQueue:ReadAsync.
Removes an item or items previously read from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreService.documentation: Exposes methods to access specific primitives within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreService.Ge.documentation: (Optional) Invisibility timeout, in seconds, for read operations through this queue instance. If not provided, defaults to 30 seconds.
Returns a MemoryStoreQueue instance for the provided name.
Returns a MemoryStoreSortedMap instance for the provided name.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap.documentation: Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..documentation: Key whose value to retrieve.
Key value, or nil -- if there’s no item with the specified key.
Retrieves the value of a key in the sorted map.
Sort direction, ascending or descending.
The number of items to retrieve; the maximum allowed value for this parameter is 200.
(Optional) Lower bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.
(Optional) Upper bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.
Item keys and values in the requested range.
Retrieves items within a sorted range of keys.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..code_sample:
function PrintAllKeys(map)
    -- the initial lower bound is nil which means to start from the very first item
    local exclusiveLowerBound = nil

    -- this loop continues until the end of the map is reached
    while true do
        -- get up to a hundred items starting from the current lower bound
        local items = map:GetRangeAsync(Enum.SortDirection.Ascending, 100, exclusiveLowerBound)
        
        -- print all keys retrieved in this call
        for _, entry in ipairs(items) do
            print(item.key)
        end

        -- if the call returned less than a hundred items it means we’ve reached the end of the map
        if #items < 100 then
            break
        end

        -- the last retrieved key is the exclusive lower bound for the next iteration
        exclusiveLowerBound = items[#items].key
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..documentation: Key to remove.
Removes the provided key from the sorted map.
Key whose value to set.
Key value to set.
Item expiration, in seconds. The item is automatically removed from the sorted map once the expiration duration is reached. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
True if a new item was added, false -- if an existing item was updated.
Sets the value of a key.
Key whose value to update.
A function which you need to provide. The function takes the key’s old value as input and returns the new value.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the sorted map. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
The return value is the last value returned by the transform function.
Retrieves the value of a key from a sorted map and updates it with a new value.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..code_sample:
local UMS = game:GetService(“MemoryStoreService”)
local map = UMS:GetSortedMap(“AuctionItems”)

function PlaceBid(itemKey, bidAmount)
    map:UpdateAsync(itemKey, function (item)
        item = item or { highestBid = 0 }
        if item.highestBid < bidAmount then
            item.highestBid = bidAmount
            return item
        end
        return nil
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MeshContentProvider.documentation: 负责获取、解析和缓存网格的 Roblox 内部服务。开发人员无法使用此服务。

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.documentation: 一种包含物理模拟的自定义网格的 BasePart 形式。

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.DoubleSided.documentation: 在网格上渲染面或多边形的两面

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.MeshId.documentation: The MeshId is the content ID of the mesh that is to be displayed on the MeshPart

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.RenderFideli.documentation: 决定实体建模及网格部件显示的细节水平

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.MeshID.documentation: The MeshId is the content ID of the mesh that is to be displayed on the MeshPart

@roblox/globaltype/Message.documentation: 用半透明的灰色背景覆盖整个屏幕。在 Roblox 的 GUI 功能发布后已被弃用，以后的新建作品中应使用 TextLabel 进行替代。

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.documentation: MessagingService 允许同一个游戏中不同的游戏服务器进行相互通信

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Publ.documentation: 当有消息被推送到主题时，调用提供的回调

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.documentation: 每次接收消息后调用的函数
可以用来取消订阅主题的连接

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.code_sample:
local messagingService = game:getService("MessagingService")
local players = game:GetService("Players")
 
players.PlayerAdded:connect(function(player)
    -- 对主题进行订阅
    local topic = "player-" .. player.UserId
    local connection = messagingService:SubscribeAsync(topic, function(message)
        print("接收到消息，收件人为 " .. player.Name)
    end)
 
    player.AncestryChanged:connect(function()
        -- 取消主题订阅
        connection:Disconnect()
    end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.
@roblox/globaltype/Model.code_sample:
local function groupObjects(objectTable)
	local model = Instance.new("Model")
	for _, object in pairs(objectTable) do
		object.Parent = model
	end
	return model
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.PrimaryPart.code_sample:
-- Create a dice model with two halves and attach them together
local diceModel = Instance.new("Model")
diceModel.Name = "ChanceCube"
local diceTop = Instance.new("Part")
diceTop.Size = Vector3.new(4, 2, 4)
diceTop.Position = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
diceTop.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 1)
diceTop.Parent = diceModel
local diceBottom = diceTop:Clone()
diceBottom.Position = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0)
diceBottom.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
diceBottom.Parent = diceModel
local weld = Instance.new("WeldConstraint")
weld.Parent = diceModel
weld.Part0 = diceTop
weld.Part1 = diceBottom

-- Put the dice up in the air above the workspace origin (does not require a primary part)
diceModel.Parent = workspace
diceModel:PivotTo(CFrame.new(0, 10, 0))

-- Assign the primary part before physical simulation
-- Without this line, the script will always output the same thing and the bounding box of the model will not change orientation
diceModel.PrimaryPart = diceTop
 
-- Wait a bit before rolling the dice (let it settle onto the floor)
for i = 5, 1, -1 do
	print("Rolling dice in...", i)
	task.wait(1)
end

-- Roll the dice
diceTop:ApplyAngularImpulse(Vector3.new(15000, 1000, 5000))
diceTop:ApplyImpulse(Vector3.new(0, 3000, 0))
task.wait(1)

-- Wait for the roll to complete
while diceTop.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Magnitude > 0.1 or diceTop.AssemblyAngularVelocity.Magnitude > 0.1 do
	task.wait()  -- Wait 1 frame
end

-- Get the dice orientation, impacted by the primary part
local orientation = diceModel:GetBoundingBox()
if orientation.YVector.Y > 0.5 then
	print("It's the boy!")
else
	print("It's his mother!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.World 锚点方向.documentation: 设定锚点方向的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 Model.WorldPivot （模型/世界锚点）。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.World 锚点位置.documentation: 设定锚点位置的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 Model.WorldPivot （模型/世界锚点）。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.WorldPivot.documentation: 决定了一个没有 Model.PrimaryPart （主要部件）的 Model （模型）的锚点所在位置。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.WorldPivot.code_sample:
local function resetPivot(model)
	local boundsCFrame = model:GetBoundingBox()
	if model.PrimaryPart then
		model.PrimaryPart.PivotOffset = model.PrimaryPart.CFrame:ToObjectSpace(boundsCFrame)
	else
		model.WorldPivot = boundsCFrame
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.BreakJoints.documentation: Breaks connections between BaseParts, including surface connections with any adjacent parts, WeldConstraints and all Welds and other JointInstances.
@roblox/globaltype/Model.BreakJoints.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(newPlayer)
	newPlayer.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(characterModel)
		wait(3)
		characterModel:BreakJoints()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetBoundingBox/.documentation: DataType.CFrame 代表体积的朝向，后面紧跟的 DataType.Vector3 代表的是体积的大小

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetBoundingBox.documentation: 返回包含某一 Model 所有部件的体积的描述

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetExtentsSize.documentation: 返回包含 Model 中所有 BasePart 的最小边界框的大小，与 Model.PrimaryPart 对齐（如已设置）。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetExtentsSize.code_sample:
local model = Instance.new('Model', Workspace) -- 创建模型。
 
for i = 1, 5 do
	-- 在模型中放置随机位置的部件。
	local part = Instance.new('Part', model)
	part.Anchored = true
	part.Size = Vector3.new(math.random(5), math.random(5), math.random(5))
end
 
print(model:GetExtentsSize())

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.documentation: 返回 Model 的 Model.PrimaryPart 的 CFrame。如果该 Model 不存在主要部件，该函数将会报告错误。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.code_sample:
local startPosition = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)

-- 在 startPosition 中创建一个简单的旋转模型
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
part1.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPosition)
part1.Anchored = true
part1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
part1.Parent = model

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.CFrame = part1.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 3, 0)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
part2.Parent = model

-- 设置主要部分
model.PrimaryPart = part1
model.Parent = game.Workspace

while true do
	local primaryPartCFrame = model:GetPrimaryPartCFrame()
	local newCFrame = primaryPartCFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(10), 0)
	model:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(newCFrame)
	wait(.2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.MakeJoints.documentation: 检查 Model 中的所有 BasePart。如果部件的任何面有一个可以形成关节的 SurfaceType，它将与任何相邻的部件创建一个关节
@roblox/globaltype/Model.MakeJoints.code_sample:
local model = Instance.new("Model")

-- create one part on top of another
local topPart = Instance.new("Part", model)
topPart.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
topPart.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
topPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
topPart.Anchored = true -- anchor the top part

local bottomPart = Instance.new("Part", model)
bottomPart.Size = Vector3.new(8, 1, 8)
bottomPart.Position = Vector3.new(0, 9, 0)
bottomPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
bottomPart.Anchored = false -- leave bottom unanchored

-- set the part's surfaces
topPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth -- 'Weld' to create a joint
topPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
bottomPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
bottomPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Weld -- 'Weld' to create a joint

-- parent the model to the workspace
model.Parent = game.Workspace

-- make the joints
model:MakeJoints()

wait(2)
-- unanchor the bottom part - part does not fall
print("Unanchored!")
bottomPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
bottomPart.Anchored = false

wait(2)
-- break the joints using an explosion - part falls
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.Position = bottomPart.Position
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Model. 移动至.documentation: 将 Model.PrimaryPart 移动到给定位置。如果没有指定主要部件，则使用模型的根部件。
@roblox/globaltype/Model. 移动至.code_sample:
-- define two Positions
local startPosition = Vector3.new(-20, 10, 0)
local endPosition = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)

-- create a simple model at the startPosition
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
part1.Position = startPosition
part1.Anchored = true
part1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
part1.Parent = model

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.Position = startPosition + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
part2.Parent = model

-- set the primary part
model.PrimaryPart = part1
model.Parent = game.Workspace

-- create an obstruction at the endPosition
local obstruction = Instance.new("Part")
obstruction.Name = "Obstruction"
obstruction.Size = Vector3.new(10, 10, 10)
obstruction.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
obstruction.Anchored = true
obstruction.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
obstruction.Parent = game.Workspace

wait(3)
-- attempt to move the model to the obstructed endPosition
model:MoveTo(endPosition)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.SetPrimaryPartC.documentation: 设置 Model （模型）中 Model.PrimaryPart 的 BasePart.CFrame 。该模型中的所有其他部件也将随着 Model.PrimaryPart 进行移动，保持其相对方向与偏移。如果模型中不存在 Model.PrimaryPart ，则该函数将会引发错误。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.SetPrimaryPartC.code_sample:
-- 定义 2 个 CFrame
local startCFrame = CFrame.new(0, 10, 0)
local endCFrame = CFrame.new(0, 15, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0)

-- 创建简单模型
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part = Instance.new("Part", model)
part.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
part.Anchored = true
part.CFrame = startCFrame
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")

local part2 = Instance.new("Part", model)
part2.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 1)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.CFrame = startCFrame * CFrame.new(0, 1, 0) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0)
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")

-- 设置模型的 PrimaryPart
model.PrimaryPart = part 

-- 在 2 个 CFrame 之间进行循环
while true do
	wait(1)
	model:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(startCFrame)
	wait(1)
	model:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(endCFrame)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.TranslateBy.documentation: 将某一 Model 偏移给定的偏移量 Vector3，同时保持 Model 的朝向。如果新的位置上已存在另一个 BasePart 或 Terrain，则 Model 将与上述对象重叠。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.TranslateBy.code_sample:
-- 定义两个 Positions
local startPosition = Vector3.new(-20, 10, 0)
local endPosition = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)

-- 在 startPosition 中创建一个简单的旋转模型
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
part1.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPosition) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(45), 0)
part1.Anchored = true
part1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
part1.Parent = model

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.CFrame = part1.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 3, 0)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
part2.Parent = model

-- 设置主要部分
model.PrimaryPart = part1
model.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 在 endPosition 处创建障碍物
local obstruction = Instance.new("Part")
obstruction.Name = "Obstruction"
obstruction.Size = Vector3.new(10, 10, 10)
obstruction.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
obstruction.Transparency = 0.5
obstruction.Anchored = true
obstruction.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
obstruction.Parent = game.Workspace

wait(3)
-- 使用 TranslateBy 将模型移入障碍物
model:TranslateBy(endPosition - startPosition)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetModelCFrame.documentation: 该值之前用于返回模型中心位置的 CFrame。由于其无法提供可靠结果，因此已弃用。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetModelSize.documentation: 返回 Model（模型）的 Vector3 大小。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetModelSize.code_sample:
local model = Instance.new('Model', Workspace) -- 创建模型。
 
for i = 1, 5 do
	-- 在模型中放置随机位置的部件。
	local part = Instance.new('Part', model)
	part.Anchored = true

end
 
print(model:GetModelSize())

@roblox/globaltype/Model.ResetOrientatio.documentation: 通过 Model:SetIdentityOrientation 方法，将模型各部分的旋转重置为之前设置的同一旋转。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.SetIdentityOrie.documentation: 设置给定模型的同一旋转，这使您随后可通过 ResetOrientationToIdentity 方法重置整个模型的旋转。

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.documentation: A type of script object that runs once when require is called with it. Returns exactly one value, usually a table of functions, to used by other scripts. Useful for compartmentalizing code.
@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.code_sample:
-- 表中的一个变量可以存储多个值
    local my_functions = {}
    
    -- 向表中添加少许函数
    function my_functions.foo()
    	print("Foo!")
    end
    
    function functions.bar()
    	print("Bar!")
    end
    
    -- ModuleScripts 必定返回相同的一个值
    return my_functions

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.LinkedSo.documentation: 用于存储指向特定在线脚本源的 URL。会将在线代码与脚本的 Script.Source 绑定

@roblox/globaltype/Motor.MaxVelocity.documentation: 电机为了达到Motor.DesiredAngle所能使用的最大速度，单位是弧度/物理帧（一秒钟 60 物理帧）

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.documentation: 旧版对象，包含应用于指针输入的成员

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Hit.documentation: The DataType.CFrame of the mouse's position in 3D space
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Hit.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

-- grab local player
local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

-- create beam
local beam = Instance.new("Beam")
beam.Segments = 1
beam.Width0 = 0.2
beam.Width1 = 0.2
beam.Color = ColorSequence.new(Color3.new(1, 0, 0))
beam.FaceCamera = true

-- create attachments
local attachment0 = Instance.new("Attachment")
local attachment1 = Instance.new("Attachment")
beam.Attachment0 = attachment0
beam.Attachment1 = attachment1

-- parent attachments to Terrain 
beam.Parent = workspace.Terrain
attachment0.Parent = workspace.Terrain
attachment1.Parent = workspace.Terrain

-- grab the mouse
local mouse = localPlayer:GetMouse()

-- connect to RenderStepped (update every frame)
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()

	-- make sure the character exists
	local character = localPlayer.Character
	if not character then
		-- disable the beam
		beam.Enabled = false
		return
	end

	-- make sure the head exists
	local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head")
	if not head then
		-- disable the beam
		beam.Enabled = false
		return
	end

	-- enable the beam
	beam.Enabled = true

	-- define origin and finish
	local origin = head.Position
	local finish = mouse.Hit.p

	-- move the attachments 
	attachment0.Position = origin
	attachment1.Position = finish
end)

print("-------------------------------------------------")

print("-------------------------------------------------")

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.TargetFilter.documentation: 当确定 Mouse.Hit 和 Mouse.Target 时，判断一个对象（和其所有子项）是否应当被忽略

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.TargetSurface.documentation: 用来指明鼠标所指向表面所属 BasePart 的 Enum.NormalId
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.TargetSurface.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- 获得鼠标
local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = localPlayer:GetMouse()

-- 定义表面类型 
local surfaceTypes = {
	Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Glue,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Weld,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Studs,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Inlet,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Universal,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Hinge,
	Enum.SurfaceType.Motor
}

-- 监听鼠标点击
mouse.Button1Down:Connect(function()
	-- 确保鼠标指向一个部件
	local target = mouse.Target
	if not target then
		return
	end

	-- 选择一个随机的表面类型
	local surfaceType = surfaceTypes[math.random(1, #surfaceTypes)]

	-- 寻找正确的表面
	local surface = mouse.TargetSurface 
	local propertyName = surface.Name.."Surface"

	-- 设置表面类型
	mouse.Target[propertyName] = surfaceType
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.UnitRay.documentation: 朝向 Mouse 世界位置的 DataType.Ray，其起点为 Workspace.CurrentCamera 的世界位置

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.documentation: 以像素为单位描述了游戏窗口的宽度
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.code_sample:
-- 注意：开发者应该使用 ContextActionService 或者 UserInputService，而不要使用 
-- Mouse 对象来完成此工作。
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local function onMouseMove()
	-- 构建 Vector2 对象，用其来表示鼠标的位置和屏幕的尺寸
	local position = Vector2.new(mouse.X, mouse.Y)
	local size = Vector2.new(mouse.ViewSizeX, mouse.ViewSizeY)
	-- 一个标准化的位置是将左上角对应为（顶栏的下方）
	-- (0, 0)，将右下角对应为(1, 1)，将中心对应为(0.5, 0.5)。
	-- 用位置除以总大小来得出结果。
	local normalizedPosition = position / size
	print(normalizedPosition)
end
mouse.Move:Connect(onMouseMove)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Idle.documentation: 每个鼠标未传递至另一鼠标事件的 Heartbeat（心跳单位）都会进行触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Idle.code_sample:
local mouse = game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse()
local rs = game:GetService("RunService")
local events = {"Button1Down","Button1Up","Button2Down","Button2Up","Idle","Move","WheelBackward","WheelForward","KeyDown","KeyUp"}
local currentEvent
local frame = 0

for _,event in pairs(events) do
	mouse[event]:Connect(function ()
		currentEvent = event
	end)
end

local function processInput()
	frame = frame + 1
	print("Frame",frame,"- mouse event was passed to",currentEvent)
end

rs:BindToRenderStep("ProcessInput",Enum.RenderPriority.Input.Value,processInput)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Move.code_sample:
local player= game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local point 
local down

local function selectPart()
 	if mouse.Target and not mouse.Target.Locked then 
		point = mouse.Target
  		mouse.TargetFilter = point
  		down = true
 	end
end

local function movePart()
	if down and point then
  		local posX, posY, posZ = mouse.Hit.X,mouse.Hit.Y,mouse.Hit.Z
  		point.Position = Vector3.new(posX,posY,posZ)
 	end
end

local function deselectPart()
 	down = false
	point = nil
 	mouse.TargetFilter = nil
end

mouse.Button1Down:Connect(selectPart)
mouse.Button1Up:Connect(deselectPart)
mouse.Move:Connect(movePart)

@roblox/globaltype/NegateOperation.documentation: 通过实体建模创建一个 CSG 部件，该部件可以从其他部件移除

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkClient.Ticket.documentation: 客户端的授权票据。仅在连接到非本地 Roblox 服务器时使用。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkClient.Connect.documentation: 当客户端成功连接到服务器时触发。返回包含服务器的 IP、Port 和客户端 ClientReplicator 的字符串。
客户端连接服务器失败时触发。
当客户端尝试连接服务器，但加入的请求被拒绝时触发。 这种情况通常在客户端使用的 Roblox 版本不正确时发生。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkMarker.documentation: NetworkMarker 用于告诉客户端服务器何时完成加载世界。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkMarker.Receive.documentation: 服务器完成复制世界到客户端时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkPeer.documentation: NetworkPeer 对象是网络对象最基本的类别。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkPeer.SetOutgoi.documentation: 设置 Roblox 可以使用的最大传出带宽。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.documentation: 处理其他对象从服务器复制到客户端或从客户端复制到服务器的对象。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.Clo.documentation: 断开复制器，结束服务器/客户端之间的连接。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.Get.documentation: 返回连接到 NetworkReplicator 的玩家。
返回包含复制器正在发送/接收的字节数以及当前丢包率的字符串。信息内容由详细级别所决定（0 = 基本、1 = 详细、2 = 完整）。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Extra.documentation: 一个未使用的调试属性，原用于串流。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.FreeM.documentation: 描述有多少可用的空余内存，单位为 MB 。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Print.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，与物理复制错误相关的 debug 信息将被显示在输出中。
当设置为 true 时，若 Workspace.StreamingEnabled 为 true ，有关实例副本的 debug 信息会显示在输出中。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Rende.documentation: 设为 true 时，串流到客户端的空间区域将带有红色轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.ShowA.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个 Player 的头部上方都会显示一个标签，展示该玩家的 Humanoid 当前正在播放的动画（如果有）。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Track.documentation: 设为 true 时，复制器统计信息会对正在发送的数据包的相关数据进行采样。
设为 true 时，复制器统计信息会对物理复制详细信息进行采样。

@roblox/globaltype/NoCollisionConstraint.documentation: 一个用于防止两个部件之间发生碰撞的实例。

@roblox/globaltype/NotificationService.documentation: 一种无法供开发者使用的内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/NumberValue.documentation: A container object for a single double-precision floating point number.
@roblox/globaltype/NumberValue.code_sample:
-- 创建一个 Part 来展示 Changed 事件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Transparency” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Transparency = .5
-- 用 “Number” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- 更改 BrickColor 也会同时更改其他属性
-- 因此此行用“BrickColor”、“Color3” 和 “Color3uint16”
-- 来触发 Changed 事件。
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- 一个存有双精度浮点数值的 NumberValue 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 123.456 来触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vNumber.Value = 123456
-- 并不会触发 Changed 事件
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- 存储着字符串的 StringValue
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Hello” 触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/OrderedDataStore.documentation: 一个允许有序数据存储条目的 GlobalDataStore
@roblox/globaltype/OrderedDataStore.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local PointsODS = DataStoreService:GetOrderedDataStore("Points") 

local function printTopTenPlayers()
	local isAscending = false
	local pageSize = 10
	local pages = PointsODS:GetSortedAsync(isAscending, pageSize)
	local topTen = pages:GetCurrentPage()

	-- 'topTen' 内的数据存储在页面上的索引中
	-- 对于每一项来说，'data.key' 为 OrderedDataStore 内的 key，而 'data.value' 为其值
	for rank, data in ipairs(topTen) do
		local name = data.key
		local points = data.value
		print(data.key .. " is ranked #" .. rank .. " with " .. data.value .. "points")
	end

	-- 加载下一页（如有）……
	--pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

-- 创建数据
PointsODS:SetAsync("Alex", 55)
PointsODS:SetAsync("Charley", 32)
PointsODS:SetAsync("Sydney", 68)

-- 显示前十名玩家（topten）
printTopTenPlayers()

@roblox/globaltype/OrderedDataStore.GetS.documentation: 一个表示返回的数据页是否按升序排列的布尔值。

可选参数。如果设置，数据页大于 maxValue 的会被排除。
一个基于提供参数已排序好的 DataStorePages 对象。

@roblox/globaltype/Pants.documentation: Displays a Pants texture from the Roblox website to display on a Humanoid rig
@roblox/globaltype/Pants.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- 寻找衬衫和裤子
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- 如果衬衫和裤子不存在就进行创建
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- 重设衬衫和裤子的内容 id
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Pants.PantsTemplate.documentation: 决定Pants的纹理。内容 ID 链接指向存储在 Roblox 网页上的裤子模板。
@roblox/globaltype/Pants.PantsTemplate.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- 寻找衬衫和裤子
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- 如果衬衫和裤子不存在就进行创建
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- 重设衬衫和裤子的内容 id
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Part.documentation: The Part object is a physical object, commonly known as a brick
@roblox/globaltype/Part.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")		-- 创建一个新部件

part.Name = "JurrasicPart"			-- 命名部件... hehe
part.Anchored = true				-- 将部件锚固
part.Parent = game.Workspace		-- 将部件放入 Workspace
part.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball		-- 赋予部件一个球形的形状
part.Color = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)		-- 将颜色设为黑色

@roblox/globaltype/PartAdornment.documentation: 一个抽象类别，包含装饰到（显示为附加到）BasePart 派生出来的对象的 GUI 元素。

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.documentation: A special effects object that emits customizable 2D billboard particles into the world
@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.code_sample:
local emitter = Instance.new("ParticleEmitter")
-- 粒子数量 = 速率 * 持续时间
emitter.Rate = 5 -- Particles per second
emitter.Lifetime = NumberRange.new(1,1) -- How long the particles should be alive (min, max)
emitter.Enabled = true 

-- 视效属性
emitter.Texture = "rbxassetid://1266170131" -- A transparent image of a white ring
-- 对于 Color 颜色属性，使用 ColorSequenceKeypoint 构建一个 ColorSequence
local colorKeypoints = {
	-- API: ColorSequenceKeypoint.new(time, color)
	ColorSequenceKeypoint.new( 0, Color3.new(1, 1, 1)),  -- At t=0, 白
	ColorSequenceKeypoint.new(.5, Color3.new(1, .5, 0)), -- At t=.5, 橙
	ColorSequenceKeypoint.new( 1, Color3.new(1, 0, 0))   -- At t=1, 红
}
emitter.Color = ColorSequence.new(colorKeypoints)
local numberKeypoints = {
	-- API: NumberSequenceKeypoint.new(time, size, envelop)
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new( 0, 1);    -- At t=0, 完全透明
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new(.1, 0);    -- At t=.1, 完全不透明
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new(.5, .25);  -- At t=.5, 几乎不透明
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new( 1, 1);    -- At t=1, 完全透明
}
emitter.Transparency = NumberSequence.new(numberKeypoints)
emitter.LightEmission = 1 -- 粒子重叠时，累积它们的色彩使其更亮
emitter.LightInfluence = 0 -- 不受世界的光照影响

-- 速度属性
emitter.EmissionDirection = Enum.NormalId.Front -- 向前发射
emitter.Speed = NumberRange.new(0, 0) -- 速度为 0
emitter.Drag = 0 -- 对粒子运动不施加阻碍
emitter.VelocitySpread = NumberRange.new(0, 0)
emitter.VelocityInheritance = 0 -- 不继承父项速度
emitter.Acceleration = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
emitter.LockedToPart = false -- 不将粒子锁定至父项 
emitter.SpreadAngle = Vector2.new(0,0) -- 无旋转角或其他轴

-- 模拟属性
local numberKeypoints2 = {
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new(0, 0);  -- At t=0, 尺寸为 0
	NumberSequenceKeypoint.new(1, 10); -- At t=1, 尺寸为 10
}
emitter.Size = NumberSequence.new(numberKeypoints2)
emitter.ZOffset = -1 -- 在真实位置稍靠后的地方渲染
emitter.Rotation = NumberRange.new(0, 360) -- 旋转起始随机
emitter.RotSpeed = NumberRange.new(0) -- 模拟时不旋转

-- 创建一个附件以便粒子可以从同一个精确点 (同心圆)开始发射
local attachment = Instance.new("Attachment", script.Parent)
attachment.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) -- Move the attachment upwards a little
emitter.Parent = attachment

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Veloc.documentation: 决定粒子从其父项发射器发射时的偏移程度

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Clear.code_sample:
local emitter = script.Parent
while true do
	emitter:Clear()
	emitter:Emit(10)
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local emitter = script.Parent
local part = emitter.Parent

local PARTICLES_PER_STUD = 3

local lastPosition = part.Position
local distance = 0
local function onStep()
	local displacement = part.Position - lastPosition
	distance = distance + displacement.magnitude
	
	local n = math.floor(distance * PARTICLES_PER_STUD)
	emitter:Emit(n)
	distance = distance - n / PARTICLES_PER_STUD
	lastPosition = part.Position
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)
emitter.Enabled = false

@roblox/globaltype/PartOperation.documentation: 所有基于实体建模的部件都从其继承的抽象类。

@roblox/globaltype/PartOperation.Smoothi.documentation: 一个角度（单位为度），影响实体建模部件的平滑着色效果。

@roblox/globaltype/PartOperation.Triangl.documentation: 此实体模型中的多边形数。该值永远 <=5000。

@roblox/globaltype/PartOperation.UsePart.documentation: 设置是否可以使用 BrickColor 属性对 PartOperation 重新着色。

@roblox/globaltype/PartOperationAsset.documentation: 一种无法供开发者使用的内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints/ret.documentation: 一个 DataType.PathWaypoint 数组，以路径开始到结束的顺序排列

@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints.documentation: 返回包含路径所有点的数组。
@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints.code_sample:
local PathfindingService = game:GetService("PathfindingService")

-- 创建路径对象
local path = PathfindingService:CreatePath()

local pathStart = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
local pathEnd = Vector3.new(100, 1, 25)

-- 计算并检查路径
path:ComputeAsync(pathStart, pathEnd)

if path.Status == Enum.PathStatus.Success then
	-- 获取路径点
	local waypoints = path:GetWaypoints()
	-- 循环路径点
	for _, waypoint in pairs(waypoints) do
		-- 输出路径点的位置
		print(waypoint.Position)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Path.CheckOcclusionAs.documentation: 检查路径是否从特定路径点开始堵塞

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingModifier.documentation: Modifiers used to represent space that has a higher or lower cost to be traversed when creating paths using the PathfindingService

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingModifier.M.documentation: The name of the navigation area inside or on top of the Part volume

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingModifier.P.documentation: Determines if the parts enclosed by the modifier are traversable, even if they would normally be collided with.

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingService.documentation: 用于在两个点之间寻找路径

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingService.Em.documentation: 设置一个体素必须被占据多少百分比才会被认为是空的。默认值为 0.16。

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingService.Cr.documentation: Lua table which lets you fine-tune the path for the size of the agent (the humanoid that will move along the path). See Agent Parameters.

@roblox/globaltype/PathfindingService.Co.documentation: 计算并返回两个 DataType.Vector3 之间的 Path。若给定的 MaxDistance 大于 512，则抛出错误。(MaxDistance 太大)。
计算并返回两个 DataType.Vector3 间一条平滑的 Path

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsPacketCache.documentation: 一种用于物理联网的内部服务，开发者无法使用其功能。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsService.Collis.documentation: 返回部件是否存在于碰撞组中。
设置两个群组之间的碰撞状态。
返回两个碰撞组是否会进行碰撞。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsService.Create.documentation: 创建一个指定名称的碰撞组，并返回已创建组的 ID。
@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsService.Create.code_sample:
local physicsService = game:GetService("PhysicsService")

-- 返回一个有效的群组 id（int）或 nil
function getGroupId(name)
	-- 如不存在则会引发 GetCollisionGroupId
	local ok, groupId = pcall(physicsService.GetCollisionGroupId, physicsService, name)
	return ok and groupId or nil
end

-- 返回一个有效的群组 id（int）或 nil
function getOrCreateGroupId(name)
	local ok, groupId = pcall(physicsService.GetCollisionGroupId, physicsService, name)
	if not ok then
		-- 如果我们已经使用了最大 32 个不同的群组则可能会创建失败
		ok, groupId = pcall(physicsService.CreateCollisionGroup, physicsService, name)
	end
	return ok and groupId or nil
end

-- 将指定部件的碰撞群组设置至 
-- 具有给定 id 的群组
function setPartCollisionGroup(part, name)
	physicsService:SetPartCollisionGroup(part, name)
end

-- 返回部件的碰撞 id
function getPartGroupId(part)
	return part.CollisionGroupId
end

	
print("Get 'Test' Group:", getGroupId("Test")) -- 打印输出 nil
print("Get/Create 'Test' Group:", getOrCreateGroupId("Test")) -- 打印输出 1
print("Get Id of 'Test' Group:", getGroupId("Test")) -- 打印输出 1
print("Setting Part1's collision group...")
setPartCollisionGroup(game.Workspace.Part1, "Test")
print("Part1's Collision Group Id:", getPartGroupId(game.Workspace.Part1)) -- 打印输出 1

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Allow.documentation: 设为 true 时，如果物理模拟对象在特定的一段时间内没有或几乎没有运动，模拟将会停止。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAn.documentation: 若设为 true，则 BasePart.Anchored 的部件会在当前面向地面的部件边界框的表面上显示灰色的表面轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAs.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个物理集合会有唯一的颜色，与集合相关联的 Part 会有同样颜色的轮廓。通过 JointInstance 连接在一起的部件会共享颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAw.documentation: 设为 true 时，当前被物理模拟的部件会有红色轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreBo.documentation: 当设为 true 时，根据 Part 的根模拟体状态，其轮廓将为指定颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreCo.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个接触岛都会被分配一个随机的颜色，然后在其部件上渲染 SelectionBox 装饰。
当设为 true 时，将在每个部件出现物理交互的接触点处绘制球体装饰物。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreJo.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个部件的 BasePart.CFrame 处会渲染 XYZ 轴。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMe.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个单独的部件机制都会被赋予唯一的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMo.documentation: 一个自 2007 年末以来就没有正常工作过的陈旧属性。 原用于在 Model 的根部件渲染 XYZ 轴，但轴渲染组件无法正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreOw.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个 Player 的角色会有唯一颜色的轮廓，且玩家拥有网络所有权的每个部件也会有相同颜色的轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.ArePa.documentation: 一个自 2007 年末以来就没有正常工作过的陈旧属性。 原用于在每个 BasePart 的中心渲染大型 XYZ 轴，但轴渲染组件无法正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreRe.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，会在每个 Player 的角色周围绘制圆柱体，代表其 Player.SimulationRadius。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreUn.documentation: 设为 true 时，没有对齐到 1x1x1 网格的部件会有黄色的轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreWo.documentation: 一个自 2007 年末以来就没有正常工作过的陈旧属性。 原用于在世界的中心渲染 XYZ 轴，但轴渲染组件无法正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Disab.documentation: 若设为 true，则在执行实体模型操作时，Roblox 会使用旧版的 CSG 解算器

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsRec.documentation: 该属性本用于显示部件的 BasePart.ReceiveAge，但目前不能正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsTre.documentation: 当设为 true 时，每个部件的关节连接及其底层基元组件的状态将显现为生成树视觉效果。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Physi.documentation: 控制 Roblox 物理引擎的限流速率。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.ShowD.documentation: 设为 true 时，PartOperation 和 MeshPart 的底层碰撞几何体会被渲染出。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Throt.documentation: 如果 PhysicsSettings.PhysicsEnvironmentalThrottle 设为 DefaultAuto，将会指定物理环境限流可以进行自动改变之前所需等待的最大时间长度。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.UseCS.documentation: 若设为 true，则使用第 2 版的 Roblox CSG 解算器而不是第 1 版。

@roblox/globaltype/Platform.documentation: 原为一种不会让玩家处于坐姿的 Seat 形式。此对象现已不可再创建或被开发人员使用

@roblox/globaltype/Player.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players") -- game.Players is OK here, too

-- 最终所有 Player 对象都会调用一次此函数
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 为排行榜数据创建容器
	local leaderstats = Instance.new("Folder")
	leaderstats.Name = "leaderstats"
	
	-- 创建一个排行榜数据值
	local vScore = Instance.new("IntValue")
	vScore.Name = "Score"
	vScore.Value = 0
	vScore.Parent = leaderstats
	
	-- 添加到玩家（显示它）
	leaderstats.Parent = player
end

-- 处理已经加入到游戏的 Player 对象
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- 处理即将添加到游戏的 Player 对象
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded) -- 注意这里是 PlayerAdded 不是 ChildAdded 哦！

@roblox/globaltype/Player.AccountAge.documentation: 描述玩家的账户注册时长（以天为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.AccountAge.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local MAX_AGE_NEW_PLAYER = 7 -- 一周
local MIN_AGE_VETERAN = 365 -- 一年

-- 这个函数将会通过 BillboardGui 用文本对部件进行标记
local function mark(part, text)
	local bbgui = Instance.new("BillboardGui")
	bbgui.AlwaysOnTop = true
	bbgui.StudsOffsetWorldSpace = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
	bbgui.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)
	local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) -- 填充父项
	textLabel.Text = text
	textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0
	textLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	textLabel.Parent = bbgui
	-- 添加至部件
	bbgui.Parent = part
	bbgui.Adornee = part
end

local function onPlayerSpawned(player, character)
	local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	if player.AccountAge >= MIN_AGE_VETERAN then
		mark(head, "Veteran Player")
	elseif player.AccountAge <= MAX_AGE_NEW_PLAYER then
		mark(head, "New Player")
	else
		mark(head, "Regular Player")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 监听玩家生成
	if player.Character then
		onPlayerSpawned(player, player.Character)
	end
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function ()
		onPlayerSpawned(player, player.Character)
	end)
end

-- 监听玩家被添加
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.documentation: 决定使用移动设备的玩家角色是否会在遇到障碍物时自动跳跃。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- 更新按键文本
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- 映射属性至玩家的角色（如果有的话）
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- 切换自动跳跃
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- 更新其余内容
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CameraMode.documentation: 将镜头模式改变至第一人称或第三人称视角。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CanLoadCharact.documentation: 决定玩家生成角色时是否加载玩家的角色外观。如设为 false，则玩家生成的角色将会拥有默认外观。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.CanLoadCharact.code_sample:

player. CanLoadCharacterAppearance = false

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Character.documentation: 玩家所控制的 Model，含有 Humanoid、身体部件、脚本及其它对象。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAppea.documentation: 决定了玩家Player.Character所使用的角色外观所属账户的用户 ID
@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAppea.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local disguiseCommand = "/disguise "

local function onPlayerChatted(player, message)
	if message:sub(1, disguiseCommand:len()):lower() == disguiseCommand:lower() then
		local input = message:sub(disguiseCommand:len() + 1)
		local id = tonumber(input) -- 解析数字，如非数字则返回 nil
		if not id then -- 数字解析失败，或许输入为用户名
			pcall(function () -- 此调用有时可能会失败！
				id = Players:GetUserIdFromNameAsync(input) -- 从用户名获取 ID
			end)
		end
		if id then
			-- 设置角色外观，然后进行重生
			player.CharacterAppearanceId = id
			player:LoadCharacter()
		else
			-- 无法从输入内容中获取 ID
		end
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.Chatted:Connect(function (...)
		onPlayerChatted(player, ...)
	end)
end

-- 监听玩家被添加
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.DevEnableMouse.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function toggleMouseLock(player)
	-- 对属性进行切换
	player.DevEnableMouseLock = not player.DevEnableMouseLock
	-- 显示属性是否为 true
	if player.DevEnableMouseLock then
		print("鼠标锁定可用")
	else
		print("鼠标锁定不可用")
	end
end

local function onPlayerChatted(player, message, recipient)

		toggleMouseLock(player)
	end
end

end

@roblox/globaltype/Player.RespawnLocatio.documentation: 进行设置后，玩家将会在给定 SpawnLocation 进行重生。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.RespawnLocatio.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function addSpawn(spawnLocation)
	-- 监听那些接触了降生地点的行为
	spawnLocation.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
		local character = hit:FindFirstAncestorOfClass("Model")
		if character then
			local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character)
			if player and player.RespawnLocation ~= spawnLocation then
				local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
				-- 确保角色没有死亡
				if humanoid and humanoid:GetState() ~= Enum.HumanoidStateType.Dead then
					print("spawn set")
					player.RespawnLocation = spawnLocation
				end
			end
		end
	end)
end

local firstSpawn

-- 在整个 workspace 中寻找降生点
for _, descendant in pairs(workspace:GetDescendants()) do
	if descendant:IsA("SpawnLocation") then
		if descendant.Name == "FirstSpawn" then
			firstSpawn = descendant
		end
		addSpawn(descendant)
	end
end

local function playerAdded(player)
	player.RespawnLocation = firstSpawn
end

-- 监听新加入的玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded)

-- 遍历已存在的玩家
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do 
	playerAdded(player)
end

	player.SimulationRadius = player.SimulationRadius + change

end

-- 输出更新后的模拟范围
player.SimulationRadiusChanged:Connect(function(radius)
	print("The new simulation radius is: "..radius.."studs")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Team.documentation: 确定某个 Player 所隶属的 Team 。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.Team.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")

-- 两个团队：其中一个是观战者（默认），另一个是参加游戏的团队
local teamPlaying = Teams.Playing
local teamSpectators = Teams.Spectating
-- 进行游戏的指令
local playCommand = "/play"

local function play(player)
	-- 使用下列的其中之一来设置玩家团队：
	player.Team = teamPlaying
	player.TeamColor = teamPlaying.TeamColor
	-- 降生玩家（将玩家们移动到降生地点）
	player:LoadCharacter()
end

local function onPlayerDied(player, character)
	-- 当某玩家操控的角色死亡后，将对应的玩家放入观战者团队
	player.Team = teamSpectators
end

local function onPlayerSpawned(player, character)
	local human = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
	human.Died:Connect(function () onPlayerDied(player, character) end)
end

local function onPlayerChatted(player, message)
	if message:sub(1, playCommand:len()):lower() == playCommand then
		play(player)
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 监听此玩家的降生
	if player.Character then
		onPlayerSpawned(player, player.Character)
	end
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function ()
		onPlayerSpawned(player, player.Character)
	end)
end

-- 监听玩家的添加
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetJoinData/re.documentation: 一个包含 PlaceId 和 UserId 值的字典（请参见描述中的表格）。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetJoinData.documentation: 返回一个包含 Player（玩家）如何加入游戏的信息的字典
@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetJoinData.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local approvedPlaceIds = {1} -- 在此处插入有效的 PlaceIds

local function isPlaceIdApproved(placeId)
    for _, id in pairs(approvedPlaceIds) do
        if id == placeId then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    local joinData = player:GetJoinData()

    -- 验证此数据是来自一个有效的位置
    if isPlaceIdApproved(joinData.SourcePlaceId) then

        local teleportData = joinData.TeleportData
        if teleportData then
            local currentLevel = teleportData.currentLevel
            print(player.Name.." is on level "..currentLevel)
        end
    end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetMouse.documentation: 返回正在被客户端使用的鼠标。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetMouse.code_sample:
local Player = Game.Players.LocalPlayer
local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
Mouse.Button1Down:Connect(function()

@roblox/globaltype/Player.HasAppearanceL.documentation: 一个布尔值，指示玩家角色的外观是否已加载。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.HasAppearanceL.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Kick/param/0.documentation: 玩家被踢出时将会看到的消息。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Kick.documentation: 强制将玩家与游戏断联，可选择为其提供一条消息。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.Kick.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local kickCommand = "/kick "

local function onOwnerChatted(player, message)
	if message:sub(1, kickCommand:len()):lower() == kickCommand:lower() then
		local name = message:sub(kickCommand:len() + 1)
		local playerToKick = Players:FindFirstChild(name)
		if playerToKick then
			playerToKick:Kick("You have been kicked by the owner.")
		else
			-- 无法找到请求的玩家
		end
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 限制此命令只能被创建者/拥有者使用
	if player.UserId == game.CreatorId and game.CreatorType == Enum.CreatorType.User then
		player.Chatted:Connect(function (...)
			onOwnerChatted(player, ...)
		end)
	end
end

-- 监听玩家加入
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.documentation: 为玩家创建新的角色，并将旧角色移除。同时会清除玩家 Backpack 和 PlayerGui 中的所有内容。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.code_sample:
local respawnDelay = 5

game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- 找到人形，并检测它的死亡
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
				wait(respawnDelay)
				player:LoadCharacter()
			end)
		end
	end)
	player:LoadCharacter() -- 首次加载角色
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterB.documentation: 与 Player:LoadCharacter 功能相似，但其请求将会同步处理，而非异步处理。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.documentation: HumanoidDescription 包含的特征有：身体部位或颜色、身体比例、饰品、服装和动画。这些特征将装备到加载的角色上
生成一个虚拟角色并装备 HumanoidDescription 中传递的一切
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.code_sample:
-- 停止自动刷新，使其可以在 “PlayerAdded” 回调中完成
game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false
 
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 创建一个 HumanoidDescription
	local humanoidDescription = Instance.new("HumanoidDescription")
	humanoidDescription.HatAccessory = "2551510151,2535600138"
	humanoidDescription.BodyTypeScale = 0.1
	humanoidDescription.ClimbAnimation = 619521311
	humanoidDescription.Face = 86487700
	humanoidDescription.GraphicTShirt = 1711661
	humanoidDescription.HeadColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
	-- 以 HumanoidDescription 生成角色
	player:LoadCharacterWithHumanoidDescription(humanoidDescription)
end
 
-- 连接 “PlayerAdded” 事件至 “onPlayerAdded()” 函数
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.documentation: 请求服务器向指定地点附近的玩家串流
@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.code_sample:
-- Localscript
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
local teleportTarget = CFrame.new(50, 2, 120)
 
-- 触发远程事件
teleportEvent:FireServer(teleportTarget)


-- 服务器脚本
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
 
-- 传送玩家
local function teleportPlayer(player, teleportTarget)
	-- 请求目标位置附近的串流
	player:RequestStreamAroundAsync(teleportTarget.Position)
	-- 传送角色
	player.Character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(teleportTarget)
end
 
-- 当客户端触发远程事件时调用 “teleportPlayer()”
teleportEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(teleportPlayer)

将给定实例放入玩家角色或头部，或者根据实例类别将其放入 StarterGear。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterA.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    player.Chatted:Connect(function(message)
        local assetId = message:match("id=(%d+)")
        if assetId then
            local model = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(assetId)
            for _, child in pairs(model:GetChildren()) do
                player:LoadCharacterAppearance(child)
            end
        end
    end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAdded.documentation: 当玩家角色生成或重生时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAdded.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	print(character.Name .. "已生成")
end

local function onCharacterRemoving(character)
	print(character.Name .. "即将消失")
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
	player.CharacterRemoving:Connect(onCharacterRemoving)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAppea.documentation: 当 Player 的 Player.Character 全套外观被插入后触发
@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAppea.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function playerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAppearanceLoaded:Connect(function(character)
		local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

		-- 保存帽子以便之后使用
		local accessories = {}
		for _, accessory in pairs(humanoid:GetAccessories()) do 
			table.insert(accessories, accessory:Clone())
		end

		-- 移除帽子
		humanoid:RemoveAccessories()

		wait(5)

		-- 确保玩家仍存在，并有同样的角色
		if player and player.Character and player.Character == character then
			local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
			if humanoid:GetState() ~= Enum.HumanoidStateType.Dead then
				-- 归还帽子
				for _, accessory in pairs(accessories) do 
					humanoid:AddAccessory(accessory)
				end
			end
		end

		accessories = nil
	end)
end

-- 获取已有玩家
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do 
	playerAdded(player)
end
-- 监听新玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterRemov.documentation: 在玩家角色即将被移除前触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Chatted.documentation: 当玩家使用 Roblox 提供的聊天栏进行游戏内聊天时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Idled.documentation: 通常在游戏引擎将玩家定类为闲置状态的两分钟后进行触发。Time（时间）为此时点后所经历的秒数。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.documentation: 当玩家的 TeleportState 更改后触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local playerOnTeleport = player
	player.OnTeleport:Connect(function(teleportState, placeId, spawnName)
		if teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Started then
			print("传送开始 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.WaitingForServer then
			print("传送正在等候服务器 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.InProgress then
			print("传送进行中 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Failed then
			print("传送失败！ ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		end
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.SimulationRadi.code_sample:
-- 获得本地玩家
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- 设置最大模拟范围（默认值是 1000）
player.MaximumSimulationsRadius = 800

-- 更改模拟范围
local change = -20
while true do
	change = change * -1
	player.SimulationRadius = player.SimulationRadius + change
	wait(5)
end

-- 输出更新后的模拟范围
player.SimulationRadiusChanged:Connect(function(radius)
	print("The new simulation radius is: "..radius.."studs")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/PlayerMouse.code_sample:

@roblox/globaltype/Players.documentation: A game service that contains presently connected Player objects.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	-- 如果头顶还没闪光，则添加
	if not character:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") then
		local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
		sparkles.Parent = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 检查他们是否已经生成进入了
	if player.Character then
		onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
	end
	-- 监听玩家的 (重新)生成 
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end

-- 遍历所有已经连入的玩家
-- 使用一般的 for-loop
for i, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- 监听新连入的玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.documentation: 指示气泡聊天是否启用。可用 Players:SetChatStyle 方法设置。
@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

if (Players.ClassicChat and Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Classic and Bubble chat are enabled!")
elseif (Players.ClassicChat) then
	print("Classic chat is enabled!")
elseif (Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Bubble chat is enabled!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.CharacterAuto.code_sample:
-- 将 CharacterAutoLoads 设为 false
game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false

-- 死亡时从工作区移除玩家的角色
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	while true do
		local char = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
		char.Humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
			char:Remove()
		end)
	end
end)

-- 每隔 10 秒重生所有死亡的玩家
while true do
	local players = game.Players:GetChildren()
	
	-- 检查每个玩家是否没有角色，即是否死亡，如果已死亡则加载该玩家的角色
	for i, player in pairs (players) do		
		if (not game.Workspace:FindFirstChild(player.Name)) then
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end

	-- 等待 10 秒再进行下一次重生检查
	wait(10)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetFriendsAsy.documentation: 一个 FriendPages 对象，该对象包含指定玩家所有好友的信息。
返回一个 FriendPages 对象，该对象包含指定玩家所有好友的信息
@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetFriendsAsy.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local USERNAME = "Shedletsky"

local function iterPageItems(pages)
	return coroutine.wrap(function()
		local pagenum = 1
		while true do
			for _, item in ipairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
				coroutine.yield(item, pagenum)
			end
			if pages.IsFinished then
				break
			end
			pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
			pagenum = pagenum + 1
		end
	end)
end

-- 首先获取玩家的用户 ID
local userId = Players:GetUserIdFromNameAsync(USERNAME)
-- 然后获取其 FriendPages 对象
local friendPages = Players:GetFriendsAsync(userId)
-- 遍历该页面中的项目。对于 FriendPages ，表中
-- 为好友的信息，包括有 Username 用户名
-- 收集表中各个用户名
local usernames = {}
for item, pageNo in iterPageItems(friendPages) do
	table.insert(usernames, item.Username)
end
-- 最后进行显示！
print("Friends of " .. USERNAME .. ": " table.concat(usernames, ", "))

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetNameFromUs.documentation: 向 Roblox 网站查询拥有指定 Player.UserId 账户的用户名

local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local part = script.Parent
local function onTouched(part)

	if not player then return end
	print(player.Name .. " pressed me!")
end
part.Touched:Connect(onTouched)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetUserIdFrom.documentation: 使用指定 name 的用户的 Player.UserId
向 Roblox 网站发送一个具有给定用户名的账户 Player.UserId 的查询。
@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetUserIdFrom.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Memoization: 因为这些结果几乎从不变化（甚至根本不变）
-- 因此我们只需要查找缓存表里的 name
-- 如果我们找到了 name, 那么就大功告成了！返回用户 id 即可 (很快)
-- 如果我们没能找到 name (缓存缺失)，就需要查找它 (需要时间)
local cache = {}
function getUserIdFromUsername(name)
	-- 首先检查缓存是否包括 name
	if cache[name] then return cache[name] end
	-- 然后检查该用户是否已经连接到了服务器
	local player = Players:FindFirstChild(name)
	if player then
		cache[name] = player.UserId
		return player.UserId
	end 
	-- 如果其他都失败了，发送一个请求
	local id
	pcall(function ()
		id = Players:GetUserIdFromNameAsync(name)
	end)
	cache[name] = id
	return id
end

print(getUserIdFromUsername("Ozzypig")) --> 269323
print(getUserIdFromUsername("Ozzypig")) --> 269323, 这一个返回要快得多
print(getUserIdFromUsername("Shedletsky")) --> 261

@roblox/globaltype/Players.PlayerMembers.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function grantPremiumBenefits(player)
	-- Grant the player access to Premium-only areas, items, or anything you can imagine!
end

local function playerAdded(player)
	if player.MembershipType == Enum.MembershipType.Premium then
		grantPremiumBenefits(player)
	end
end

local function playerMembershipChanged(player)
	print("Received event PlayerMembershipChanged. New membership = " .. tostring(player.MembershipType))
	if player.MembershipType == Enum.MembershipType.Premium then
		grantPremiumBenefits(player)
	end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded) 
Players.PlayerMembershipChanged:Connect(playerMembershipChanged)

PluginAction 是否会不在 Studio 的快捷窗口中显示。适用于上下文动作。默认为 true

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreatePluginAc.code_sample:
local plugin = plugin or getfenv().PluginManager():CreatePlugin()
plugin.Name = "Plugin"

local function actionTriggered()
	print("Hello world!")
end

local pluginAction = plugin:CreatePluginAction("HelloWorldAction", "Hello World", "Prints a 'Hello world!'", "bxasset://textures/sparkle.png", true)

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreatePluginMe.code_sample:
-- 此编码可以被粘贴至命令栏中，但只能操作 1 次。

local plugin = plugin or getfenv().PluginManager():CreatePlugin()
plugin.Name = "Plugin"
plugin.Parent = workspace

local pluginMenu = plugin:CreatePluginMenu(math.random(), "Test Menu")
pluginMenu.Name = "Test Menu"

pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionA", "A", "rbxasset://textures/loading/robloxTiltRed.png")
pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionB", "B", "rbxasset://textures/loading/robloxTilt.png")

local subMenu = plugin:CreatePluginMenu(math.random(), "C", "rbxasset://textures/explosion.png")
subMenu.Name = "Sub Menu"

subMenu:AddNewAction("ActionD", "D", "rbxasset://textures/whiteCircle.png")
subMenu:AddNewAction("ActionE", "E", "rbxasset://textures/icon_ROBUX.png")

pluginMenu:AddMenu(subMenu)
pluginMenu:AddSeparator()

pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionF", "F", "rbxasset://textures/sparkle.png")

local toggle = Instance.new("BoolValue")
toggle.Name = "TogglePluginMenu"
toggle.Parent = workspace

local function onToggled()
	if toggle.Value then
		toggle.Value = false
		
		local selectedAction = pluginMenu:ShowAsync()
		if selectedAction then
			print("选择动作：", selectedAction.Text, "，使用 ActionId：", selectedAction.ActionId)
		else
			print("用户没有选择任何动作！")
		end
	end
end

toggle.Changed:Connect(onToggled)

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.StartDrag.documentation: 给定参数字典后开始拖拽动作
@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.StartDrag.code_sample:
-- 该脚本需要作为 Studio 插件运行
assert(plugin)

local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(Enum.InitialDockState.Float, true, true, 300, 200)

-- 首先从该控件开始拖拽
local dragSourceWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("Drag Source", widgetInfo)
dragSourceWidget.Title = "拖拽源"

-- TextBox 将会允许用户输入需要拖拽的文本
local textBox = Instance.new("TextBox")
textBox.Parent = dragSourceWidget
textBox.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 32)
textBox.Text = "你好，插件拖拽"

-- 该 TextButton 将会允许用户开始拖拽
local dragButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
dragButton.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,-32)
dragButton.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,32)
dragButton.Text = "编辑以上文本，然后从此开始拖拽"
dragButton.Parent = dragSourceWidget

function onMouseButton1Down()
	local dragData = {
		Sender = "SomeDragSource";
		MimeType = "text/plain";
		Data = textBox.Text;
		MouseIcon = "";
		DragIcon = "";
		HotSpot = Vector2.new(0, 0);
	}
	plugin:StartDrag(dragData)
end

dragButton.MouseButton1Down:connect(onMouseButton1Down)

-- 该控件将会接收释放
local dragTargetWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("Drop Target", widgetInfo)
dragTargetWidget.Title = "释放目标"

-- 该 TextLabel 将会显示释放了什么
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.Text = "在此释放..."
textLabel.Parent = dragTargetWidget

local function onDragDrop(dragData)
	if dragData.MimeType == "text/plain" then
		textLabel.Text = dragData.Data
	else
		textLabel.Text = dragData.MimeType
	end
end

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragDropped:connect(onDragDrop)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragEntered:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragEntered")
end)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragLeft:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragLeft")
end)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragMoved:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragMoved")
end)

-- 该脚本需要作为 Studio 插件运行
assert(plugin)

local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(Enum.InitialDockState.Float, true, true, 300, 200)

-- 首先从该控件开始拖拽
local dragSourceWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("Drag Source", widgetInfo)
dragSourceWidget.Title = "拖拽源"

-- TextBox 将会允许用户输入需要拖拽的文本
local textBox = Instance.new("TextBox")
textBox.Parent = dragSourceWidget
textBox.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 32)
textBox.Text = "你好，插件拖拽"

-- 该 TextButton 将会允许用户开始拖拽
local dragButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
dragButton.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,-32)
dragButton.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,32)
dragButton.Text = "编辑以上文本，然后从此开始拖拽"
dragButton.Parent = dragSourceWidget

function onMouseButton1Down()
	local dragData = {
		Sender = "SomeDragSource";
		MimeType = "text/plain";
		Data = textBox.Text;
		MouseIcon = "";
		DragIcon = "";
		HotSpot = Vector2.new(0, 0);
	}
	plugin:StartDrag(dragData)
end

dragButton.MouseButton1Down:connect(onMouseButton1Down)

-- 该控件将会接收释放
local dragTargetWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("Drop Target", widgetInfo)
dragTargetWidget.Title = "释放目标"

-- 该 TextLabel 将会显示释放了什么
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.Text = "在此释放..."
textLabel.Parent = dragTargetWidget

local function onDragDrop(dragData)
	if dragData.MimeType == "text/plain" then
		textLabel.Text = dragData.Data
	else
		textLabel.Text = dragData.MimeType
	end
end

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragDropped:connect(onDragDrop)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragEntered:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragEntered")
end)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragLeft:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragLeft")
end)

dragTargetWidget.PluginDragMoved:connect(function (dragData)
	print("PluginDragMoved")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/PluginGuiService.documentation: 一种存储于 PluginGui 对象中的服务，将会显示在 Roblox Studio 中。

@roblox/globaltype/PluginManager.ExportP.documentation: 将场景导出到一个 .OBJ 文件里，该文件所保存的路径由用户在文件保存对话中选择（ filePath 参数则被忽略）。

@roblox/globaltype/PluginManager.ExportS.documentation: 将当前的 Selection 导出到一个 .OBJ 文件里，该文件所保存的路径由用户在文件保存对话中选择（ filePath 参数则被忽略）。

@roblox/globaltype/PluginMenu.documentation: A context menu that can be shown in Studio. Displays a list of PluginActions and supports submenus
@roblox/globaltype/PluginMenu.code_sample:
-- 此编码可以被粘贴至命令栏中，但只能操作 1 次。

local plugin = plugin or getfenv().PluginManager():CreatePlugin()
plugin.Name = "Plugin"
plugin.Parent = workspace

local pluginMenu = plugin:CreatePluginMenu(math.random(), "Test Menu")
pluginMenu.Name = "Test Menu"

pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionA", "A", "rbxasset://textures/loading/robloxTiltRed.png")
pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionB", "B", "rbxasset://textures/loading/robloxTilt.png")

local subMenu = plugin:CreatePluginMenu(math.random(), "C", "rbxasset://textures/explosion.png")
subMenu.Name = "Sub Menu"

subMenu:AddNewAction("ActionD", "D", "rbxasset://textures/whiteCircle.png")
subMenu:AddNewAction("ActionE", "E", "rbxasset://textures/icon_ROBUX.png")

pluginMenu:AddMenu(subMenu)
pluginMenu:AddSeparator()

pluginMenu:AddNewAction("ActionF", "F", "rbxasset://textures/sparkle.png")

local toggle = Instance.new("BoolValue")
toggle.Name = "TogglePluginMenu"
toggle.Parent = workspace

local function onToggled()
	if toggle.Value then
		toggle.Value = false
		
		local selectedAction = pluginMenu:ShowAsync()
		if selectedAction then
			print("选择动作：", selectedAction.Text, "，使用 ActionId：", selectedAction.ActionId)
		else
			print("用户没有选择任何动作！")
		end
	end
end

toggle.Changed:Connect(onToggled)

@roblox/globaltype/PluginMenu.AddNewActi.documentation: 必须是能标识出这个 PluginAction 的唯一字符串

创建一个临时动作，该动作不会在 Studio 的自定义快捷窗口中显示。

  • 这个函数创建一个临时动作，该动作不会在 Studio 的自定义快捷窗口中显示。

相关信息还可查阅

  • articles/Intro to Plugins，介绍插件使用和开发的文章
  • PluginAction，一个对象，在 Roblox Studio 中此对象用来表示一个通用的可执行动作，并不直接与 Toolbar 或 Button 关联。
  • Plugin:CreatePluginAction，创建一个 PluginAction
  • PluginMenu.Title，用作子菜单时所显示的文本
  • PluginMenu.Icon，用作子菜单时所显示的图标
  • PluginMenu:AddMenu，将给定的菜单作为分隔符添加进去
  • PluginMenu:AddSeparator，在菜单中的各个物品之间添加分隔符
  • PluginMenu:Clear，清除菜单
  • PluginMenu:ShowAsync，在鼠标光标处显示菜单，只有当一个物品被选中或者菜单被关闭时才会暂停，被选中的动作会启动自身的 Triggered 事件
