@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardController..documentation: 移动的方向。与 A 和 D 键绑定，值必须为 1（右）、 0（直）或 -1（左）。除非对此值持续进行设置，否则会刷新回 0 。
移动的方向。与 W 和 S 键绑定，值必须为整数 1（前进）、 0（无）或 -1（后退）。除非对此值持续进行设置，否则会刷新回 0 。
当滑板控制器的任何输入状态被更新时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardPlatform.documentation: SkateboardPlatform 可用于创建滑板。当角色站上滑板时，他们会一直待在上面，直到按 escape 键。在此之前，角色使用滑板动画，比行走的角色移动得更快。

@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardPlatform.St.documentation: 移动的方向。与 A 和 D 键绑定，值必须为 1（右）、 0（直）或 -1（左）。除非对此值持续进行设置，否则会刷新回 0 。

@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardPlatform.Th.documentation: 移动的方向。与 W 和 S 键绑定，值必须为整数 1（前进）、 0（无）或 -1（后退）。除非对此值持续进行设置，否则会刷新回 0 。

@roblox/globaltype/Sky.SkyboxLf.documentation: 天空左侧表面图片的 URL 链接。

@roblox/globaltype/Sky.SkyboxRt.documentation: 天空右侧表面图片的 URL 链接。

@roblox/globaltype/SlidingBallConstraint.documentation: 一种未完成且当前不可用的约束。
设置 PrismaticConstraint 的平移是否为受驱动的，如果为是的话，则驱动的类型是哪一类。
SlidingBallConstraint 的 Attachment 间的当前偏移值。
设置 SlidingBallConstraint 是否会约束平移的范围。
当 SlidingBallConstraint.LimitsEnabled 设为 true 时，SlidingBallConstraint 的 Constraint.Attachment0 沿 x 轴的最低下限。
SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Velocity 所能应用加速的最大值。
SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Velocity 所能应用力的最大值。
当 SlidingBallConstraint.LimitsEnabled 设为 true 时，SlidingBallConstraint 所连接的 Attachment 在到达 SlidingBallConstraint.UpperLimit 与 SlidingBallConstraint.LowerLimit 所指定范围限度时的弹性程度。限制在 0 和 1 之间。
SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Speed 所能应用力的最大值。
SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它在朝其目标 SlidingBallConstraint.TargetPosition 平移时会尝试保持何种速度。单位为 studs/second（格/秒）。
当 SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，其所将会尝试平移至的目标位置。单位为格。
当 SlidingBallConstraint.LimitsEnabled 设为 true 时，SlidingBallConstraint 的 Constraint.Attachment0 沿 x 轴的最高上限。
SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它所尝试达到的速度。单位为 studs/second（格/秒）。

@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.documentation: A particle emitter with the visual aesthetic of smoke
@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.code_sample:
local function recurseForFire(object)
	-- 检查是否找到一个没有 Smoke 的 Fire 对象
	if object:IsA("Fire") and not object.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Smoke") then
		-- 为这个火焰创造烟雾效果
		local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
		smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
		smoke.Opacity = 0.15
		smoke.RiseVelocity = 4
		smoke.Size = object.Size / 4
		smoke.Parent = object.Parent
	end
	-- 继续搜索 Fire 对象
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recurseForFire(child)
	end
end
recurseForFire(workspace)

recurseForFire(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.RiseVelocity.code_sample:
local function recurseForFire(object)
	-- 检查是否找到一个没有 Smoke 的 Fire 对象
	if object:IsA("Fire") and not object.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Smoke") then
		-- 为这个火焰创造烟雾效果
		local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
		smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
		smoke.Opacity = 0.15
		smoke.RiseVelocity = 4
		smoke.Size = object.Size / 4
		smoke.Parent = object.Parent
	end
	-- 继续搜索 Fire 对象
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recurseForFire(child)
	end
end
recurseForFire(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/Snap.documentation: 将两个部件固定在一起，作用与 Weld 完全相同

@roblox/globaltype/SocialService.documentation: 促进社交功能，这些功能影响着在 Roblox 平台上建立的关系
@roblox/globaltype/SocialService.code_sample:
local SocialService = game:GetService("SocialService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function canSendGameInvite(targetPlayer)
	local res, canSend = pcall(SocialService.CanSendGameInvite, SocialService, targetPlayer)
	return res and canSend
end

local function promptGameInvite(targetPlayer)
	local res, canInvite = pcall(SocialService.PromptGameInvite, SocialService, targetPlayer)
	return res and canInvite
end

local function openGameInvitePrompt(targetPlayer)
	local canInvite = canSendGameInvite(targetPlayer)
	if canInvite then
		local promptOpened = promptGameInvite(targetPlayer)
		return promptOpened
	end
	return false
end

local function invitePromptClosed(senderPlayer, recipientIds)
	-- 处理被发送者邀请的玩家的自定义逻辑
	button.Visible = false
end

local function onActivated()
	openGameInvitePrompt(player)
end

button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
SocialService.GameInvitePromptClosed:Connect(invitePromptClosed)

-- 隐藏按钮直到我们确认玩家可以发送游戏邀请
button.Visible = false
button.Visible = canSendGameInvite(player)
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/SolidModelContentProv.documentation: 一种内部服务，没有可供开发人员使用的功能。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.code_sample:
-- 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
part.Name = "MusicBox"
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.EmitterSize = 5 -- decrease the emitter size (for earlier volume drop off)
sound.Looped = true

-- 创建一个点击检测器
local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(function()
	-- 切换声音正在播放 / 未播放
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")	
		sound:Play()
	else
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")	
		sound:Stop()
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.documentation: 当 Sound 已从 Roblox 服务器加载并准备播放时，此属性将为 true。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.code_sample:
local function loadSound(sound)
	-- 声音是否已加载？
	if not sound.IsLoaded then 
		-- 如果未加载，则等待其加载完成
		sound.Loaded:Wait()
	end
end
loadSound(Workspace.Sound)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.documentation: 此只读属性将在 Sound 未播放时返回 true。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.documentation: This read-only property will return true when the Sound is playing.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.documentation: 设置 Sound 在播放完毕时是否重复播放。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)

	-- 监听新角色
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- 等待头部被添加
		local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

		-- 创建一个声音
		local sound = Instance.new("Sound", head)
		sound.Name = "TestSound"
		sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof
	
		-- 循环声音
		sound.Looped = true
		
		-- 监听循环
		sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print("oof! "..tostring(numOfTimesLooped))
		end)

		-- 播放声音
		sound:Play()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.documentation: 当为 true 时，通过将 Sound 或其父项之一设为 nil 的子项，使 Sound 在从游戏中移除时播放。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.Name = "TestSound"
sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof

-- 将 PlayOnRemove 设为 true
sound.PlayOnRemove = true

wait(3)
-- 销毁声音
sound:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackLoudnes.documentation: 一个介于 0 和 1000 之间的数字，表示 Sound 目前的播放音量。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackLoudnes.code_sample:
-- 应置于 StarterPlayer > StarterPlayerScripts

local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- 等待本地玩家 PlayerGui
local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
local playerGui = LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- 创建一个 ScreenGui
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui", playerGui)

-- 创建一个条的容器
local frame = Instance.new("Frame", screenGui)
frame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0)
frame.Size = UDim2.new(0.3, 0, 0.05, 0)

-- 创建一个条
local bar = Instance.new("Frame", frame)
bar.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
bar.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
bar.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)

-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", screenGui)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound:Play()

-- 定义最大音量
local maxLoudness = 30

-- 制作振幅条动画
while true do
	local amplitude = math.clamp(sound.PlaybackLoudness / maxLoudness, 0, 1)
	bar.Size = UDim2.new(amplitude, 0, 1, 0)
	wait(0.05)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.documentation: 决定一个 Sound 的播放速度，值越高播放的音调和速度就越快。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

sound:Play()
wait(10)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 3 -- 三倍速度
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 0.5 -- 二分之一速度
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 1 -- 默认

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Playing.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

print("playing sound")
sound.Playing = true

wait(10)

print("stopping sound")
sound.Playing = false

wait(5)

sound.Playing = true
local timePosition = sound.TimePosition
print("resumed at time position: "..tostring(timePosition)) -- c. 10 秒

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMaxDista.documentation: 客户端的侦听器与 Sound 的来源之间仍能听到声音的最大距离。只适用于设为 Part 或 Attachment 的子项（3D 声音）

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMinDista.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减（音量减小）的最小距离，以格为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMode.documentation: 当侦听器和声音的父项之间的距离变化时，控制 3D Sound（为 BasePart 或 Attachment 的子项）的音量如何变化。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.documentation: 连接至此 Sound 的 SoundGroup。应用到此声音组的 Volume（音量）和 SoundEffects 将传递至其声音。一个声音无法同时属于多个组。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建新的声音组
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- 创建声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- 改变音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- 返回音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- 添加音效
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.documentation: 此属性是一个 Sound 对象关联的声音文件的内容 ID。在声音上传至 Roblox 后，其内容 ID 可以在声音的 URL 中找到。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.documentation: 以秒为单位的 Sound 长度。如果 Sound 未加载，此值将为 0。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.code_sample:
local function playForDuration(sound, duration)
	if not sound.IsLoaded then
		sound.Loaded:wait()
	end
	local speed = sound.TimeLength / duration
	sound.PlaybackSpeed = speed 
	sound:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.documentation: 以秒为单位显示 Sound 的播放进度。播放前和播放中都可变更来移动 Sound 的播放进度。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

-- 设置声音从 30 秒处开始
sound.TimePosition = 30

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(5)

-- 跳到 100 秒处
sound.TimePosition = 100

wait(5)

-- 跳回开头
sound.TimePosition = 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.documentation: Sound 的音量。可设为 0 至 10 之间的值。默认为 0.5。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2

-- 加大音量
sound.Volume = 2

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(7)

-- 减小音量
sound.Volume = 0.2

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.EmitterSize.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减（音量减小）的最小距离。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.EmitterSize.code_sample:
-- 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
part.Name = "MusicBox"
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.EmitterSize = 5 -- decrease the emitter size (for earlier volume drop off)
sound.Looped = true

-- 创建一个点击检测器
local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(function()
	-- 切换声音正在播放 / 未播放
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")	
		sound:Play()
	else
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")	
		sound:Stop()
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MaxDistance.documentation: 客户端的侦听器与 Sound 的来源之间仍能听到声音的最大距离。只适用于设为 Part 或 Attachment 的子项（3D 声音）
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MaxDistance.code_sample:
-- 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个部件来可视化 MaxDistance（最大距离）
local sphere = Instance.new("Part")
sphere.Name = "MaxDistanceSphere"
sphere.CFrame = part.CFrame
sphere.Anchored = true
sphere.CanCollide = false
sphere.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
sphere.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball
sphere.Transparency = 0.8
sphere.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green")
sphere.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个循环声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.Name = "TestSound"
sound.MaxDistance = 20
sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof
sound.Looped = true

-- 一个改变球体尺寸来反映声音的 MaxDistance 的函数
local function updateSize()
	local distance = sound.MaxDistance
	sphere.Size = Vector3.new(distance * 2, distance * 2, distance * 2)
end

-- 更新球体尺寸
updateSize()
-- 监听 MaxDistance 的任何变更
sound:GetPropertyChangedSignal("MaxDistance"):Connect(updateSize)

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MinDistance.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减的最小距离。实际上相当于发射器的尺寸。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pitch.documentation: 已弃用。设置 Sound 在播放时的音调和速度。整数越大，Sound 的音调就越高，速度也越快。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause.documentation: Sets Sound.Playing to false. This pauses the playback of the Sound if the sound is playing. As Sound.TimePosition is not reset ,when the Sound is resumed it will continue from its previous position.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

if not sound.IsLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

-- listen for events
sound.Played:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Played event")
end)

sound.Paused:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Paused event")
end)

sound.Resumed:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Resumed event")
end)

sound.Stopped:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Stopped event")
end)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

wait(10)

sound:Pause()
print("pause", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- pause false 10

wait(3)

sound:Resume()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 10

wait(3)

sound:Stop()
print("stop", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- stop false 0

wait(3)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play.documentation: Plays the Sound. Sets Sound.TimePosition to the last value set by a Script (or 0 if it has not been set), and then sets Sound.Playing to true.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

if not sound.IsLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

-- listen for events
sound.Played:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Played event")
end)

sound.Paused:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Paused event")
end)

sound.Resumed:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Resumed event")
end)

sound.Stopped:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Stopped event")
end)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

wait(10)

sound:Pause()
print("pause", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- pause false 10

wait(3)

sound:Resume()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 10

wait(3)

sound:Stop()
print("stop", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- stop false 0

wait(3)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume.documentation: 继续播放 Sound。将 Sound.Playing 设为 true。不会变更 Sound.TimePosition，因此无法继续播放被 Sound:Pause 暂停的声音。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

if not sound.IsLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

-- listen for events
sound.Played:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Played event")
end)

sound.Paused:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Paused event")
end)

sound.Resumed:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Resumed event")
end)

sound.Stopped:Connect(function(soundId)
	print("Sound.Stopped event")
end)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

wait(10)

sound:Pause()
print("pause", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- pause false 10

wait(3)

sound:Resume()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 10

wait(3)

sound:Stop()
print("stop", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- stop false 0

wait(3)

sound:Play()
print("play", sound.Playing, sound.TimePosition) -- play true 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.documentation: 当 Sound 循环时触发。返回 soundId 和 numOfTimesLooped，分别表示声音的 contentID 和已循环的次数。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.code_sample:
local function loopNTimes(sound, numberOfLoops)
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		sound.Looped = true
		local connection = nil
		connection = sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print(numOfTimesLooped)
			if numOfTimesLooped >= numberOfLoops then
				-- 断开连接
				connection:Disconnect()
				-- 停止声音
				sound:Stop()
			end
		end)
		sound:Play()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Ended.documentation: 当 Sound 已播放完毕并停止时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Loaded.code_sample:
local function loadSound(sound)
	-- 声音是否已加载？
	if not sound.IsLoaded then 
		-- 如果未加载，则等待其加载完成
		sound.Loaded:Wait()
	end
end
loadSound(Workspace.Sound)

@roblox/globaltype/SoundEffect.documentation: SoundEffect 是派生所有其他音效的基础类。SoundEffect 可通过设为子项来应用至 Sound 或 SoundGroup。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundEffect.Priority.documentation: 决定效果相对于其他效果的应用顺序。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.documentation: A SoundGroup is used to manage the volume and sound effects on multiple Sounds at once. Sounds in the SoundGroup will have their volume and effects adjusted by the SoundGroup.
@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建新的声音组
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- 创建声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- 改变音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- 返回音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- 添加音效
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.documentation: A service that determines various aspects of how Sounds play in the game.
@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local CollectionService = game:GetService("CollectionService")
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

-- 定义标签
local reverbTags = {
	["reverb_Cave"] = Enum.ReverbType.Cave
}

-- 收集部件，将其根据标签进行组合
local parts = {}
for reverbTag, reverbType in pairs(reverbTags) do
	for _, part in pairs(CollectionService:GetTagged(reverbTag)) do
		parts[part] = reverbType
	end
end

-- 检查特定位置是否处于部件范围内的函数
local function positionInPart(part, position)
	local extents = part.Size / 2
	local offset = part.CFrame:pointToObjectSpace(position)
	return offset.x < extents.x
		and offset.y < extents.y
		and offset.z < extents.z
end

local reverbType = SoundService.AmbientReverb

while true do 
	wait()
	if not localPlayer then
		return
	end

	local character = localPlayer.Character

	-- 默认设置为无混响
	local newReverbType = Enum.ReverbType.NoReverb

	if character and character.PrimaryPart then
		local position = character.PrimaryPart.Position

		-- 遍历所有索引部件
		for part, type in pairs(parts) do
			-- 查看角色是否在部件范围内
			if positionInPart(part, position) then
				-- 如是则选择该混响类型
				newReverbType = type
				break
			end
		end
	end

	-- 如果混响类型改变，则对其进行设置
	if newReverbType ~= reverbType then
		SoundService.AmbientReverb = newReverbType
		reverbType = newReverbType
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.AmbientR.documentation: SoundService 所使用的环境音效预设。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.Distance.documentation: 当进行 3D Sound 音量衰减计算时被 SoundService 设为 1 米距离的格数。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.DopplerS.documentation: 该属性决定了 3D Sound 的声调因多普勒效应而发生改变的程度。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RespectF.documentation: 设置客户端的 Sound 播放是否复制至服务器。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RolloffS.documentation: 设置 3D Sound 的音量衰减速度，也可以称为其 “roll off”（滚落）速度。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.GetListe.documentation: 当前 Enum.ListenerType 及侦听器的设置对象。根据 Enum.ListenerType 的不同，侦听器可能是 BasePart、DataType.CFrame 或 nil。
GetListener 将会返回 SoundService 当前的侦听器类型及被设为侦听器的对象。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.PlayLoca.documentation: 在本地播放一个 Sound，也就是说声音只会被调用此函数的客户端听到，无论其子项为何。
@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.PlayLoca.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建自定义插件按钮
local toolbar = plugin:CreateToolbar("Empty Script Adder")
local newScriptButton = toolbar:CreateButton("Add Script", "Create an empty Script", "rbxassetid://1507949215")

local function playLocalSound(soundId)
	-- 创建音效
	local sound = Instance.new("Sound")
	sound.SoundId = soundId
	-- 在本地播放音效
	SoundService:PlayLocalSound(sound)
	-- 音效播放完毕后将其进行销毁
	sound.Ended:Wait()
	sound:Destroy()
end

local function onNewScriptButtonClicked()
	-- 创建新的空白脚本
	local newScript = Instance.new("Script")
	newScript.Source = ""
	newScript.Parent = game:GetService("ServerScriptService")
	-- 调用函数播放本地音效
	playLocalSound("")  -- 在此处插入音效资源 ID
end

-- 连接插件按钮至动作函数
newScriptButton.Click:Connect(onNewScriptButtonClicked)

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.SetListe.documentation: 取决于 Enum.ListenerType。'ObjectPosition' 或 'ObjectCFrame' 时为 BasePart，'CFrame' 时为 DataType.CFrame，'Camera' 时为 nil。

@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.documentation: A particle emitter with the visual aesthetic of sparkles
@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

local function onCharacterSpawned(character)
	local hrp = character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	-- 添加与玩家躯干颜色相同的闪光
	local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
	sparkles.Parent = hrp
	sparkles.SparkleColor = character:WaitForChild("Body Colors").TorsoColor.Color
	sparkles.Enabled = true
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterSpawned)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnerService.documentation: 负责行为或 SpawnLocation 的内部服务。其功能无法由开发者使用。

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.documentation: SpawnLocation, or "spawns" determine where a Player respawns when they die. They can be configured to allow only certain players to use each spawn, using Team. They also control how ForceField are set up for newly-spawned players.
@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.code_sample:
local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")

-- 创建开始队伍 (AutoAssignable = true)
local startTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
startTeam.Name = "Start"
startTeam.AutoAssignable = true
startTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("White")

-- 创建保存点队伍 (Autoassignable = false)，保证所有的 TeamColors 都是唯一的
local team1 = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
team1.Name = "Checkpoint 1"
team1.AutoAssignable = false
team1.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")

local team2 = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
team2.Name = "Checkpoint 2"
team2.AutoAssignable = false
team2.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")

local team3 = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
team3.Name = "Checkpoint 2"
team3.AutoAssignable = false
team3.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")

-- 创建重生点
local startSpawn = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
startSpawn.Anchored = true
startSpawn.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
startSpawn.Neutral = false
startSpawn.AllowTeamChangeOnTouch = false
startSpawn.TeamColor = startTeam.TeamColor
startSpawn.BrickColor = startTeam.TeamColor

local team1Spawn = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
team1Spawn.Anchored = true
team1Spawn.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
team1Spawn.Neutral = false
team1Spawn.AllowTeamChangeOnTouch = true
team1Spawn.TeamColor = team1.TeamColor
team1Spawn.BrickColor = team1.TeamColor

local team2Spawn = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
team2Spawn.Anchored = true
team2Spawn.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
team2Spawn.Neutral = false
team2Spawn.AllowTeamChangeOnTouch = true
team2Spawn.TeamColor = team2.TeamColor
team2Spawn.BrickColor = team2.TeamColor

local team3Spawn = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
team3Spawn.Anchored = true
team3Spawn.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
team3Spawn.Neutral = false
team3Spawn.AllowTeamChangeOnTouch = true
team3Spawn.TeamColor = team3.TeamColor
team3Spawn.BrickColor = team3.TeamColor

-- 定位重生点
startSpawn.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, 0.5, 0)
team1Spawn.CFrame = CFrame.new(10, 0.5, 0)
team2Spawn.CFrame = CFrame.new(20, 0.5, 0)
team3Spawn.CFrame = CFrame.new(30, 0.5, 0)

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.documentation: The SpecialMesh is an object that allows developers to provide a standard template or user uploaded mesh to a BasePart.
@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 将部件和网格实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)

-- 用于显示部件范围的选择框
local box = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
box.Adornee = part

-- 将部件作为工作区的子项
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建偏移和缩放的补间动画
local tween = TweenService:Create(
  mesh,
  TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -1, true, 0),
  {Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)}
)

tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.MeshType.documentation: 确定将应用于作为 SpecialMesh 子对象的 BasePart 网格类型。
@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.MeshType.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 对部件和网格进行实例化
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(4, 8, 4)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 4, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.CanCollide = false 

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", part)
mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1086413449"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1461576423"
mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

-- 将部件父项设为 Workspace
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建渐变效果
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out)
local blackTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)})
local redTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)})
local greenTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)})
local blueTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1)})
local resetTween = TweenService:Create(mesh, tweenInfo, {VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)})

-- 开始动画效果
while true do 
	blackTween:Play()
	blackTween.Completed:Wait()
	redTween:Play()
	redTween.Completed:Wait()
	greenTween:Play()
	greenTween.Completed:Wait()
	blueTween:Play()
	blueTween.Completed:Wait()
	resetTween:Play()
	resetTween.Completed:Wait()
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.documentation: 一个发射指定颜色和亮度的照明的光源，该照明从一个指定的面以圆锥形发射。

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Face.documentation: 设置 SpotLight 来自父项的哪一侧。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.code_sample:
local function getSpringForce(spring)
	if not spring:IsA("SpringConstraint") then
		warn(spring .. " is not a spring constraint!")
		return
	end

	local currentLength = spring.CurrentLength
	local freeLength = spring.FreeLength
	if (spring.LimitsEnabled) then
		currentLength = math.clamp(currentLength, spring.MinLength, spring.MaxLength)
		freeLength = math.clamp(freeLength, spring.MinLength, spring.MaxLength)
	end
	local springLength = currentLength - freeLength

	local axis = spring.Attachment0.WorldPosition - spring.Attachment1.WorldPosition
	if axis.Magnitude > 0 then
		axis = axis.Unit
	end
	local effectiveVelocity = spring.Attachment0.Parent.Velocity - spring.Attachment1.Parent.Velocity

	-- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harmonic_oscillator
	-- f = k * x - c * dx/dt + fext
	-- 重力可能不是所有的外力；摩擦可能会影响这一点，但更难解释
	local forceExternal = Vector3.new(0, -workspace.Gravity, 0)
	local force = spring.Stiffness * springLength - spring.Damping * axis:Dot(effectiveVelocity) + axis:Dot(forceExternal)

	force = math.clamp(force, -spring.MaxForce, spring.MaxForce)
	return force
end

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Coil.documentation: 在 SpringConstraint 上可视的线圈数。该值只能设置为 0 到 8 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Damp.documentation: SpringConstraint 的阻尼常数。乘以约束 Attachment（附件）的速度来减少施加的弹簧力。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Limi.documentation: 设置 SpringConstraint 是否限制最小和最大长度。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxF.documentation: SpringConstraint 可对其 Attachment（附件）施加的最大的力。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxL.documentation: 如果 SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，SpringConstraint 可以允许的最大分离距离。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MinL.documentation: 如果 SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，SpringConstraint 可以允许的最小分离距离。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Stif.documentation: 弹簧的强度。该值越大，当附件的分离距离与 SpringConstraint.FreeLength 不同时，施加的力越大。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.GetCore.documentation: Returns a variable that has been specified by a Roblox CoreScript

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.documentation: 服务层容器，当玩家生成时其内容将会被复制至每个 Player 的 Backpack。通常用于存放 Tools，但有时也会用于存放 LocalScript，以保证每个玩家都获取一份副本。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.code_sample:
local StarterPack = game:GetService("StarterPack")

local function emptyStarterPack()
	for _, child in pairs(StarterPack:GetChildren()) do
		if child:IsA("Tool") then
			child:Destroy()
		end
	end
end

local player = Players:WaitForChild(playername)

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AllowCu.documentation: 描述当前游戏关于从网站获取的自定义虚拟角色动画的权限级别。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.documentation: 设置使用移动设备的玩家角色是否会在碰到障碍物时自动跳跃。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- 更新按键文本
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- 映射属性至玩家的角色（如果有的话）
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- 切换自动跳跃
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- 更新其余内容
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.CameraM.documentation: 玩家默认镜头的最大拉远距离（以格为单位）。
玩家镜头的默认最大拉近距离（以格为单位）。
将默认镜头模式改变至第一人称或第三人称视角。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.CameraM.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local part = script.Parent
local function onTouched(part)
	local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(part.Parent)
	if not player then return end
	print(player.Name .. " pressed me!")
end
part.Touched:Connect(onTouched)

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.documentation: A container object for a single string.
@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.code_sample:
-- 创建一个 Part 来展示 Changed 事件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Transparency” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Transparency = .5
-- 用 “Number” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- 更改 BrickColor 也会同时更改其他属性
-- 因此此行用“BrickColor”、“Color3” 和 “Color3uint16”
-- 来触发 Changed 事件。
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- 一个存有双精度浮点数值的 NumberValue 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 123.456 来触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vNumber.Value = 123456
-- 并不会触发 Changed 事件
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- 存储着字符串的 StringValue
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Hello” 触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Always Save Sc.documentation: 如果设置为 true，Roblox Studio 会将在单人游戏会话期间所做的脚本更改传输到打开的场景。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Animate Hover.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则将鼠标悬停在 Workspace 中可选择的对象上时，显示的悬停选择框会根据 Studio/Hover Animate Speed 在 Studio/Hover Color 和 Studio/Select Color 之间闪烁。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Background Col.documentation: 指定 Roblox Studio 脚本编辑器的背景颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Shift S.documentation: 设置镜头在按住 Shift 键用方向键移动时的速度（以格/秒为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Speed.documentation: 设置镜头用方向键移动时的速度（以格/秒为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Clear Output O.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则在切换游戏会话时将自动清除输出。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Comment Color.documentation: 指定 Roblox Studio 脚本编辑器的备注颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.DeprecatedObje.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则已弃用的对象会显示在 Advanced Objects（高级对象）窗口和 Object Browser（对象浏览器）中。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Drag Multiple.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则拖动时选择的边界框将用于碰撞检测，而不是检测每个单独的部件。 这会使拖动器执行得更流畅，但精确度明显降低。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Find Selection.documentation: 设置脚本编辑器的查找选中操作（Ctrl+F）中匹配结果的高亮颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Font.documentation: 指定在脚本编辑器中使用的字体。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Animate.documentation: 指定当鼠标光标悬停于 Workspace 中某个被选中的对象时悬停动画的闪烁频率。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Over Col.documentation: 指定悬停选择框使用的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Maximum Output.documentation: 输出中可以显示的最大行数。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.documentation: The Team class represents a faction in a Roblox place. The only valid parent for a Team is in the Teams service.
@roblox/globaltype/Team.code_sample:
local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")

-- 创建两个队伍
local redTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
redTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
redTeam.AutoAssignable = true
redTeam.Name = "Red Team"

local blueTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
blueTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
blueTeam.AutoAssignable = true
blueTeam.Name = "Blue Team"

-- 开始计算每个队伍中玩家的数目
local numberRed, numberBlue = 0, 0

local function playerAdded(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 +1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed + 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue + 1
	end	
end

local function playerRemoved(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 -1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed - 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue - 1
	end	

	-- 检查两队分配是否不平衡
	local bigTeam, smallTeam = nil, nil
	if (numberRed - numberBlue) > 2 then
		bigTeam = redTeam
		smallTeam = blueTeam
	elseif (numberBlue - numberRed) > 2 then 
		bigTeam = blueTeam
		smallTeam = redTeam
	end

	if bigTeam then	
		-- 选择随机玩家
		local playerList = bigTeam:GetPlayers()
		local player = playerList[math.random(1, #playerList)]

		-- 检查玩家是否存在
		if player then
			-- 改变玩家队伍
			player.TeamColor = smallTeam.TeamColor 
			-- 重生该玩家
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end
end

-- 监听玩家的添加/移除
blueTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(blueTeam)
end)

blueTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(blueTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(redTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(redTeam)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoAssignable.documentation: 此属性用来决定加入游戏的 Player（玩家）是否会被自动放置到 Team（队伍）中。如果有多个队伍的此属性都设为 true，那么在 Player 被添加进来时 Roblox 会尝试对这些队伍进行平衡。
@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoAssignable.code_sample:
local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")

-- 创建两个队伍
local redTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
redTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
redTeam.AutoAssignable = true
redTeam.Name = "Red Team"

local blueTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
blueTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
blueTeam.AutoAssignable = true
blueTeam.Name = "Blue Team"

-- 开始计算每个队伍中玩家的数目
local numberRed, numberBlue = 0, 0

local function playerAdded(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 +1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed + 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue + 1
	end	
end

local function playerRemoved(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 -1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed - 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue - 1
	end	

	-- 检查两队分配是否不平衡
	local bigTeam, smallTeam = nil, nil
	if (numberRed - numberBlue) > 2 then
		bigTeam = redTeam
		smallTeam = blueTeam
	elseif (numberBlue - numberRed) > 2 then 
		bigTeam = blueTeam
		smallTeam = redTeam
	end

	if bigTeam then	
		-- 选择随机玩家
		local playerList = bigTeam:GetPlayers()
		local player = playerList[math.random(1, #playerList)]

		-- 检查玩家是否存在
		if player then
			-- 改变玩家队伍
			player.TeamColor = smallTeam.TeamColor 
			-- 重生该玩家
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end
end

-- 监听玩家的添加/移除
blueTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(blueTeam)
end)

blueTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(blueTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(redTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(redTeam)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.documentation: 此属性设置 Team 的颜色、决定团队成员的 Player.TeamColor 属性，还决定了玩家列表和玩家头顶上方显示的颜色。
@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local door = Instance.new("Part")
door.Anchored = true 
door.Size = Vector3.new(7, 10, 1)
door.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
door.Parent = game.Workspace

local debounce = false 

door.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
	if not debounce then
		debounce = true
		if hit then
			local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
			if player and player.TeamColor == BrickColor.new("Bright red") then
				door.Transparency = 0.5
				door.CanCollide = false 
				wait(3)
				door.Transparency = 0
				door.CanCollide = true
			end
		end
		wait(0.5)
		debounce = false
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoColorCharact.documentation: 已被弃用且无法发挥功能，过去主要用于确定队伍中的 Player 角色模型颜色是否被设置为 Team.TeamColor。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.PlayerAdded.code_sample:

-- 创建两个队伍
local redTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
redTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
redTeam.AutoAssignable = true
redTeam.Name = "Red Team"

local blueTeam = Instance.new("Team", Teams)
blueTeam.TeamColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
blueTeam.AutoAssignable = true
blueTeam.Name = "Blue Team"

-- 开始计算每个队伍中玩家的数目
local numberRed, numberBlue = 0, 0

local function playerAdded(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 +1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed + 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue + 1
	end	
end

local function playerRemoved(team)
	-- 队伍玩家数目 -1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed - 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue - 1
	end	

	-- 检查两队分配是否不平衡
	local bigTeam, smallTeam = nil, nil
	if (numberRed - numberBlue) > 2 then
		bigTeam = redTeam
		smallTeam = blueTeam
	elseif (numberBlue - numberRed) > 2 then 
		bigTeam = blueTeam
		smallTeam = redTeam
	end

	if bigTeam then	
		-- 选择随机玩家
		local playerList = bigTeam:GetPlayers()
		local player = playerList[math.random(1, #playerList)]

		-- 检查玩家是否存在
		if player then
			-- 改变玩家队伍
			player.TeamColor = smallTeam.TeamColor 
			-- 重生该玩家
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end
end

-- 监听玩家的添加/移除
blueTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(blueTeam)
end)

blueTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(blueTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(redTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(redTeam)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Team.PlayerRemoved.documentation: 当一名 Player 从一个 Team 中被移除时就会启动，移除原因可能是 Player 离开了游戏、Player.Neutral 被设置为 true 或者 Player 加入了另一个队伍。
@roblox/globaltype/Team.PlayerRemoved.code_sample:
local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")

-- 创建两个队伍

	-- 队伍玩家数目 +1

		numberRed = numberRed + 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then

	end	
end

	-- 队伍玩家数目 -1
	if team == redTeam then
		numberRed = numberRed - 1 
	elseif team == blueTeam then
		numberBlue = numberBlue - 1
	end	

	-- 检查两队分配是否不平衡
	local bigTeam, smallTeam = nil, nil
	if (numberRed - numberBlue) > 2 then
		bigTeam = redTeam
		smallTeam = blueTeam
	elseif (numberBlue - numberRed) > 2 then 
		bigTeam = blueTeam
		smallTeam = redTeam
	end

	if bigTeam then	
		-- 选择随机玩家
		local playerList = bigTeam:GetPlayers()
		local player = playerList[math.random(1, #playerList)]

		-- 检查玩家是否存在
		if player then
			-- 改变玩家队伍
			player.TeamColor = smallTeam.TeamColor 
			-- 重生该玩家
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end
end

-- 监听玩家的添加/移除
blueTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(blueTeam)
end)

blueTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(blueTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	playerAdded(redTeam)
end)

redTeam.PlayerRemoved:Connect(function(player)
	playerRemoved(redTeam)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Teams.RebalanceTeams.documentation: 让每个队的玩家人数保持相等。此函数运行异常，请勿使用。

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportAsyncResult.documentation: The return structure of the TeleportAsync function call

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportAsyncResult.R.documentation: 玩家被传送至的目的地时保留服务器的访问代码

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportOptions.Reser.documentation: 指示传送所属的保留服务器的访问代码

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetAr.documentation: 返回 Players.LocalPlayer 抵达场景后所携带的 customLoadingScreen
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetAr.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local customLoadingScreen = TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui()
if customLoadingScreen then
    local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
    ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()
    customLoadingScreen.Parent = playerGui
    -- 在这里添加界面动画效果
    wait(5)
    -- 销毁界面
    customLoadingScreen:Destroy()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.SetTe.documentation: 在传送开始之前设置好在传送过程中会显示给本地用户的自定义 ScreenGui（传送 GUI）
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.SetTe.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

local placeId = 0 -- replace here
local loadingGui = ReplicatedStorage:FindFirstChild("LoadingGui") -- 替换此处

-- 为这个场景设置该加载 gui 的父项

-- 为目的地场景设置此加载 gui

-- 传送用户

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 传送目的地场景的 ID
待传送的 Player，如果此函数于客户端被调用，则默认值为 Players.LocalPlayer
传递到目的地场景的可选数据。可用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的可选自定义加载界面，可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

local placeId = 0 -- replace here

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 传送目的地场景的 ID
传送目的地服务器实例的 DataMode.JobId
待传送的 Player ，如果此函数是在客户端被调用的，那么它的默认值就是 Players.LocalPlayer
生成点 SpawnLocation 的名称
传递到目的地场景的可选数据。可用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的可选自定义加载界面，可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回
将 Player 传送到与给定 placeId 和 instanceId 相关联的服务器实例中
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	-- 这名玩家是否在跟随其他玩家？
	local followId = player.FollowUserId
	-- 如果是，则找出其位置
	if followId and followId ~= 0 then
		local success, errorMessage, placeId, jobId = pcall(function()
			return TeleportService:GetPlayerPlaceInstanceAsync(followId)
		end)
		if success then
			-- 传送玩家
			TeleportService:TeleportToPlaceInstance(placeId, jobId, player)
		end
	else
		warn("Player " .. player.UserId .. " is not following another player!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 传送目的地的场景 ID
由 TeleportService:ReserveServer 返回的预留服务器访问码
一个里面存有待传送 Player（玩家）的数组
生成点 SpawnLocation 的名称（可选）
传递到目的地场景的数据（可选），可以用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的自定义加载界面（可选），可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回
将多名 Player（玩家）传送到通过 TeleportService:ReserveServer 创建的预留服务器中
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TS = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local DSS = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local DS = DSS:GetGlobalDataStore()
 
-- 获得保存码
local code = DS:GetAsync("ReservedServer")
if type(code) ~= "string" then -- 无保存码时，进行创建
	code = TS:ReserveServer(game.PlaceId)
	DS:SetAsync("ReservedServer",code)
end
 
local function Joined(plr)
	-- 每次他们进行聊天时，我们都要检查
	plr.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
		if msg == "reserved" then -- 这就是我们需要的信号了
			TS:TeleportToPrivateServer(game.PlaceId,code,{plr})
		end
	end)
end
 
-- 连接至所有当前与未来的玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(Joined)
for k,v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	Joined(v)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 传送目的地场景的 ID
生成点 SpawnLocation 的名称

传递到目的地场景的数据（可选），可以用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回

TeleportService:Teleport 的变体，可使 Player 在目的地中指定名称的 SpawnLocation 处生成

local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	-- 这名玩家是否在跟随其他玩家？
	local followId = player.FollowUserId
	-- 如果是，则找出其位置
	if followId and followId ~= 0 then
		local success, errorMessage, placeId, jobId = pcall(function()
			return TeleportService:GetPlayerPlaceInstanceAsync(followId)
		end)
		if success then
			-- 传送玩家
			TeleportService:TeleportToPlaceInstance(placeId, jobId, player)
		end
	else
		warn("Player " .. player.UserId .. " is not following another player!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Reser.documentation: 为预留服务器创建目的的场景 DataModel.PlaceId
TeleportService:TeleportToPrivateServer 所需要的服务器访问码和预留服务器的 DataModel.PrivateServerId
返回一个用来将玩家传送到某个预留服务器的访问码，同时还返回该预留服务器的 DataModel.PrivateServerId
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Reser.code_sample:
local TS = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local code = TS:ReserveServer(game.PlaceId) -- 返回一个码值

TS:TeleportToPrivateServer(game.PlaceId,code,players) -- 实际传送玩家
-- 开发者可以给此函数添加额外参数：spawnName、teleportData 和 customLoadingScreen

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 玩家应该被转送至的 placeId （场景 ID ）
一个数组，里面含有待传送的玩家
包含对 TeleportAsync （传送异步）调用的可选实参的实例
TeleportAsyncResult （传送异步结果）实例，提供有关该次传送的信息
此功能在跨服务器传送玩家或玩家群组时可谓包罗万象
传送目的地场景的 ID
一个数组，里面含有待传送的 Player（玩家）
传递到目的地场景的数据（可选），可以用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的自定义加载界面（可选），可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回
Player（玩家）被传送到的服务器实例的 DataModel.JobId
将一组 Player（玩家）传送到拥有给定 DataModel.PlaceId 场景里的同一个服务器中，返回目的地服务器实例的 DataModel.JobId 。
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")

local placeId = 0 -- 替换此处
local playerList = Players:GetPlayers()

local success, result = pcall(function()
    return TeleportService:TeleportPartyAsync(placeId, playerList)
end)

if success then
    local jobId = result
    print("Players teleported to "..jobId)
else
    warn(result)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Local.documentation: 当 Players.LocalPlayer 在传送之后进入场景时触发。提供该 Player 的 teleportData 和 customLoadingScreen

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: 当传送失败导致玩家留在当前服务器时触发
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

local function localTeleportWithRetry(placeId, retryTime)
    local connection
    connection = TeleportService.TeleportInitFailed:Connect(function(player, teleportResult, errorMessage)
        if player == localPlayer then
            print("Teleport failed, TeleportResult: "..teleportResult.Name)
            -- 查看 teleportResult ，确保可以进行重试
            if teleportResult == Enum.TeleportResult.Failiure or teleportResult == Enum.TeleportResult.Flooded then
                -- 断开连接
                connection:Disconnect()
                -- 在 retryTime 秒之后重试
                delay(retryTime, function()
                    print("Reattempting teleport")
                    TeleportService:Teleport(placeId)
                end)
            end
        end
    end)
    TeleportService:Teleport(placeId)
end

-- 使用示例：
local placeId = 1818 -- Crossroads 的场景 ID
localTeleportWithRetry(placeId, 5)

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.documentation: 地形允许你创建可动态变化的环境

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.MaterialColor.documentation:
MaterialColors 代表了 Material Color（材质颜色）功能的编辑器，并且不能被脚本编辑。

需要获取材质颜色时请使用：Terrain:GetMaterialColor 需要设置材质颜色时请使用：Terrain:SetMaterialColor

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.MaxExtents.documentation: 显示可编辑的最大区域边界。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.WaterReflecta.documentation: 控制 Terrain（地形）水面反射的明晰度。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.WaterTranspar.documentation: 控制 Terrain（地形）水体的透明度。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.WaterWaveSize.documentation: 设置 Terrain（地形）水体波浪的最大高度（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.WaterWaveSpee.documentation: 设置每分钟 Terrain（地形）水体波浪将会上下浮动的次数。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.IsSmooth.documentation: 如果当前游戏正在使用平滑地形系统，返回 true。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.CellCenterToW.documentation: 返回地形单元中心的世界位置 (x, y, z)。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.CellCornerToW.documentation: 返回网格单元左下前角的位置 (x, y, z)。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.CopyRegion.documentation: 将一块地形存储至 TerrainRegion 对象，以便稍后加载。请注意：TerrainRegion 数据不会在服务器和客户端之间复制。
@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.CopyRegion.code_sample:
local terrainRegion = workspace.Terrain:CopyRegion(workspace.Terrain.MaxExtents)
workspace.Terrain:Clear()
wait(5)
workspace.Terrain:PasteRegion(terrainRegion, workspace.Terrain.MaxExtents.Min, true)

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.CountCells.documentation: 返回 Terrain（地形）中非空单元的数目。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillBall.documentation: 在给定空间中填充球体平滑地形。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillBlock/par.documentation: 方形块的尺寸，同时为高度和宽度（以格为单位）

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillBlock.documentation: 使用指定位置、旋转、大小和材质填充一块平滑地形。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillCylinder/.documentation: 地形圆柱的半径（以格为单位）

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillCylinder.documentation: 在给定空间中填充圆柱形平滑地形。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillRegion.documentation: 使用平滑地形填充 Region3 场景。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillWedge/par.documentation: 要填充的楔形的位置和朝向

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.FillWedge.documentation: 根据给定的 enum.Material 及区域的 CFrame 和 Size（尺寸）填充楔形地形体积。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.GetMaterialCo.documentation: 返回给定地形材质的当前地形材质颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.PasteRegion.documentation: 将一块地形应用至 Terrain（地形）对象。请注意：TerrainRegion 数据不会在服务器和客户端之间复制。
@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.PasteRegion.code_sample:
local terrainRegion = workspace.Terrain:CopyRegion(workspace.Terrain.MaxExtents)
workspace.Terrain:Clear()
wait(5)
local corner = Vector3int16.new(-32000, -32000, -32000)
local pasteEmptyRegion = false
workspace.Terrain:PasteRegion(terrainRegion, corner, pasteEmptyRegion)

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.ReadVoxels/pa.documentation: 要写入的目标区域。必须与体素网格对齐。区域过大时会报错。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.ReadVoxels/re.documentation: 以两个 3D 数组返回原始体素数据。 - materials - 目标区域的 Enum.Material 的 3D 数组。同时包含一个 Size（尺寸）域，等于嵌套的数组的尺寸。 - occupancies - 目标区域的占用数据的 3D 数组。同时包含一个 Size（尺寸）域，等于嵌套的数组的尺寸。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.ReadVoxels.documentation: 以表格式返回指定的平滑地形区域。两个返回数组都会拥有额外的 .Size 属性：一个 Vector3。
@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.ReadVoxels.code_sample:
local function printRegion(terrain, region)
    local materials, occupancies = terrain:ReadVoxels(region, 4)
 
    local size = materials.Size -- 与 occupancies.Size 相同
 
    for x = 1, size.X, 1 do
        for y = 1, size.Y, 1 do
            for z = 1, size.Z, 1 do
                print(("(%2i, %2i, %2i): %.2f %s"):format(x, y, z, occupancies[x][y][z], materials[x][y][z].Name))
            end
        end
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.ConvertToSmoo.documentation: 将旧的地形引擎转换为新的地形引擎。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.GetCell.documentation: 返回最接近且能匹配至给定平滑地形体素的旧版地形引擎 CellMaterial。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.GetWaterCell.documentation: 返回该单元是否为水地形单元。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.SetCell.documentation: 设置给定地形体素的占用与材质。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.SetCells.documentation: 设置给定区域内所有地形体素的占用与材质。

@roblox/globaltype/Terrain.SetWaterCell.documentation: 将给定地形体素的材质设为 “Water”（水），并将其占用设为 1。

@roblox/globaltype/TerrainRegion.IsSmoot.documentation: 该属性的状态显示此 TerrainRegion 是否包含平滑地形。

@roblox/globaltype/TerrainRegion.Convert.documentation: 变换 TerrainRegion，使其可用于平滑地形。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.documentation: Roblox 使用的服务，用来对引擎进行可控性测试。 在有限程度上可以供开发者使用。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.AutoRuns.documentation: 设为 true 时，当 TestService 的 TestService:Run 方法被调用时游戏将会开始运行。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.ErrorCoun.documentation: 计量该次测试中记录的错误数。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.ExecuteWi.documentation: 设为 true 时，当使用 Roblox Studio 的 Run 操作时将会运行 TestService。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Is30FpsTh.documentation: 设置当运行测试时物理引擎是否应当被限制在 30 FPS。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.IsPhysics.documentation: 设置在运行测试时是否应当对物理环境进行限流。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.IsSleepAl.documentation: 设置在测试模拟运行时是否允许物理对象进入睡眠状态。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.NumberOfP.documentation: 此测试中预期的玩家数量（如果有）。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.SimulateS.documentation: 设置测试模拟中玩家所体验额外延迟的具体数值。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.TestCount.documentation: 计量测试会话中记录的测试调用次数。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Timeout.documentation: 允许测试运行的最大时间长度。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.WarnCount.documentation: 计量测试会话中记录的警告调用次数。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Checkpoin.documentation: 以蓝色文本打印 “Test checkpoint: ” 和后接文本至输出。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Done.documentation: 以蓝色文本打印 “Testing Done” 至输出。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Fail.documentation:
指示 TestService 运行时出现的致命错误。

如果由 TestService 内部运行脚本调用，则会在调用错误的行上发起断点。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Message.documentation: 以蓝色文本打印 “Test message: ” 和后接文本至输出。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Require.documentation: 打印条件是否为 true 和描述文本。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Warn.documentation: 如果条件分支为 true 则打印，否则打印警告。

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.ServerCol.documentation: 在服务器应收集条件测试结果时触发。
在服务器应收集测试结果时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.documentation: A 2D user interface element that displays player-editable text
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.code_sample:
-- 将此代码放入 LocalScript 的 TextBox 中
local textBox = script.Parent

local secretWord = "roblox"
local colorNormal = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) -- 白色
local colorWrong = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
local colorCorrect = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) -- 绿色

-- 对 TextBox 状态进行初始化
textBox.ClearTextOnFocus = true
textBox.Text = ""
textBox.Font = Enum.Font.Code
textBox.PlaceholderText = "密码是什么？"
textBox.BackgroundColor3 = colorNormal

local function onFocused()
	textBox.BackgroundColor3 = colorNormal
end

local function onFocusLost(enterPressed, inputObject)
	if enterPressed then
		local guess = textBox.Text
		if guess == secretWord then
			textBox.Text = "可以通行"
			textBox.BackgroundColor3 = colorCorrect
		else
			textBox.Text = "不得通行"
			textBox.BackgroundColor3 = colorWrong
		end
	else
		-- 玩家停止编辑，没有按下 Enter 键
		textBox.Text = ""
		textBox.BackgroundColor3 = colorNormal
	end
end

textBox.FocusLost:Connect(onFocusLost)
textBox.Focused:Connect(onFocused)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.ClearTextOnFo.documentation: 决定单击 TextBox 时是否会清空其 TextBox.Text 属性

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.documentation: 决定文本光标的偏移值（以字节为单位），当无光标时显示 -1。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function showSelection()
	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("无选中内容")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("选中内容为： \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")
	end
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):connect(showSelection)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Font.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

while true do
	-- 迭代所有的不同字体
	for i, font in pairs(Enum.Font:GetEnumItems()) do
		textLabel.Font = font
		textLabel.Text = font.Name
		wait(1)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.LineHeight.documentation: 缩放 TextBox 文本行之间的间距

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.MultiLine.documentation: 当设为 true 时，TextBox 内的文本可以分行显示。同时也将允许玩家使用 Enter 键另起一行。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.PlaceholderCo.documentation: 设置 TextBox 中尚未输入文本时所使用的文本颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.PlaceholderTe.documentation: 设置 TextBox 中尚未输入文本时显示的文本。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.RichText.documentation: 决定 TextBox 是否使用富文本格式渲染 TextBox.Text 字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.SelectionStar.documentation: 确定选择文本的起始位置。如果没有选择文本，则为 -1
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.SelectionStar.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function showSelection()
	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("无选中内容")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("选中内容为： \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):connect(showSelection)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.ShowNativeInp.documentation: 设为 true 时，将会使用平台的自带输入方式，而非 Roblox 的内置键盘。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Text.documentation: 决定由 UI 元素渲染的字符串。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Text.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

local content = {
	"欢迎来到我的游戏！";
	"请尽情游玩！";
	"欢迎你的意见和建议！";
	"希望大家和睦相处！";
	"请不要骚扰其他玩家！";
	"有空就去商店看看吧！";
	"提示：可别被打败了！";
}

local function fadeOut()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 1, .1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local function fadeIn()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 0, -.1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local lastIndex
while true do
	-- 第 0 步：在进行任何操作前逐渐淡出 
	fadeOut()
	
	-- 第 1 步：选择上次没有显示的内容
	local index	
	repeat
		index = math.random(1, #content)
	until lastIndex ~= index
	-- 确保下次不会显示同样的内容
	lastIndex = index
	
	-- 第 2 步：显示内容
	textLabel.Text = content[index]
	fadeIn()
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextBounds.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

-- TextBox 的最小尺寸
local minWidth, minHeight = 10, 10

-- 设置对齐方式，以确保输入时文本不会歪曲
textBox.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
textBox.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top

local function updateSize()
	textBox.Size = UDim2.new(
		0, math.max(minWidth, textBox.TextBounds.X),
		0, math.max(minHeight, textBox.TextBounds.Y)
	)
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("TextBounds"):Connect(updateSize)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextColor3.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function hasVowels(str)
	return str:lower():find("[aeiou]")
end

local function onTextChanged()
	local text = textBox.Text
	-- 查找元音
	if hasVowels(text) then
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
	else
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
	end
end
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Text"):Connect(onTextChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextFits.documentation: 文本内容尺寸是否能放入 TextBox 约束内。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextScaled.documentation: 更改文本是否会按照对其进行渲染的 GUI 对象尺寸调整大小。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextScaled.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 此文本换行演示在 200x50 px 长方形中演示效果最佳  
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)

-- 将会拼出的内容
local content = "Here's a long string of words that will " ..
                "eventually exceed the UI element's width " ..
                "and form line breaks. Useful for paragraphs " ..
                "that are really long."

-- 将会按每次两个字符的速度逐渐拼出文本的函数
local function spellTheText()
	-- 从 1 开始到“内容长度”为止进行迭代
	for i = 1, content:len() do
		-- 获取内容的子字符串： 1 至 i
		textLabel.Text = content:sub(1, i)
		-- 如果文本超出文本框范围，则变更文本颜色
		if textLabel.TextFits then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
		end		
		-- 在偶数长度时稍微等一小会儿
		if i % 2 == 0 then wait() end
	end
end

while true do
	-- 关闭 TextScaled 和 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = false
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = true
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextScaled，拼写文本
	-- 注意：如果文本需要通过缩小来放入 UI 元素中，
	-- 则文本将会变为红色（TextFits = false）。 
	textLabel.TextScaled = true
	-- 注意：当 TextScaled = true 时意味着 TextWrapped 也将启用
	--textLabel.TextWrapped = true 
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.documentation: 确定文本行的高度，以像素为单位。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

textLabel.Text = "Kaboom!"

while true do
	for size = 5, 100, 5 do
		textLabel.TextSize = size
		textLabel.TextTransparency = size / 100
		wait()
	end
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextStrokeCol.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 高亮部分的闪烁频率
local freq = 2

-- 设置为黄色高亮颜色
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin 震荡的范围是 -1 到 1 ，所以我们将范围改为 0 到 1：
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

	-- 注意：如果文本需要通过缩小来放入 UI 元素中，

	--textLabel.TextWrapped = true 
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
end

-- 对按钮状态进行初始化

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.LineHeight.documentation: 缩放 TextButton 中文本行之间的间距

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.RichText.documentation: 决定 TextButton 是否使用富文本格式渲染 TextButton.Text 字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.Text.documentation: 决定由 UI 元素渲染的字符串。
@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.Text.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

local content = {
	"欢迎来到我的游戏！";
	"请尽情游玩！";
	"欢迎你的意见和建议！";
	"希望大家和睦相处！";
	"请不要骚扰其他玩家！";
	"有空就去商店看看吧！";
	"提示：可别被打败了！";
}

local function fadeOut()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 1, .1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local function fadeIn()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 0, -.1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local lastIndex
while true do
	-- 第 0 步：在进行任何操作前逐渐淡出 
	fadeOut()
	
	-- 第 1 步：选择上次没有显示的内容
	local index	
	repeat
		index = math.random(1, #content)
	until lastIndex ~= index
	-- 确保下次不会显示同样的内容
	lastIndex = index
	
	-- 第 2 步：显示内容
	textLabel.Text = content[index]
	fadeIn()
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextBounds.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

-- TextBox 的最小尺寸

	)

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextColor3.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function hasVowels(str)
	return str:lower():find("[aeiou]")
end

local function onTextChanged()
	local text = textBox.Text
	-- 查找元音
	if hasVowels(text) then
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
	else
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
	end
end
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Text"):Connect(onTextChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextFits.documentation: 一个布尔值，代表着 TextButton 的文本是否能放入其中。

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextScaled.documentation: 更改文本是否需要调整大小以便放进 TextButton 中。
@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextScaled.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 此文本换行演示在 200x50 px 长方形中演示效果最佳  
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)

-- 将会拼出的内容
local content = "Here's a long string of words that will " ..
                "eventually exceed the UI element's width " ..
                "and form line breaks. Useful for paragraphs " ..
                "that are really long."

-- 将会按每次两个字符的速度逐渐拼出文本的函数
local function spellTheText()
	-- 从 1 开始到“内容长度”为止进行迭代
	for i = 1, content:len() do
		-- 获取内容的子字符串： 1 至 i
		textLabel.Text = content:sub(1, i)
		-- 如果文本超出文本框范围，则变更文本颜色
		if textLabel.TextFits then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
		end		
		-- 在偶数长度时稍微等一小会儿
		if i % 2 == 0 then wait() end
	end
end

while true do
	-- 关闭 TextScaled 和 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = false
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = true
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextScaled，拼写文本
	-- 注意：如果文本需要通过缩小来放入 UI 元素中，
	-- 则文本将会变为红色（TextFits = false）。 
	textLabel.TextScaled = true
	-- 注意：当 TextScaled = true 时意味着 TextWrapped 也将启用
	--textLabel.TextWrapped = true 
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextSize.documentation: 决定文本行的高度，以像素为单位。
@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextSize.code_sample:

textLabel.Text = "Kaboom!"

while true do

		textLabel.TextSize = size
		textLabel.TextTransparency = size / 100
		wait()
	end
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.TextStroke.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 高亮部分的闪烁频率
local freq = 2

-- 设置为黄色高亮颜色
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin 震荡的范围是 -1 到 1 ，所以我们将范围改为 0 到 1：
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextFilterResult.GetC.documentation: 为指定的 Player.UserId 返回经过适当过滤的文本。
@roblox/globaltype/TextFilterResult.GetC.code_sample:
-- ===============
-- LocalScript
-- ===============
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
local screen = playerGui:WaitForChild("MessageScreen")
local sendMessageEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("SendPrivateMessage")
 
-- 发送框的 GUI 元素
local sendFrame = screen:WaitForChild("SendFrame")
local recipientField = sendFrame:WaitForChild("Recipient")
local writeMessageField = sendFrame:WaitForChild("Message")
local sendButton = sendFrame:WaitForChild("Send")
 
-- 接受框的 GUI 元素
local receiveFrame = screen:WaitForChild("ReceiveFrame")
local senderField = receiveFrame:WaitForChild("From")
local readMessageField = receiveFrame:WaitForChild("Message")
 
-- 发送按钮点击时调用
local function onSendClicked()
	-- 试着找到收件人。仅在收件人存在的情况下发送消息
	local recipient = Players:FindFirstChild(recipientField.Text)
	local message = writeMessageField.Text
	if recipient and message ~= "" then
		-- 发送消息
		sendMessageEvent:FireServer(recipient, message)
		-- 清空发送框
		recipientField.Text = ""
		writeMessageField.Text = ""
	end	
end
 
-- 当发送消息事件触发时调用，表示此客户端收到消息
local function onReceiveMessage(sender, message)
	-- 使用发送人和消息填充接收框的字段
	senderField.Text = sender.Name
	readMessageField.Text = message
end
 
-- 绑定事件函数
sendButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(onSendClicked)
sendMessageEvent.OnClientEvent:Connect(onReceiveMessage)

-- ===============
-- Server Script
-- ===============
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local TextService = game:GetService("TextService")
 
local sendMessageEvent = ReplicatedStorage.SendPrivateMessage
 
local function getTextObject(message, fromPlayerId)
	local textObject
	local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
		textObject = TextService:FilterStringAsync(message, fromPlayerId)
	end)
	if success then
		return textObject
	end
	return false
end
 
local function getFilteredMessage(textObject, toPlayerId)
	local filteredMessage
	local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
		filteredMessage = textObject:GetChatForUserAsync(toPlayerId)
	end)
	if success then
		return filteredMessage
	end
	return false
end
 
-- 客户端发送消息时调用
local function onSendMessage(sender, recipient, message)
	if message ~= "" then
		-- 过滤传入邮件并发送过滤后的邮件
		local messageObject = getTextObject(message, sender.UserId)
 
		if messageObject then
			local filteredMessage = getFilteredMessage(messageObject, recipient.UserId)
			sendMessageEvent:FireClient(recipient, sender, message)
		end
	end
end
 
sendMessageEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onSendMessage)

@roblox/globaltype/TextFilterResult.GetN.documentation: 为所有用户返回经过适当过滤的文本。
适当过滤后为指定 Player.UserId 返回文本。这应该在其他用户可以看到的非聊天文本中使用，例如宠物的名字。

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.documentation: A 2D user interface element that displays non-interactive text
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.code_sample:
-- 将此代码放入 TextLabel 或 TextButton 的 LocalScript 中
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 通过 TextColor3 使用的一些颜色
local colorNormal = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
local colorSoon = Color3.new(1, .5, .5) -- 红色
local colorDone = Color3.new(.5, 1, .5) -- 绿色

-- 无限循环
while true do
	-- 从 10 至 1 进行倒数
	for i = 10, 1, -1 do
		-- 设置文本
		textLabel.Text = "倒计时： " .. i
		-- 根据倒数剩余时间设置颜色
		if i > 3 then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorNormal
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorSoon
		end
		wait(1)
	end
	textLabel.Text = "出发！"
	textLabel.TextColor3 = colorDone
	wait(2)
end

local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 此文本换行演示在 200x50 px 长方形中演示效果最佳  
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)

-- 将会拼出的内容
local content = "Here's a long string of words that will " ..
                "eventually exceed the UI element's width " ..
                "and form line breaks. Useful for paragraphs " ..
                "that are really long."

-- 将会按每次两个字符的速度逐渐拼出文本的函数
local function spellTheText()
	-- 从 1 开始到“内容长度”为止进行迭代
	for i = 1, content:len() do
		-- 获取内容的子字符串： 1 至 i
		textLabel.Text = content:sub(1, i)
		-- 如果文本超出文本框范围，则变更文本颜色
		if textLabel.TextFits then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
		end		
		-- 在偶数长度时稍微等一小会儿
		if i % 2 == 0 then wait() end
	end
end

while true do
	-- 关闭 TextScaled 和 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = false
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextWrapped，拼写文本
	textLabel.TextWrapped = true
	textLabel.TextScaled = false
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
	-- 开启 TextScaled，拼写文本
	-- 注意：如果文本需要通过缩小来放入 UI 元素中，
	-- 则文本将会变为红色（TextFits = false）。 
	textLabel.TextScaled = true
	-- 注意：当 TextScaled = true 时意味着 TextWrapped 也将启用
	--textLabel.TextWrapped = true 
	spellTheText()
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextStrokeC.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 高亮部分的闪烁频率
local freq = 2

-- 设置为黄色高亮颜色
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin 震荡的范围是 -1 到 1 ，所以我们将范围改为 0 到 1：
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextTranspa.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

local content = {
	"欢迎来到我的游戏！";
	"请尽情游玩！";
	"欢迎你的意见和建议！";
	"希望大家和睦相处！";
	"请不要骚扰其他玩家！";
	"有空就去商店看看吧！";
	"提示：可别被打败了！";
}

local function fadeOut()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 1, .1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local function fadeIn()
	for i = textLabel.TextTransparency, 0, -.1 do
		wait(.1)
		textLabel.TextTransparency = i
	end
end

local lastIndex
while true do
	-- 第 0 步：在进行任何操作前逐渐淡出 
	fadeOut()
	
	-- 第 1 步：选择上次没有显示的内容
	local index	
	repeat
		index = math.random(1, #content)
	until lastIndex ~= index
	-- 确保下次不会显示同样的内容
	lastIndex = index
	
	-- 第 2 步：显示内容
	textLabel.Text = content[index]
	fadeIn()
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextXAlignm.documentation: 确定渲染文本的水平对齐方式。
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextXAlignm.code_sample:
-- 将此代码粘贴至 TextLabel/TextButton/TextBox 的 LocalScript 中
local textLabel = script.Parent

local function setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
	textLabel.TextXAlignment = xAlign
	textLabel.TextYAlignment = yAlign
	textLabel.Text = xAlign.Name .. " + " .. yAlign.Name
end

while true do
	-- 对 TextXAlignment 和 TextYAlignment 枚举项进行迭代
	for j, yAlign in pairs(Enum.TextYAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
		for i, xAlign in pairs(Enum.TextXAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
			setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
			wait(1)
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextService.documentation: TextService 是内部负责处理游戏中文本显示的服务。
@roblox/globaltype/TextService.code_sample:
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local TextService = game:GetService("TextService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- 定义用于与客户端通信的远程事件/函数
local Remotes = Instance.new("Folder", ReplicatedStorage)
Remotes.Name = "PetNamingRemotes"


local UserNamedPet = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", Remotes)
UserNamedPet.Name = "UserNamedPet"
--[[
	RemoteEvent UserNamedPet

	参数：petName （字符串）

	当用户为宠物选择了名字时，由客户端触发。

	示例：

	local userNamedPet = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("PetNamingRemotes"):WaitForChild("UserNamedPet")
	userNamedPet:FireServer("Max")
]]

local SendPetName = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", Remotes)
SendPetName.Name = "SendPetName"
--[[
	RemoteEvent SendPetName

	参数：userId （整数）、petName （字符串）

	当用户更改其宠物的名称时由服务器触发

	示例：

	local sendPetName = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("PetNamingRemotes"):WaitForChild("SendPetName")
	sendPetName.OnClientEvent:Connect(function(userId, petName)
		local player = Players:GetPlayerByUserId(userId)
		if player then
			print(player.Name.." has named their pet ".. petName)
		end	
	end)
]]

local RequestAllPetNames = Instance.new("RemoteFunction", Remotes)
RequestAllPetNames.Name = "RequestAllPetNames"
--[[
	RemoteEvent SendPetName

	参数：无

	获取每个玩家宠物的名字。当用户加入游戏时由客户端调用。

	示例：

	local requestAllPetNames = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("PetNamingRemotes"):WaitForChild("RequestAllPetNames")
	local petNames = requestAllPetNames:InvokeServer()
	for userId, petName in pairs(petNames or {}) do
		local player = Players:GetPlayerByUserId(userId)
		if player then
			print(player.Name.." has a pet named ".. petName)
		end	
	end

]]

local filterResults = {}

local function broadcastPetName(userId)
	local filterResult = filterResults[userId]
	if filterResult then
		for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do 
			if player then

				-- 生成新线程，以便不会暂停更新
				spawn(function()

					-- 为此用户抓取过滤的字符串
					local toUserId = player.UserId
					local filteredString = filterResult:GetNonChatStringForUserAsync(toUserId)
					filteredString = filteredString or ""
					-- 发送远程事件
					SendPetName:FireClient(player, userId, filteredString)
				end)
			end
		end
	end
end

UserNamedPet.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(player, petName)
	local fromUserId = player.UserId

	-- pcall 以拦截错误
	local success, result = pcall(function()
		return TextService:FilterStringAsync(
			petName, 
			fromUserId
		)
	end)

	if success then
		filterResults[fromUserId] = result
		broadcastPetName(fromUserId)
	else
		print("Could not filter pet name")
	end
end)

RequestAllPetNames.OnServerInvoke = (function(player)
	local toUserId = player.UserId

	local petNames = {}

	-- 检查过滤结果，过滤要发送的宠物名字
	for fromUserId, filterResult in pairs(filterResults) do
		local filteredString = filterResult:GetNonChatStringForUserAsync(toUserId)
		filteredString = filteredString or ""

		-- 需要将 userId 转换为字符串，这样它就不能通过远程函数发送
		petNames[tostring(fromUserId)] = filteredString
	end

	return petNames
end)

-- 监听是否有玩家被移除，并清理旧的过滤结果
Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(function(oldPlayer)
	local userId = oldPlayer.UserId
	filterResults[userId] = nil
end)

@roblox/globaltype/TextService.GetTextSi.documentation: 要使用的文字对象的 TextLabel.AbsoluteSize。计算文本换行时为必须。
具有指定格式的字符串所需的空间大小，以像素为单位。
计算使用指定的格式参数和大小约束时将与文本一起占用的 DataType.Vector2 维度（以像素为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/TextService.GetTextSi.code_sample:
local TextService = game:GetService("TextService")

local function getTextBounds(...)
	local message = "Hello World"
	local size = Vector2.new(1,1)
    local bounds = TextService:GetTextSize(message, 12, "SourceSans", size)
    return bounds + Vector2.new(1, 1)
end

print(getTextBounds())

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.documentation: Texture（纹理）对象可在 BasePart 的面上应用重复的纹理。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.OffsetStudsU.documentation: 决定渲染纹理的水平坐标偏移（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.OffsetStudsV.documentation: 决定渲染纹理的垂直坐标偏移（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.StudsPerTileU.documentation: 设置 Texture 所应用平铺图像的水平尺寸（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.StudsPerTileV.documentation: 设置 Texture 所应用平铺图像的垂直尺寸（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/ThirdPartyUserService.documentation: 一种用于处理第三方相关用户的内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/TimerService.documentation: 负责调度定时事件的内部服务。由 Debris 类使用，开发人员无法访问其功能。

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.documentation: An object, such as a weapon, that can be equipped by a Humanoid
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.code_sample:
local tool = script.Parent
    
    local function explode(point)
    	local e = Instance.new("Explosion")
    	e.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0 -- 使爆炸无伤害 
    	e.Position = point
    	e.Parent = workspace
    end
    
    local function onActivated()
    	-- 获取激活工具的 Humanoid
    	local human = tool.Parent.Humanoid
    	-- 在 Humanoid 当前对准的位置调用爆炸
    	explode(human.TargetPoint) 
    end
    
    tool.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.CanBeDropped.code_sample:
local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "我是猫"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.CanBeDropped = false
tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack

tool.Activated:Connect(function()
	print("喵")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Activate.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "Invisibility Tool"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.Parent = player.Backpack

local invisible = false

function toolActivated()
	if invisible then return end
	invisible = true
	
    for i, bodypart in pairs (character:GetChildren()) do
		if bodypart:IsA("MeshPart") or bodypart:IsA("Part") then
			bodypart.Transparency = 1
		end
	end

	wait(3)
	tool:Deactivate()
	wait(1)
	invisible = false
end

function toolDeactivated()
    if not invisible then return end
    for i, bodypart in pairs (character:GetChildren()) do
		if bodypart.Name ~= "HumanoidRootPart" then
			if bodypart:IsA("MeshPart") or bodypart:IsA("Part") then
				bodypart.Transparency = 0
			end
		end
	end
end

tool.Equipped:Connect(function() tool:Activate() end)
tool.Activated:Connect(toolActivated)
tool.Deactivated:Connect(toolDeactivated)
tool.Unequipped:Connect(toolDeactivated)

local tool = script.Parent
 
-- 给 Tool 中的 Handle 一个随机 BrickColor
