	tool.Handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
end
 
-- 按下任意键时停用工具
local function keyPressed(actionName, actionInputState, actionInputObject)	
	if actionInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then
		tool:Deactivate()
	end
end
 
tool.Deactivated:Connect(toolDeactivated)
ContextActionService:BindAction("deactivateTool", keyPressed, true, "x")

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Activated.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
local humanoid = character.Humanoid

-- 生成一个新工具和握柄，并置于玩家的 Backpack 中
local function makeTool()
	-- 创建工具
	local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
	tool.Parent = player:WaitForChild("Backpack")

	-- 创建工具的握柄
	local handle = Instance.new("Part")
	handle.Name = "Handle"
	handle.Parent = tool
	handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
	
	-- 启用并装备工具
	tool.Enabled = true
	humanoid:EquipTool(tool)

	-- 处理工具使用
	tool.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
end

-- 在 *pos* 世界位置创建一个新的随机颜色部件
local function spawnPart(pos)
	local part = Instance.new("Part")
	part.Anchored = true
	part.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)
	part.Position = pos
	part.Parent = game.Workspace
	part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
end

-- 当工具激活时在 TargetPoint 生成一个新部件
function onActivated()
	spawnPart(humanoid.TargetPoint)
end

-- 当 LocalScript 第一次执行时生成一个新工具
makeTool()

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Deactivated.code_sample:
-- ========================================
-- 全局变量
-- ========================================
local power = 30
wait() 
local tool = nil

local bpos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") 
local gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") 

local fly = false 

local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer 

local character = player.Character
if not character or not character.Parent then
    character = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
end

local char = character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if not char then char = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") end

local mouse = game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse()
-- ========================================
-- ========================================


-- ========================================
-- 设置函数
-- ========================================

-- 创建一个新工具并放到本地玩家的背包里
-- 将此脚本设为工具的子项，脚本控制飞行
local function setupTool()
	tool = Instance.new("Tool")
	tool.Name = "Fly"
	tool.RequiresHandle = false
	tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack
	
	gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge,math.huge,math.huge) 
	bpos.maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge,math.huge,math.huge)
	
	script.Parent = tool
	
	tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack
end

setupTool()
-- ========================================
-- ========================================


-- ========================================
-- 飞行函数
-- ========================================

-- 当玩家使用工具时开始飞行
function onSelected() 	
	bpos.Parent = char 
	bpos.position = char.Position + Vector3.new(0,10,0) 
	gyro.Parent = char 
	
	character.Humanoid.PlatformStand = true 

	for i, v in ipairs(char:GetChildren()) do 
		if v.className == "Motor" then 
			v.MaxVelocity = 0 
			v.CurrentAngle = -1 
			if v.Name == "Left Hip" then 
				v.CurrentAngle = 1 
			end 
		end 
	end
	
	fly = true 
	wait()
	while fly do
		local pos = mouse.Hit.p
		gyro.CFrame = CFrame.new(char.Position,pos) * CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ(-3.14/2,0,0) 
		bpos.Position = char.Position + (pos-char.Position).unit * power 
		wait()
	end 
end 

-- 当玩家停止使用工具时停止飞行
function onDeselected() 
	gyro.Parent = nil 
	fly = false 
 
	character.Humanoid.PlatformStand = false 
	
	for i, v in ipairs(char:GetChildren()) do 
		if v.className == "Motor" then 
			v.MaxVelocity = 1 
		end 
	end

	bpos.Parent = nil 
end 

tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() fly = false end)

tool.Activated:Connect(onSelected) 
tool.Deactivated:Connect(onDeselected)
-- ========================================
-- ========================================

@roblox/globaltype/Trail.documentation: The Trail object is used to create a trail like effect between two points.
@roblox/globaltype/Trail.code_sample:
-- 创建新的 BasePart
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0,5,0)

-- 创建 2 个附件
local attachment0 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment0.Name = "Attachment0"
attachment0.Parent = part
attachment0.Position = Vector3.new(-2,0,0)

local attachment1 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment1.Name = "Attachment1"
attachment1.Parent = part
attachment1.Position = Vector3.new(2,0,0)

-- 创建新的 Trail（轨迹）
local trail = Instance.new("Trail")
trail.Parent = part
trail.Attachment0 = attachment0
trail.Attachment1 = attachment1
color1 = Color3.new(15/255,127/255,254/255)
color2 = Color3.new(255/255,255/255,255/255)
trail.Color = ColorSequence.new(color1, color2)

-- 使用 Tween 移动部件，展示轨迹
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

local dir = 15
while true do
	dir = dir*-1
	local goal = {}
	goal.Position = part.Position + Vector3.new(0,0,dir)
 
	local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
	local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 	tween:Play()

	wait(5)
end

-- 将部件前后移动 15 格的函数

local TweenService = game:getService("TweenService")
function tweenPart(part)
	dir = dir*-1
	local goal = {}
	goal.Position = part.Position + Vector3.new(0,0,dir)
 
	local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
	local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 	tween:Play()

	wait(5)
end

-- 创建新的 BasePart
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0,5,0)

-- 创建 2 个附件
local attachment0 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment0.Name = "Attachment0"
attachment0.Parent = part
attachment0.Position = Vector3.new(-2,0,0)

local attachment1 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment1.Name = "Attachment1"
attachment1.Parent = part
attachment1.Position = Vector3.new(2,0,0)

-- 创建新的 Trail
local trail = Instance.new("Trail")
trail.Parent = part
trail.Attachment0 = attachment0
trail.Attachment1 = attachment1
color1 = Color3.new(15/255,127/255,254/255)
color2 = Color3.new(255/255,255/255,255/255)
trail.Color = ColorSequence.new(color1, color2)

-- 移动部件、清除所有部件分段并切换轨迹的启用/禁用状态
while true do
	tweenPart(part)
	trail:Clear()
	trail.Enabled = not trail.Enabled
end

@roblox/globaltype/Trail.Lifetime.documentation: 轨迹的持续时间（以秒为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/Trail.Lifetime.code_sample:
-- 创建新的 BasePart
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0,5,0)

-- 创建 2 个附件
local attachment0 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment0.Name = "Attachment0"
attachment0.Parent = part
attachment0.Position = Vector3.new(-2,0,0)

local attachment1 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment1.Name = "Attachment1"
attachment1.Parent = part
attachment1.Position = Vector3.new(2,0,0)

-- 创建新的 Trail（轨迹）
local trail = Instance.new("Trail")
trail.Parent = part
trail.Attachment0 = attachment0
trail.Attachment1 = attachment1
trail.Lifetime = 0.4

-- 移动部件，展示轨迹
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

local dir = 15
local life = -5
while true do
	dir = dir*-1

	life = life*-1
	trail.Lifetime = trail.Lifetime + life

	local goal = {}
	goal.Position = part.Position + Vector3.new(0,0,dir)
 
	local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)

@roblox/globaltype/Trail.Clear.code_sample:
-- 将部件前后移动 15 格的函数
local dir = 15
local TweenService = game:getService("TweenService")
function tweenPart(part)
	dir = dir*-1
	local goal = {}
	goal.Position = part.Position + Vector3.new(0,0,dir)
 
	local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
	local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 	tween:Play()

	wait(5)
end

-- 创建新的 BasePart
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0,5,0)

-- 创建 2 个附件
local attachment0 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment0.Name = "Attachment0"
attachment0.Parent = part
attachment0.Position = Vector3.new(-2,0,0)

local attachment1 = Instance.new("Attachment")
attachment1.Name = "Attachment1"
attachment1.Parent = part
attachment1.Position = Vector3.new(2,0,0)

-- 创建新的 Trail
local trail = Instance.new("Trail")
trail.Parent = part
trail.Attachment0 = attachment0
trail.Attachment1 = attachment1
color1 = Color3.new(15/255,127/255,254/255)
color2 = Color3.new(255/255,255/255,255/255)
trail.Color = ColorSequence.new(color1, color2)

-- 移动部件、清除所有部件分段并切换轨迹的启用/禁用状态
while true do
	tweenPart(part)
	trail:Clear()
	trail.Enabled = not trail.Enabled
end

@roblox/globaltype/Translator.documentation: Translator （翻译器） 的职责是为玩家制作/返回本地化的字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/Translator.FormatByKe.documentation: 如果 Source（源文本）及翻译包含articles/localization format strings|格式字符串，则为 Lua 值表或键-值配对 Lua 表。具体取决于格式字符串使用的是编号还是命名。
在 LocalizationTable 中，根据其 Translator 的区域设置，按键值返回本地化的文本字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/Translator.Translate/.documentation: 有效的游戏内 Instance，用于上下文覆盖，如上所标示。注意：在不需要上下文覆盖时，此参数可为任意值（比如 game）。

@roblox/globaltype/Translator.Translate.documentation: 在 LocalizationTable 中，根据其 Translator 的区域设置，按源查找返回本地化的文本字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/TremoloSoundEffect.documentation: 通过改变音效的音量大小来产生震颤效果。

@roblox/globaltype/TremoloSoundEffect.De.documentation: 控制音量升高或降低的大小。

@roblox/globaltype/TremoloSoundEffect.Du.documentation: 控制在音量振荡期间，效果会激活多长时间。

@roblox/globaltype/TriangleMeshPart.documentation: 抽象中间类，管理 PartOperation 和 MeshPart 的物理几何属性。

@roblox/globaltype/TriangleMeshPart.Coll.documentation: 确定部件物理现象依附其网格的细节水平

@roblox/globaltype/TrussPart.documentation: Truss 部件与 Part （部件）一样，但它们有不同的视觉样式和不同的缩放行为，且玩家可以爬上 Truss 部件。

@roblox/globaltype/TrussPart.Style.documentation: 设置了 Truss（桁架）的样式。目前有三种不同的风格。

@roblox/globaltype/Tween.documentation: Tweens are used to interpolate the properties of instances. The Tween object itself controls the playback of the interpolation. Creating and configuring tweens is done with the TweenService:Create function. This is the only way to create tweens. Instance.new cannot be used for this particular object.
@roblox/globaltype/Tween.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(10, 10, 0)
goal.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Tween.Instance.documentation: Tween 的只读 Instance 属性。其所指向 Instance 的属性正由该 Tween 进行插值。
@roblox/globaltype/Tween.Instance.code_sample:
local function isInstanceAPart(tween)
	local instance = tween.Instance
	return instance:IsA("BasePart")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Tween.TweenInfo.documentation: 只读属性，包括如何使用 TweenInfo 数据类型对 Tween 进行插值的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/Tween.TweenInfo.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(
	2, -- Time
	Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, -- EasingStyle
	Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -- EasingDirection
	-1, -- RepeatCount (小于零时 tween 会无限循环)
	true, -- Reverses (tween 完成目标后会反转)
	0 -- DelayTime
)

local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, {Position = Vector3.new(0, 30, 0)})

tween:Play()
wait(10)
tween:Cancel() -- 在 10 秒后取消动画

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.documentation: 用于内插处理函数的抽象基类。Tween 继承自 BaseTween。

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.PlaybackSta.documentation: 一个用于显示 Tween 的当前播放 Enum.PlaybackState 的只读属性。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.PlaybackSta.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Orientation = Vector3.new(0, 90, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Quad, Enum.EasingDirection.InOut, 2, true, 0.5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
local function onPlaybackChanged()
	print("Tween status has changed to:", tween.PlaybackState)
end
 
local playbackChanged = tween:GetPropertyChangedSignal("PlaybackState")
playbackChanged:Connect(onPlaybackChanged)
 
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Cancel.documentation: Cancel 函数用于停止 Tween 的播放并重置它的变量。如果重新调用 TweenBase:Play，那么 Tween 会继续向目标进行插值，但因为变量被重置，仍会消耗完整的动画时间。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Cancel.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(0, 50, 0)

local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()
wait(2.5)
tween:Cancel()

local playTick = tick()
tween:Play()

tween.Completed:Wait()

local timeTaken = tick() - playTick
print("Tween took "..tostring(timeTaken).." secs to complete")

-- tween 需要 5 秒才能才能完成，因为 tween 变量被 tween:Cancel() 重置了

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Pause.documentation: Pause 函数会暂停其 Tween 的播放。如果后面重新调用 TweenBase.Resume ，则 Tween 将从暂停的那一刻起恢复播放。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Pause.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(50, 10, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(10, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()
 
wait(3)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
tween:Pause()
 
wait(2)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Play.documentation: Play 函数会开始其 Tween 的播放。请注意，如果一个 Tween 已经开始播放了，除非 tween 已经完成或是被停止（TweenBase/Cancel 或 TweenBase/Pause），调用 Play 将没有效果。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Play.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(10, 10, 0)
goal.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Completed.documentation: Completed 事件在 Tween 完成时触发。完成意味着渐变自然结束，或被 TweenBase:Cancel 停止。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenBase.Completed.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local SLOW_DURATION = 10
 
local function slowCharacter(humanoid)
	local goal = {}
	goal.WalkSpeed = 0
 
	local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(SLOW_DURATION)	
 
	local tweenSpeed = TweenService:Create(humanoid, tweenInfo, goal)
 
	tweenSpeed:Play()
 
	return tweenSpeed
end
 
local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
	local initialSpeed = humanoid.WalkSpeed
	local tweenSpeed = slowCharacter(humanoid)
	tweenSpeed.Completed:Wait()
	humanoid.WalkSpeed = initialSpeed
end
 
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end
 
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.documentation: TweenService 用来创建 Tween，后者可用于对实例的属性进行插值或 tween （补间动画）。 Tween 可用于任意具有兼容的属性类型的对象。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(10, 10, 0)
goal.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.Create/p.documentation: 将要进行渐变插值的 Instance 属性。
要进行 tween 操作的一个属性字典及其目标值。

@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.Create.documentation: TweenService 的 Create 函数可以创建一个新的 Tween（渐变）效果。该函数需要三个参数：获取该效果的对象、所使用的 TweenInfo、以及包含了将进行渐变的属性和其目标值的表。
@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.Create.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")
 
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
part.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Parent = game.Workspace
 
local goal = {}
goal.Position = Vector3.new(10, 10, 0)
goal.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
 
local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(5)
 
local tween = TweenService:Create(part, tweenInfo, goal)
 
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/TweenService.GetValue.documentation: 在 0 和 1 之间的插入值
根据给定的释放风格和方向生成的新 alpha 值
根据给定的 Enum.EasingStyle 和 Enum.EasingDirection 计算一个新的 alpha

@roblox/globaltype/UIAspectRatioConstrai.documentation: 确保父项 UI 元素维持一个特定的纵横比。
用来确定由约束所维持的宽高比。
用来决定 UI 元素的最大大小受谁限制。
用来判断当设置 UI 元素的新大小时该使用什么轴。

@roblox/globaltype/UIBase.documentation: UIBase 是 UI 布局和约束类别的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/UIComponent.documentation: UI 约束和布局类别的基类，由 UiBase 继承而来。

@roblox/globaltype/UICorner.documentation: A UIComponent that will apply deformation to shapes of corners of its parent GuiObject

@roblox/globaltype/UICorner.CornerRadius.documentation: Determines the radius, in pixels, of the UICorner UIComponent

@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.documentation: 一个将颜色梯度与自己的父项 GuiObject 进行混合的 UIComponent，这样你就能将多个颜色分层放置于自己的文本、UI 背景或者其他 UI 内容中。

@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Color.documentation: 根据渐变长度确定与父 GuiObject 相混合的颜色

@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Offset.documentation: 决定父项 GuiObject 中心梯度的标量转换。
@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Offset.code_sample:
local OFFSET_SPEED_X = 1 -- 单位每秒
local uiGradient = script.Parent
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
 
local function onRenderStep(deltaTime)
    local currentOffsetX = uiGradient.Offset.X
    if currentOffsetX < -1 then
        uiGradient.Offset = Vector2.new(1, 0)
    else
        uiGradient.Offset = Vector2.new(currentOffsetX - OFFSET_SPEED_X * deltaTime, 0)
    end
end
 
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(onRenderStep)

@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Rotation.documentation: 决定着梯度从左到右顺时针方向旋转的度数。
@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Rotation.code_sample:
local ROTATE_SPEED = 90 -- 度每秒
local uiGradient = script.Parent
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
 
local function onRenderStep(deltaTime)
    local currentRotation = uiGradient.Rotation
    uiGradient.Rotation = (currentRotation + ROTATE_SPEED * deltaTime) % 360
end
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(onRenderStep)

@roblox/globaltype/UIGradient.Transparen.documentation: 决定透过梯度长度可以看到的父项 GuiObject 数量

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridLayout.documentation: Positions sibling UI elements by filling rows using the space of the parent UI element

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridLayout.CellPadd.documentation: Determines how much space there is between elements in the grid.

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridLayout.CellSize.documentation: 决定网格中每个元素的尺寸。

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridLayout.FillDire.documentation: Determines the maximum number of cells that may be used in a row or column before before the next one is started.

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridLayout.StartCor.documentation: 决定了网格从哪个角落开始布局 UI 元素。

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.documentation: 网格风格 UI 布局的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Abs.documentation: 栅格布局所占据空间的绝对大小。
@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Abs.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

local screen = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screen.Parent = playerGui

local scrollingFrame = Instance.new("ScrollingFrame")
scrollingFrame.Parent = screen
scrollingFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
scrollingFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0)
scrollingFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 412, 0, 300)

local grid = Instance.new("UIGridLayout")
grid.CellPadding = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
grid.CellSize = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100)
grid.Parent = scrollingFrame

local function onContentSizeChanged()
	local absoluteSize = grid.AbsoluteContentSize
	scrollingFrame.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0, absoluteSize.X, 0, absoluteSize.Y)
end

grid:GetPropertyChangedSignal("AbsoluteContentSize"):Connect(onContentSizeChanged)

for x = 1, 10 do
	for y = 1, 4 do
		local button = Instance.new("TextButton")
		button.Text = x .. ", " .. y
		button.Parent = scrollingFrame
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Fil.documentation: 决定 UI 元素被布置的轴。
@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Fil.code_sample:
-- 将我放入一个 UIListLayout 之中
local uiGridLayout = script.Parent

while true do
	for k, fillDirection in pairs(Enum.FillDirection:GetEnumItems()) do
		uiGridLayout.FillDirection = fillDirection
		for k2, verticalAlignment in pairs(Enum.VerticalAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
			uiGridLayout.VerticalAlignment = verticalAlignment
			for k3, horizontalAlignment in pairs(Enum.HorizontalAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
				uiGridLayout.HorizontalAlignment = horizontalAlignment
				wait(1)
			end
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Sor.documentation: 确定布局时选择下一个 UI 元素的方式。
@roblox/globaltype/UIGridStyleLayout.Sor.code_sample:
-- 将一个脚本放入 UIListLayout
local uiGridLayout = script.Parent

-- 一些要处理的数据
local scores = {
	["Player1"] = 2048;
	["Ozzypig"] = 1337;
	["Shedletsky"] = 1250;
	["Builderman"] = 1000;  
}

-- 创建一个得分板
for name, score in pairs(scores) do
	local tl = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	tl.Text = name .. ": " .. score
	tl.Parent = script.Parent
	tl.LayoutOrder = -score -- We want higher scores first, so negate for descending order
	tl.Name = name
	tl.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)
	tl.Parent = uiGridLayout.Parent
end

while true do
	-- 名称为玩家名称
	uiGridLayout.SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.Name
	uiGridLayout:ApplyLayout()
	wait(2)
	-- 由于我们将 LayoutOrder 设置为得分，因此这将按照降序排序！
	uiGridLayout.SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.LayoutOrder
	uiGridLayout:ApplyLayout()
	wait(2)
end

end

@roblox/globaltype/UIListLayout.Padding.documentation: Determines the amount of free space between each element.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPadding.PaddingBott.documentation: 准备应用在相对于父项普通尺寸来说属于底端的 padding。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPadding.PaddingLeft.documentation: 准备应用在相对于父项普通尺寸来说属于左端的 padding。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPadding.PaddingRigh.documentation: 准备应用在相对于父项普通尺寸来说属于右端的 padding。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPadding.PaddingTop.documentation: 准备应用在相对于父项普通尺寸来说属于顶端的 padding。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.Animated.documentation: 是否在页面间进行动画过渡。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.CurrentP.documentation: The page that is either currently being displayed or is the target of the current animation.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.EasingDi.documentation: 表现动画时使用的缓动方向。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.EasingSt.documentation: 表现动画时使用的缓动风格。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.GamepadI.documentation: Controls the overrides of NextSelection{Up, Down, Left, Right}. Defaults to true.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.Padding.documentation: Determines the amount that pages are separated from each other by.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.ScrollWh.documentation: 控制滚轮的使用，以防它有其他用途。默认为 true。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.TouchInp.documentation: 控制触摸滚动，以防这是非交互式布局。默认为 true。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.JumpTo.documentation: If the page is in the UIPageLayout, then it sets UIPageLayout.CurrentPage to it and animates to it. If the circular layout is enabled, it will take the shortest path to this page.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.JumpToIn.documentation: 如果索引 >= 0 且小于布局尺寸，则此方法与 UIPageLayout:JumpTo 相似。如果它超出边界且设置了圆形，则它将动画化 UIPageLayout.CurrentPage 界内索引与新索引间完整的距离。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.Next.documentation: 将 UIPageLayout.CurrentPage 设置为当前页面的下一页，并动画过渡到该页，如果没有下一页，则不执行任何操作。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.Previous.documentation: Sets UIPageLayout.CurrentPage to the page before the current page and animates to it, or does nothing if there isn't a previous page.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.PageEnte.documentation: Fires when a page comes into view, and is going to be rendered.

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.PageLeav.documentation: 当一个页面离开视图范围时触发，且不会被渲染。

@roblox/globaltype/UIPageLayout.Stopped.documentation: Fires when an animation to UIPageLayout.CurrentPage is completed without being canceled, and the view stops scrolling.

@roblox/globaltype/UIScale.documentation: An object that acts as a multiplier for the size of the parent UI element's scale.
@roblox/globaltype/UIScale.code_sample:
-- Lay out the images in a list
Instance.new("UIListLayout", script.Parent).SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.LayoutOrder

-- Create some images of varying sizes using UIScale objects
for size = .2, 1.5, .2 do
	local image = Instance.new("ImageLabel")
	image.Image = "rbxassetid://284402752" -- an image of a Lock
	image.Parent = script.Parent
	image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100)
	-- Scale the image by adding a UIScale with the size
	--  Note: this is a shorthand since we don't need a reference to the UIScale
	Instance.new("UIScale", image).Scale = size
end

@roblox/globaltype/UIScale.Scale.documentation: 确定要应用于父项 UI 元素大小的倍数因子。
@roblox/globaltype/UIScale.Scale.code_sample:

@roblox/globaltype/UISizeConstraint.documentation: Ensures a GuiObject does not become larger or smaller than the constraint's max size or min size.
@roblox/globaltype/UISizeConstraint.code_sample:
-- 为 Frame 创建一个 ScreenGui 容器
local ScreenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
ScreenGui.Parent = game.StarterGui

-- 创建 frame
local frame = Instance.new("Frame")
frame.Parent = ScreenGui
frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 400, 0, 400)

-- 创建 UISizeConstraint
local constraint = Instance.new("UISizeConstraint")
constraint.Parent = frame
constraint.MaxSize = Vector2.new(250, 250)
constraint.MinSize = Vector2.new(50, 50)

@roblox/globaltype/UISizeConstraint.MaxS.documentation: 对象的最大尺寸，单位是像素。

@roblox/globaltype/UISizeConstraint.MinS.documentation: 对象的最小尺寸，单位是像素。

@roblox/globaltype/UIStroke.documentation: Applies an outline to text or a UI border

@roblox/globaltype/UIStroke.ApplyStrokeM.documentation: Determines whether to apply the stroke to the object’s border instead of the text itself

@roblox/globaltype/UIStroke.Transparency.documentation: Sets the stroke opacity independently of the parent object’s GuiObject.BackgroundTransparency or TextLabel.TextTransparency

@roblox/globaltype/UITableLayout.documentation: Lays out sibling UI elements and their child UI elements as rows/columns and cells in a table.
@roblox/globaltype/UITableLayout.code_sample:
local frame = script.Parent

-- Table data
local headerWidth = {200, 80, 80}
local headers = {
	"Name",     "Job",    "Cash"}
local data = {
	{"Bob",     "Waiter",   100},
	{"Lisa",    "Police",   200},
	{"George",  "-",         50},
}

-- First, build the table layout
local uiTableLayout = Instance.new("UITableLayout")
uiTableLayout.FillDirection = Enum.FillDirection.Vertical
uiTableLayout.HorizontalAlignment = Enum.HorizontalAlignment.Center
uiTableLayout.VerticalAlignment = Enum.VerticalAlignment.Center
uiTableLayout.FillEmptySpaceColumns = false
uiTableLayout.FillEmptySpaceRows = false
uiTableLayout.Padding = UDim2.new(0, 5, 0, 5)
uiTableLayout.SortOrder = Enum.SortOrder.LayoutOrder
frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 40) -- The Size of the parent frame is the cell size
uiTableLayout.Parent = frame

-- Next, create column headers
local headerFrame = Instance.new("Frame", frame)
headerFrame.Name = "Headers"
for i = 1, #headers do
	local headerText = headers[i]
	local headerCell = Instance.new("TextLabel", headerFrame)
	headerCell.Text = headerText
	headerCell.Name = headerText
	headerCell.LayoutOrder = i
	local headerSize = Instance.new("UISizeConstraint")
	headerSize.MinSize = Vector2.new(headerWidth[i], 0)
	headerSize.Parent = headerCell
end

-- Finally, add data rows by iterating over each row and the columns in that row
for row = 1, #data do
	local rowData = data[row]
	local rowFrame = Instance.new("Frame", frame)
	rowFrame.Name = "Row" .. row
	for col = 1, #data[row] do
		local cellData = rowData[col]
		local cell = Instance.new("TextLabel", rowFrame)
		cell.Text = cellData
		cell.Name = headers[col]
		cell.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
		if tonumber(cellData) then -- If this cell is a number, right-align it instead
			cell.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Right
		end
		cell.ClipsDescendants = true
	end
end

uiTableLayout.Parent = frame

-- Next, create column headers
local headerFrame = Instance.new("Frame", frame)
headerFrame.Name = "Headers"
for i = 1, #headers do
	local headerText = headers[i]
	local headerCell = Instance.new("TextLabel", headerFrame)
	headerCell.Text = headerText
	headerCell.Name = headerText
	headerCell.LayoutOrder = i
	local headerSize = Instance.new("UISizeConstraint")
	headerSize.MinSize = Vector2.new(headerWidth[i], 0)
	headerSize.Parent = headerCell
end

-- Finally, add data rows by iterating over each row and the columns in that row
for row = 1, #data do
	local rowData = data[row]
	local rowFrame = Instance.new("Frame", frame)
	rowFrame.Name = "Row" .. row
	for col = 1, #data[row] do
		local cellData = rowData[col]
		local cell = Instance.new("TextLabel", rowFrame)
		cell.Text = cellData
		cell.Name = headers[col]
		cell.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
		if tonumber(cellData) then -- If this cell is a number, right-align it instead
			cell.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Right
		end
		cell.ClipsDescendants = true
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/UniversalConstraint.documentation: A constraint that maintains a perpendicular angle between two axes of two attachments
@roblox/globaltype/UniversalConstraint.code_sample:
local BodyA=Instance.new("Part", workspace)
BodyA.Size=Vector3.new(1,1,1)

BodyA.Anchored=true
local BodyB=Instance.new("Part", workspace)

BodyB.Position=Vector3.new(-2,10,1)
BodyB.CanCollide=false
-- 设置部件的其他属性 …

attachmentA.Axis=Vector3.new(-1,0,0)
attachmentA.SecondaryAxis=Vector3.new(0,0,1)

attachmentB.Axis=Vector3.new(-1,0,0)

@roblox/globaltype/UserGameSettings.documentation: The UserGameSettings is a singleton class found inside of the UserSettings singleton. It holds various persistent settings relating to how the user wants to control their camera, and their character.
@roblox/globaltype/UserGameSettings.code_sample:
local GameSettings = UserSettings().GameSettings

local function onGameSettingChanged(nameOfSetting)
	-- 通过一个 pcall 获取这个设置的值以确保我们能取回。
	-- 有时会因为某些属性 LocalScripts 无法访问到而触发事件。	
	local canGetSetting,setting = pcall(function ()
		return GameSettings[nameOfSetting]
	end)
	
	if canGetSetting then
		print("开发者的 " .. nameOfSetting .. " 已经变更为： " .. tostring(setting))
	end
end

GameSettings.Changed:Connect(onGameSettingChanged)

AntiGravity.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.2 * Ball:GetMass(), 0)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Game.documentation: 描述用户正在使用的设备是否有可用的游戏手柄
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Game.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local activeGamepad = nil
function GetActiveGamepad()
	local activateGamepad = nil
	local navigationGamepads = {}
	
	navigationGamepads = UserInputService:GetNavigationGamepads()
	
	if #navigationGamepads > 1 then
		for i = 1, #navigationGamepads do
			if activateGamepad == nil then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			elseif navigationGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			end
		end
	else
		local connectedGamepads = {}
		
		connectedGamepads = UserInputService:GetConnectedGamepads()
		
		if #connectedGamepads > 0 then
			for i = 1, #connectedGamepads do
				if activateGamepad == nil then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				elseif connectedGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				end
			end
		end
		if activateGamepad == nil then -- 没有任何连接，至少设置 gamepad1
			activateGamepad = Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1
		end
	end

	return activateGamepad
end

if UserInputService.GamepadEnabled then
	activeGamepad = GetActiveGamepad()
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Gyro.documentation: 描述用户的设备是否有陀螺仪
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Gyro.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local currentRotation = camera.CFrame-- CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0), Vector3.new(0,0,0))
local lastInputFrame = nil
local upsideDown = false
 
wait()
 
local orientationSet = false
local function GravityChanged(gravity)
    if not orientationSet then
   	 upsideDown = (gravity.Position.X < -.5 or gravity.Position.Z > .5)
 
   	 orientationSet = true
    end
end
 
local function RotationChanged(rotation, rotCFrame)
	if orientationSet then
	if not lastInputFrame then
		lastInputFrame = rotCFrame
	end
 
	local delta = rotCFrame * lastInputFrame:inverse()
	local x,y,z = delta:toEulerAnglesXYZ()
	if upsideDown then
		delta = CFrame.Angles(-x, y, z)
	else
		delta = CFrame.Angles(x, -y, z)
	end
	currentRotation = currentRotation * delta
 
	lastInputFrame = rotCFrame
	end
end

local function HideCharacter()
	for _, limb in pairs (character:GetChildren()) do
		if limb:IsA("Part") then
			limb.Transparency = 1
		end
	end
end

local function UpdateCamera()
	local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
	camera.CoordinateFrame = currentRotation
	camera.Focus = CFrame.new(currentRotation * Vector3.new(0,0,-10))
end

if UserInputService.GyroscopeEnabled then
	UserInputService.DeviceGravityChanged:Connect(GravityChanged)
	UserInputService.DeviceRotationChanged:Connect(RotationChanged)
	
	HideCharacter()
	
	RunService:BindToRenderStep("Camera", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value, function()
		camera.CFrame = CFrame.new(head.Position - Vector3.new(0,8,10)) * currentRotation
		camera.Focus = CFrame.new(currentRotation * Vector3.new(0,0,-10))
	end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Mous.documentation: 决定用户的鼠标可以自由移动或是被锁定
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Mous.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local head = character:WaitForChild("Head", false)

local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local zoomed = false
local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local target = nil
local originalProperties =
{
	FieldOfView = nil,
	_CFrame = nil,
	MouseBehavior = nil,
	MouseDeltaSensitivity = nil
}

local AngleX,TargetAngleX = 0,0
local AngleY,TargetAngleY = 0,0

-- 缩放前将镜头重置回 CFrame 和 FieldOfView
local function ResetCamera()
	target = nil
	camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
	camera.CFrame = originalProperties._CFrame
	camera.FieldOfView = originalProperties.FieldOfView
	
	UserInputService.MouseBehavior = originalProperties.MouseBehavior
	UserInputService.MouseDeltaSensitivity = originalProperties.MouseDeltaSensitivity
end

local function ZoomCamera()
	-- Allow camera to be changed by script
	camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
		
	-- 缩放前储存镜头属性
	originalProperties._CFrame = camera.CFrame
	originalProperties.FieldOfView = camera.FieldOfView
	originalProperties.MouseBehavior = UserInputService.MouseBehavior
	originalProperties.MouseDeltaSensitivity = UserInputService.MouseDeltaSensitivity

	-- 缩放镜头
	target = mouse.Hit.p
	local eyesight = head.Position
	camera.CFrame = CFrame.new(eyesight, target)
	camera.Focus = CFrame.new(target)
	camera.FieldOfView = 10
	
	-- 锁定并放慢鼠标
	UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.LockCenter
	UserInputService.MouseDeltaSensitivity = 1
	
	-- 重置缩放角度
	AngleX,TargetAngleX = 0,0
	AngleY,TargetAngleY = 0,0
end

-- 切换镜头缩放/取消缩放
local function MouseClick()
	if zoomed then
		-- 取消镜头缩放
		ResetCamera()
	else
		-- 缩放镜头
		ZoomCamera()
	end
	
	zoomed = not zoomed
end

local cameraRotation = Vector2.new(0,math.rad(-60))
local function MouseMoved(input)
	if zoomed then
		local sensitivity = 0.6		-- 太高的东西会使上下看变得很困难；推荐其高度为 0 到 1 之间 
		local smoothness = 0.05		-- 推荐其高度为 0 到 1 之间 

		local delta = Vector2.new(input.Delta.x/sensitivity,input.Delta.y/sensitivity) * smoothness

		local X = TargetAngleX - delta.y
		local Y = TargetAngleY - delta.x
		TargetAngleX = (X >= 80 and 80) or (X <= -80 and -80) or X
		TargetAngleY = (Y >= 80 and 80) or (Y <= -80 and -80) or Y
		
		AngleX = AngleX + (TargetAngleX - AngleX) *0.35
		AngleY = AngleY + (TargetAngleY - AngleY) *0.15
		
		camera.CFrame = CFrame.new(head.Position, target)
		* CFrame.Angles(0,math.rad(AngleY),0)
		* CFrame.Angles(math.rad(AngleX),0,0)
	end
end

local function InputBegan(input, gameProcessedEvent)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		MouseClick()
	end
end

local function InputChanged(input, gameProcessedEvent)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement then
		MouseMoved(input)
	end
end

if UserInputService.MouseEnabled then
	UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(InputBegan)
	UserInputService.InputChanged:Connect(InputChanged)
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Mous.documentation: 缩放用户的 Mouse 的 Delta（位置改变）输出

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Mous.documentation: 描述用户当前的设备是否有可用的鼠标

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Mous.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local mouseInput =
{
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton3,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseWheel	
}

local keyboard = Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard

local function ToggleMouse(lastInputType)
	if lastInputType == keyboard then
		UserInputService.MouseIconEnabled = false
		return
	end
	
	for i, mouse in pairs (mouseInput) do
		if lastInputType == mouse then
			UserInputService.MouseIconEnabled = true
			return
		end
	end
end

UserInputService.LastInputTypeChanged:Connect(ToggleMouse)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.OnSc.documentation: 描述屏幕键盘当前是否在用户的屏幕上可见

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 描述用户当前的设备是否有可用的触摸屏
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
-- ========================================
-- GLOBAL VARIABLES
-- ========================================
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

-- LocalPlayer 所使用的镜头
local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera

local players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local torso = character:WaitForChild("Torso")
local playerPosition = torso.Position

local default_CameraPosition = torso.Position
local default_CameraRotation = Vector2.new(0,math.rad(-60))
local default_CameraZoom = 15

local cameraPosition = default_CameraPosition
local cameraRotation = default_CameraRotation
local cameraZoom = default_CameraZoom

local cameraRotationBounds = {math.rad(-81),math.rad(20)}
local cameraZoomBounds = nil --{10,200}
local touchDragSpeed = 0.15
local cameraSpeed = 0.1
local cameraRotateSpeed = 10
local cameraMouseRotateSpeed = 0.25
local cameraTouchRotateSpeed = 10
-- ========================================
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- UTILITY FUNCTIONS
-- ========================================
local function SetCameraMode()
camera.CameraType = "Scriptable"
camera.FieldOfView = 80
camera.CameraSubject = nil
end

local function UpdateCamera()
SetCameraMode()
local cameraRotationCFrame = CFrame.Angles(0, cameraRotation.X, 0)*CFrame.Angles(cameraRotation.Y, 0, 0)
camera.CFrame = cameraRotationCFrame + cameraPosition + cameraRotationCFrame*Vector3.new(0, 0, cameraZoom)
camera.Focus = camera.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, camera.CFrame.p.Y, 0)
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================




-- ========================================
-- MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================
-- 事件过去用于控制使用移动设备玩家的镜头

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPan 触发
local lastTouchTranslation = nil
local function TouchMove(touchPositions, totalTranslation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = totalTranslation - lastTouchTranslation
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + Vector3.new(difference.X, 0, difference.Y)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchTranslation = totalTranslation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ROTATE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchRotate 触发
local lastTouchRotation = nil
local function TouchRotate(touchPositions, rotation, velocity, state)
if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
local difference = rotation - lastTouchRotation
cameraRotation = cameraRotation + Vector2.new(-difference,0)*math.rad(cameraTouchRotateSpeed*cameraRotateSpeed)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
lastTouchRotation = rotation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ZOOM
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPinch 触发
local lastTouchScale = nil
local function TouchZoom(touchPositions, scale, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = scale - lastTouchScale
		cameraZoom = cameraZoom * (1 + difference)
		if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
			cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
		else
			cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
end
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchScale = scale
end

local function Input()
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- NON-MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================

local function Input(inputObject)
	if inputObject.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		if inputObject.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then						
			-- ====================
			-- CAMERA ZOOM
			-- ====================
			-- (I) 放大
			if inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.I then
			 	cameraZoom = cameraZoom - 15
			elseif inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.O then
				cameraZoom = cameraZoom + 15
			end
		
			-- (O) 缩小
			if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
				cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
			else
				cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
			end
			
			UpdateCamera()
		end
	end
	
	-- ====================
	-- CAMERA ROTATE
	-- ====================
	local pressed = UserInputService:IsMouseButtonPressed(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1)
	if pressed then
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.LockCurrentPosition
		local rotation = userInputService:GetMouseDelta()
		cameraRotation = cameraRotation + rotation*math.rad(cameraMouseRotateSpeed)
	else
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.Default
	end
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
local function PlayerChanged()
	local movement = torso.Position - playerPosition
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + movement
	playerPosition = torso.Position
		
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================






-- ========================================
-- DEVICE CHECK
-- ========================================
-- 决定用户是否是在移动设备上进行的游玩
if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then
	-- 用户处于移动设备上，使用 Touch 事件
UserInputService.TouchPan:Connect(TouchMove)
UserInputService.TouchRotate:Connect(TouchRotate)
UserInputService.TouchPinch:Connect(TouchZoom)
else
	
	-- 用户未处于移动设备上，使用 Input 事件
UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputChanged:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputEnded:Connect(Input)

	-- 镜头受玩家移动控制
	wait(2)
	RunService:BindToRenderStep("PlayerChanged", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value-1, PlayerChanged)
end	
-- ========================================
-- ========================================

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetC.documentation: 对应连接至用户设备的游戏手柄的 Enum.UserInputType 数组
返回当前连接的 Enum.UserInputType 游戏手柄数组
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetC.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local activeGamepad = nil
function GetActiveGamepad()
	local activateGamepad = nil
	local navigationGamepads = {}
	
	navigationGamepads = UserInputService:GetNavigationGamepads()
	
	if #navigationGamepads > 1 then
		for i = 1, #navigationGamepads do
			if activateGamepad == nil then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			elseif navigationGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			end
		end
	else
		local connectedGamepads = {}
		
		connectedGamepads = UserInputService:GetConnectedGamepads()
		
		if #connectedGamepads > 0 then
			for i = 1, #connectedGamepads do
				if activateGamepad == nil then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				elseif connectedGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				end
			end
		end
		if activateGamepad == nil then -- 没有任何连接，至少设置 gamepad1
			activateGamepad = Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1
		end
	end

	return activateGamepad
end

if UserInputService.GamepadEnabled then
	activeGamepad = GetActiveGamepad()
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetD.documentation: 返回描述设备当前重力向量的 InputObject

-- 为 UserInputService 创建变量
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
 
-- 为游戏对象创建变量
local label = script.Parent
local bubble = game.Workspace.Bubble
local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
 
-- 固定镜头至水平仪上
camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable
camera.CoordinateFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,20,0), Vector3.new(0,0,0))
 
-- 检查用户设备是否支持加速度计
if UserInputService.GyroscopeEnabled then
	-- 将事件绑定至陀螺仪检测到状态变更时
	UserInputService.DeviceGravityChanged:Connect(function(accel)
		-- 显示加速度计输出至 TextLabel
		label.Text = string.format("%.2f", accel.Position.X) .. "\n" ..
					 string.format("%.2f", accel.Position.Y) .. "\n" ..
					 string.format("%.2f", accel.Position.Z)
		-- 根据陀螺仪数据将游戏世界中的气泡进行移动
		bubble.Position = Vector3.new(0, 1.8, - 8 * accel.Position.Z)
	end)
else
	-- 友善提示并拒绝没有陀螺仪的用户
	local message = Instance.new("Message", game.Players.LocalPlayer.PlayerGui)
	message.Text = "此游戏仅支持带有陀螺仪功能的设备。"
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetF.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

local jumpKey = Enum.KeyCode.J
local isJumping = false

local function InputBegan(input, gameProcessedEvent)
	local TextBoxFocused = UserInputService:GetFocusedTextBox()
	
	-- 当玩家聚焦于 TextBox 上时忽略输入事件
	if TextBoxFocused then return end
	
	-- 当玩家按下键盘上的 jumpKey 键时让其角色进行跳跃
	if (input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard and input.KeyCode == jumpKey) then
		if not isJumping then
			isJumping = true
			humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
		end
	end
end

local function StateChanged(oldState, newState)
	-- 当玩家已经在跳跃时阻止玩家使用 jumpKey 进行跳跃
	if (newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping) then
		isJumping = true
	-- 玩家着陆后允许玩家再次进行跳跃
	elseif (newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Landed) then
		isJumping = false
	end
end

UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(InputBegan)
humanoid.StateChanged:Connect(StateChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetK.documentation: 对应当前被按下键盘按键的 InputObject 数组
返回对应当前被按下Enum.KeyCode的 InputObject 数组
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.GetK.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local Players = game.Players
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

local actionKey = Enum.KeyCode.LeftShift
local canJump = true
local canDoubleJump = false

local function jumpRequest()
	local keysPressed = UserInputService:GetKeysPressed()
	for _, key in ipairs(keysPressed) do
		if (key.KeyCode == actionKey and canJump) then
			canJump = false
			canDoubleJump = true
		end
	end
end

local function stateChanged(oldState, newState)
	-- 在自由落体状况下，如果可以进行连跳则进行连跳
	if (oldState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping and newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall and canDoubleJump) then
		canDoubleJump = false
		wait(.2)
		humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
	end
	
	-- 在玩家落地后允许其进行再次跳跃
	if (oldState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall and newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Landed) then
		canJump = true
	end
end

UserInputService.JumpRequest:Connect(jumpRequest)
humanoid.StateChanged:Connect(stateChanged)

	if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then 
		print("Action Handler: " .. actionName)
	end

	-- "埋掉" 输入，并在本处理器调用之后不再调用

    for _, keycode in pairs(supportedKeyCodes) do
        if (keycode == Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) then
            ContextActionService:BindAction(“SampleAction”, actionHandler, false, Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX)
        end
        if (keycode == Enum.KeyCode.X) then
            ContextActionService:BindAction(“SampleAction”, actionHandler, false, Enum.KeyCode.X)
        end
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.IsMo.documentation: 给定鼠标键是否正在被按下

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.IsMo.code_sample:
-- ========================================
-- GLOBAL VARIABLES
-- ========================================
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

-- LocalPlayer 所使用的镜头
local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera

local players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local torso = character:WaitForChild("Torso")
local playerPosition = torso.Position

local default_CameraPosition = torso.Position
local default_CameraRotation = Vector2.new(0,math.rad(-60))
local default_CameraZoom = 15

local cameraPosition = default_CameraPosition
local cameraRotation = default_CameraRotation
local cameraZoom = default_CameraZoom

local cameraRotationBounds = {math.rad(-81),math.rad(20)}
local cameraZoomBounds = nil --{10,200}
local touchDragSpeed = 0.15
local cameraSpeed = 0.1
local cameraRotateSpeed = 10
local cameraMouseRotateSpeed = 0.25
local cameraTouchRotateSpeed = 10
-- ========================================
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- UTILITY FUNCTIONS
-- ========================================
local function SetCameraMode()
camera.CameraType = "Scriptable"
camera.FieldOfView = 80
camera.CameraSubject = nil
end

local function UpdateCamera()
SetCameraMode()
local cameraRotationCFrame = CFrame.Angles(0, cameraRotation.X, 0)*CFrame.Angles(cameraRotation.Y, 0, 0)
camera.CFrame = cameraRotationCFrame + cameraPosition + cameraRotationCFrame*Vector3.new(0, 0, cameraZoom)
camera.Focus = camera.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, camera.CFrame.p.Y, 0)
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================




-- ========================================
-- MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================
-- 事件过去用于控制使用移动设备玩家的镜头

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPan 触发
local lastTouchTranslation = nil
local function TouchMove(touchPositions, totalTranslation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = totalTranslation - lastTouchTranslation
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + Vector3.new(difference.X, 0, difference.Y)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchTranslation = totalTranslation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ROTATE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchRotate 触发
local lastTouchRotation = nil
local function TouchRotate(touchPositions, rotation, velocity, state)
if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
local difference = rotation - lastTouchRotation
cameraRotation = cameraRotation + Vector2.new(-difference,0)*math.rad(cameraTouchRotateSpeed*cameraRotateSpeed)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
lastTouchRotation = rotation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ZOOM
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPinch 触发
local lastTouchScale = nil
local function TouchZoom(touchPositions, scale, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = scale - lastTouchScale
		cameraZoom = cameraZoom * (1 + difference)
		if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
			cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
		else
			cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
end
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchScale = scale
end

local function Input()
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- NON-MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================

local function Input(inputObject)
	if inputObject.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		if inputObject.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then						
			-- ====================
			-- CAMERA ZOOM
			-- ====================
			-- (I) 放大
			if inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.I then
			 	cameraZoom = cameraZoom - 15
			elseif inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.O then
				cameraZoom = cameraZoom + 15
			end
		
			-- (O) 缩小
			if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
				cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
			else
				cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
			end
			
			UpdateCamera()
		end
	end
	
	-- ====================
	-- CAMERA ROTATE
	-- ====================
	local pressed = UserInputService:IsMouseButtonPressed(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1)
	if pressed then
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.LockCurrentPosition
		local rotation = userInputService:GetMouseDelta()
		cameraRotation = cameraRotation + rotation*math.rad(cameraMouseRotateSpeed)
	else
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.Default
	end
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
local function PlayerChanged()
	local movement = torso.Position - playerPosition
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + movement
	playerPosition = torso.Position
		
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================






-- ========================================
-- DEVICE CHECK
-- ========================================
-- 决定用户是否是在移动设备上进行的游玩
if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then
	-- 用户处于移动设备上，使用 Touch 事件
UserInputService.TouchPan:Connect(TouchMove)
UserInputService.TouchRotate:Connect(TouchRotate)
UserInputService.TouchPinch:Connect(TouchZoom)
else
	
	-- 用户未处于移动设备上，使用 Input 事件
UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputChanged:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputEnded:Connect(Input)

	-- 镜头受玩家移动控制
	wait(2)
	RunService:BindToRenderStep("PlayerChanged", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value-1, PlayerChanged)
end	
-- ========================================
-- ========================================

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.IsNa.documentation: 给定游戏手柄是否为导航游戏手柄
当给定 Enum.UserInputTypeGamepad 被允许控制导航 GuiObject 时返回 true
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.IsNa.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local activeGamepad = nil
function GetActiveGamepad()
	local activateGamepad = nil
	local navigationGamepads = {}
	
	navigationGamepads = UserInputService:GetNavigationGamepads()
	
	if #navigationGamepads > 1 then
		for i = 1, #navigationGamepads do
			if activateGamepad == nil then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			elseif navigationGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
				activateGamepad = navigationGamepads[i]
			end
		end
	else
		local connectedGamepads = {}
		
		connectedGamepads = UserInputService:GetConnectedGamepads()
		
		if #connectedGamepads > 0 then
			for i = 1, #connectedGamepads do
				if activateGamepad == nil then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				elseif connectedGamepads[i].Value < activateGamepad.Value then
					activateGamepad = connectedGamepads[i]
				end
			end
		end
		if activateGamepad == nil then -- 没有任何连接，至少设置 gamepad1
			activateGamepad = Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1
		end
	end

	return activateGamepad
end

if UserInputService.GamepadEnabled then
	activeGamepad = GetActiveGamepad()
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.documentation: 当用户移动一个有加速度计的设备时触发。用于在 Roblox 游戏中追踪现实世界的设备移动。
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local sensitivity = .2
 
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
while not player.Character do wait() end
local humanoid = player.Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
 
local ready = true
local function ChangeAcceleration(acceleration)
    if ready then
   	 ready = false
   	 local accel = acceleration.Position
 
   	 if accel.Y >= sensitivity then
   		 humanoid.Jump = true
   	 end
 
   	 if accel.Z <= -sensitivity then
   		 humanoid:Move(Vector3.new(-1,0,0))
   	 end    
   	 if accel.Z >= sensitivity then
   		 humanoid:Move(Vector3.new(1,0,0))
   	 end    
   	 if accel.X <= -sensitivity then
   		 humanoid:Move(Vector3.new(0,0,1))
   	 end    
   	 if accel.X >= sensitivity then
   		 humanoid:Move(Vector3.new(0,0,-1))
   	 end    
   	 wait(1)
   	 ready = true
    end
End
UserInputService.DeviceAccelerationChanged:Connect(ChangeAcceleration)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.documentation: 当有加速度计的设备（如移动设备）上的重力变化时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local Ball = game.Workspace.Ball
local RealGravity = Instance.new("BodyForce", Ball)
local AntiGravity = Instance.new("BodyForce", Ball)
AntiGravity.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.2 * Ball:GetMass(), 0)

local function MoveBall(gravity)
	RealGravity.force = gravity.Position * 196.2 * game.Workspace.Ball:GetMass()
end

if UserInputService.AccelerometerEnabled then
	UserInputService.DeviceGravityChanged:Connect(MoveBall)	
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.documentation: 当用户旋转一个带有陀螺仪的设备时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Devi.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local currentRotation = camera.CFrame-- CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0), Vector3.new(0,0,0))
local lastInputFrame = nil
local upsideDown = false
 
wait()
 
local orientationSet = false
local function GravityChanged(gravity)
    if not orientationSet then
   	 upsideDown = (gravity.Position.X < -.5 or gravity.Position.Z > .5)
 
   	 orientationSet = true
    end
end
 
local function RotationChanged(rotation, rotCFrame)
	if orientationSet then
	if not lastInputFrame then
		lastInputFrame = rotCFrame
	end
 
	local delta = rotCFrame * lastInputFrame:inverse()
	local x,y,z = delta:toEulerAnglesXYZ()
	if upsideDown then
		delta = CFrame.Angles(-x, y, z)
	else
		delta = CFrame.Angles(x, -y, z)
	end
	currentRotation = currentRotation * delta
 
	lastInputFrame = rotCFrame
	end
end

local function HideCharacter()
	for _, limb in pairs (character:GetChildren()) do
		if limb:IsA("Part") then
			limb.Transparency = 1
		end
	end
end

local function UpdateCamera()
	local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
	camera.CoordinateFrame = currentRotation
	camera.Focus = CFrame.new(currentRotation * Vector3.new(0,0,-10))
end

if UserInputService.GyroscopeEnabled then
	UserInputService.DeviceGravityChanged:Connect(GravityChanged)
	UserInputService.DeviceRotationChanged:Connect(RotationChanged)
	
	HideCharacter()
	
	RunService:BindToRenderStep("Camera", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value, function()
		camera.CFrame = CFrame.new(head.Position - Vector3.new(0,8,10)) * currentRotation
		camera.Focus = CFrame.new(currentRotation * Vector3.new(0,0,-10))
	end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.documentation: 当用户开始使用人机交互设备时触发，例如鼠标或游戏手柄
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.code_sample:
-- 要想使用 InputBegan 事件，必须使用 UserInputService 服务
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- 为各类型用户输入提供多个用例的示例函数
UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(function(input, gameProcessed)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key is being pushed down! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has started at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button is being pressed on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end

	if gameProcessed then
		print("\tThe game engine internally observed this input!")
	else
		print("\tThe game engine did not internally observe this input!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.documentation: 当用户改变其与人机接口设备的交互方式时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.code_sample:
-- 要想使用 InputChanged 事件，必须使用 UserInputService 服务
local userInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- 显示当前的输入位置和位置变化 (净值)
local function printMovement(input)
    print("\tPosition:",input.Position)
    print("\tMovement Delta:",input.Delta)
end
 
-- 为各类型用户输入提供多个用例的示例函数
local function InputChanged(input, gameProcessed)
    if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement then
   	 print("The mouse has been moved!")
   	 printMovement(input)
    elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseWheel then
   	 print("The mouse wheel has been scrolled!")
   	 print("\tWheel Movement:",input.Position.Z)
    elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
   	 if input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Thumbstick1 then
   		 print("The left thumbstick has been moved!")
   		 printMovement(input)
   	 elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Thumbstick2 then
   		 print("The right thumbstick has been moved!")
   		 printMovement(input)
   	 elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.ButtonL2 then
   		 print("The pressure being applied to the left trigger has changed!")
   		 print("\tPressure:",input.Position.Z)
   	 elseif input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.ButtonR2 then
   		 print("The pressure being applied to the right trigger has changed!")
   		 print("\tPressure:",input.Position.Z)
   	 end
    elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
   	 print("The user's finger is moving on the screen!")
   	 printMovement(input)
    elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gyro then
   	 local rotInput,rotCFrame = UserInputService:GetDeviceRotation()
   	 local rotX,rotY,rotZ = rotCFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ()
   	 local rot = Vector3.new(math.deg(rotX),math.deg(rotY),math.deg(rotZ))
   	 print("The rotation of the user's mobile device has been changed!")
   	 print("\tPosition",rotCFrame.p)
   	 print("\tRotation:",rot)
    elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Accelerometer then
   	 print("The acceleration of the user's mobile device has been changed!")
   	 printMovement(input)
    end    
end

userInputService.InputChanged:Connect(InputChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.documentation: 当用户结束其与人机接口设备的交互时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Inpu.code_sample:

		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key has been released! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button has been released on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end
	
	if gameProcessed then
		print("\tThe game engine internally observed this input!")
	else
		print("\tThe game engine did not internally observe this input!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Jump.documentation: 当客户端请求角色跳跃时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Jump.code_sample:
-- 服务
local userInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local players = game:GetService("Players")

-- 本地玩家
local player = players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

-- 当用户尝试跳跃时触发

    humanoid:SetStateEnabled(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping, false)
end

userInputService.JumpRequest:Connect(Jump)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Last.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local mouseInput =
{
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton3,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement,
	Enum.UserInputType.MouseWheel	
}

local keyboard = Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard

local function ToggleMouse(lastInputType)
	if lastInputType == keyboard then
		UserInputService.MouseIconEnabled = false
		return
	end
	
	for i, mouse in pairs (mouseInput) do
		if lastInputType == mouse then
			UserInputService.MouseIconEnabled = true
			return
		end
	end
end

UserInputService.LastInputTypeChanged:Connect(ToggleMouse)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 当用户从一台 TouchEnabled 启用的设备 - 比如某移动设备的屏幕上抬起手指时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- 脚本的父项 (ScreenGui)
local touchScreenGui = script.Parent

-- 创建用户通过 Touch 事件操纵的
-- GUI 框架
local touchGui = Instance.new("Frame")
touchGui.Name = "TouchGui"
touchGui.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)

-- 在触摸屏幕时触发
local function TouchTap(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Parent = touchScreenGui
	touchGui.Position = UDim2.new(0, touch.Position.X, 0, touch.Position.Y)
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,50,0,50)
end

-- 在用户触摸屏幕并在一小段时间内
-- 没有移动手指时触发
local function TouchLong(touchPositions, state, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,100,0,100)
end

-- 在用户触摸屏幕且移动了手指时
-- 触发
local function TouchMove(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Position = UDim2.new(0, touch.Position.X, 0, touch.Position.Y)
end

-- 用户不再触摸屏幕时触发
local function TouchEnd(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Parent = nil
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,50,0,50)
end

-- 只有当用户使用移动设备时才触发 Touch 事件
if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then
	UserInputService.TouchTap:Connect(TouchTap)
	UserInputService.TouchLongPress:Connect(TouchLong)
	UserInputService.TouchMoved:Connect(TouchMove)
	UserInputService.TouchEnded:Connect(TouchEnd)
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
-- ========================================
-- GLOBAL VARIABLES
-- ========================================
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

-- LocalPlayer 所使用的镜头
local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera

local players = game:GetService("Players")
local player = players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local torso = character:WaitForChild("Torso")
local playerPosition = torso.Position

local default_CameraPosition = torso.Position
local default_CameraRotation = Vector2.new(0,math.rad(-60))
local default_CameraZoom = 15

local cameraPosition = default_CameraPosition
local cameraRotation = default_CameraRotation
local cameraZoom = default_CameraZoom

local cameraRotationBounds = {math.rad(-81),math.rad(20)}
local cameraZoomBounds = nil --{10,200}
local touchDragSpeed = 0.15
local cameraSpeed = 0.1
local cameraRotateSpeed = 10
local cameraMouseRotateSpeed = 0.25
local cameraTouchRotateSpeed = 10
-- ========================================
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- UTILITY FUNCTIONS
-- ========================================
local function SetCameraMode()
camera.CameraType = "Scriptable"
camera.FieldOfView = 80
camera.CameraSubject = nil
end

local function UpdateCamera()
SetCameraMode()
local cameraRotationCFrame = CFrame.Angles(0, cameraRotation.X, 0)*CFrame.Angles(cameraRotation.Y, 0, 0)
camera.CFrame = cameraRotationCFrame + cameraPosition + cameraRotationCFrame*Vector3.new(0, 0, cameraZoom)
camera.Focus = camera.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, camera.CFrame.p.Y, 0)
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================




-- ========================================
-- MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================
-- 事件过去用于控制使用移动设备玩家的镜头

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPan 触发
local lastTouchTranslation = nil
local function TouchMove(touchPositions, totalTranslation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = totalTranslation - lastTouchTranslation
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + Vector3.new(difference.X, 0, difference.Y)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchTranslation = totalTranslation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ROTATE
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchRotate 触发
local lastTouchRotation = nil
local function TouchRotate(touchPositions, rotation, velocity, state)
if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
local difference = rotation - lastTouchRotation
cameraRotation = cameraRotation + Vector2.new(-difference,0)*math.rad(cameraTouchRotateSpeed*cameraRotateSpeed)
		UpdateCamera()
	end
lastTouchRotation = rotation
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA ZOOM
-- ====================
-- 被 UserInputService.TouchPinch 触发
local lastTouchScale = nil
local function TouchZoom(touchPositions, scale, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Change or state == Enum.UserInputState.End then
		local difference = scale - lastTouchScale
		cameraZoom = cameraZoom * (1 + difference)
		if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
			cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
		else
			cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
end
		UpdateCamera()
	end
	lastTouchScale = scale
end

local function Input()
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================





-- ========================================
-- NON-MOBILE CAMERA EVENTS
-- ========================================

local function Input(inputObject)
	if inputObject.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		if inputObject.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then						
			-- ====================
			-- CAMERA ZOOM
			-- ====================
			-- (I) 放大
			if inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.I then
			 	cameraZoom = cameraZoom - 15
			elseif inputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.O then
				cameraZoom = cameraZoom + 15
			end
		
			-- (O) 缩小
			if cameraZoomBounds ~= nil then
				cameraZoom = math.min(math.max(cameraZoom, cameraZoomBounds[1]), cameraZoomBounds[2])
			else
				cameraZoom = math.max(cameraZoom, 0)
			end
			
			UpdateCamera()
		end
	end
	
	-- ====================
	-- CAMERA ROTATE
	-- ====================
	local pressed = UserInputService:IsMouseButtonPressed(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1)
	if pressed then
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.LockCurrentPosition
		local rotation = userInputService:GetMouseDelta()
		cameraRotation = cameraRotation + rotation*math.rad(cameraMouseRotateSpeed)
	else
		UserInputService.MouseBehavior = Enum.MouseBehavior.Default
	end
end

-- ====================
-- CAMERA MOVE
-- ====================
local function PlayerChanged()
	local movement = torso.Position - playerPosition
	cameraPosition = cameraPosition + movement
	playerPosition = torso.Position
		
	UpdateCamera()
end
-- ========================================
-- ========================================






-- ========================================
-- DEVICE CHECK
-- ========================================
-- 决定用户是否是在移动设备上进行的游玩
if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then
	-- 用户处于移动设备上，使用 Touch 事件
UserInputService.TouchPan:Connect(TouchMove)
UserInputService.TouchRotate:Connect(TouchRotate)
UserInputService.TouchPinch:Connect(TouchZoom)
else
	
	-- 用户未处于移动设备上，使用 Input 事件
UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputChanged:Connect(Input)
UserInputService.InputEnded:Connect(Input)

	-- 镜头受玩家移动控制
	wait(2)
	RunService:BindToRenderStep("PlayerChanged", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value-1, PlayerChanged)
end	
-- ========================================
-- ========================================

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 当用户把手指放在在一台 TouchEnabled 启用的设备 - 比如一台Apple iPad 、iPhone 或是 Google Android 手机上时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
local touch = {}

local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local UuiService = game:GetService("GuiService")

local fingerTracker = {}
touch.fingers = fingerTracker

local pressed = {}
local moved = {}
local lifted = {}

local function Connect(tab, func)
	tab[func] = true
	return function()
		tab[func] = nil
	end
end

local function Fire(tab, ...)
	for func in next, tab do
		func(...)
	end
end

function touch.Pressed(func)
	return Connect(pressed, func)
end

function touch.Moved(func)
	return Connect(moved, func)
end

function touch.Lifted(func)
	return Connect(lifted, func)
end

local function DoTouchEnded(io)
	local pos = io.Position
	local posx = pos.x
	local posy = pos.y
	
	local storedFingerData = fingerTracker[io]
	if storedFingerData ~= nil then
		local deltax = posx - storedFingerData.initx
		local deltay = posy - storedFingerData.initx
		Fire(lifted, io, posx, posy, deltax, deltay)
		fingerTracker[io] = nil
	end
end

local function DoTouchMoved(io)
	local pos = io.Position
	local posx = pos.x
	local posy = pos.y
	
	local storedFingerData = fingerTracker[io]
	if storedFingerData ~= nil then
		local deltax = posx - storedFingerData.initx
		local deltay = posy - storedFingerData.initx
		Fire(moved, io, posx, posy, deltax, deltay)
	end
end

local function TouchStarted(input)
	local pos = input.Position
	local posx = pos.x
	local posy = pos.y
	
	fingerTracker[input] = {initx = posx, inity = posy}
	Fire(pressed, input, posx, posy)
	
	input.Changed:Connect(function(property)
		if property == "Position" then
			DoTouchMoved(input)
		elseif property == "UserInputState" then
			if input.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.End or input.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Cancel then
				DoTouchEnded(input)
			end
		end
	end)
end

local function ReleaseAll()
	for finger,_ in next, fingerTracker do
		DoTouchEnded(finger)
	end
	fingerTracker = {}
end

UserInputService.TouchStarted:Connect(TouchStarted)
UserInputService.WindowFocusReleased:Connect(ReleaseAll)
GuiService.MenuOpened:Connect(ReleaseAll)

return touch

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 当用户在一台 UserInputService.TouchEnabled 启用的设备 - 比如某移动设备的屏幕上滑动手指时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local gui = script.Parent
local swipePositionY = gui.Position.Y.Offset
local swipePositionX = gui.Position.X.Offset

local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local maxY = camera.ViewportSize.Y - gui.Size.Y.Offset
local maxX = camera.ViewportSize.X- gui.Size.X.Offset

local function TouchSwipe(swipeDirection, numberOfTouches, gameProcessedEvent)
	if swipeDirection == Enum.SwipeDirection.Up then
		swipePositionY = math.max(swipePositionY-200, 0)
	elseif swipeDirection == Enum.SwipeDirection.Down then
		swipePositionY = math.min(swipePositionY+200, maxY)
	elseif swipeDirection == Enum.SwipeDirection.Left then
		swipePositionX = math.max(swipePositionX-200, 0)
	elseif swipeDirection == Enum.SwipeDirection.Right then
		swipePositionX = math.min(swipePositionX+200, maxX)
	end
	
	gui:TweenPosition(UDim2.new(0, swipePositionX, 0, swipePositionY), "Out", "Quad", .25, true)
end

UserInputService.TouchSwipe:Connect(TouchSwipe)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 当用户在一台 UserInputService.TouchEnabled 启用的设备 - 比如某移动设备的屏幕上手指点击时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- 脚本的父项 (ScreenGui)
local touchScreenGui = script.Parent

-- 创建用户通过 Touch 事件操纵的
-- GUI 框架
local touchGui = Instance.new("Frame")
touchGui.Name = "TouchGui"
touchGui.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)

-- 在触摸屏幕时触发
local function TouchTap(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Parent = touchScreenGui
	touchGui.Position = UDim2.new(0, touch.Position.X, 0, touch.Position.Y)
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,50,0,50)
end

-- 在用户触摸屏幕并在一小段时间内
-- 没有移动手指时触发
local function TouchLong(touchPositions, state, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,100,0,100)
end

-- 在用户触摸屏幕且移动了手指时
-- 触发
local function TouchMove(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Position = UDim2.new(0, touch.Position.X, 0, touch.Position.Y)
end

-- 用户不再触摸屏幕时触发
local function TouchEnd(touch, gameProcessedEvent)
	touchGui.Parent = nil
	touchGui.Size = UDim2.new(0,50,0,50)
end

-- 只有当用户使用移动设备时才触发 Touch 事件
if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then
	UserInputService.TouchTap:Connect(TouchTap)
	UserInputService.TouchLongPress:Connect(TouchLong)
	UserInputService.TouchMoved:Connect(TouchMove)
	UserInputService.TouchEnded:Connect(TouchEnd)
end

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.documentation: 当用户在一台 UserInputService.TouchEnabled 启用的设备 - 比如某移动设备的屏幕上点击游戏世界时触发
@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.Touc.code_sample:
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

local camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local length = 500

local function createPart(position, processedByUI)
	-- 如果用户点击的是 GUI/UI 元素，则不要创建部件
	if processedByUI then return end

	-- 从 Vector2 视口位置获得 Vector3 世界位置
	local unitRay = camera:ViewportPointToRay(position.X, position.Y)
	local ray = Ray.new(unitRay.Origin, unitRay.Direction * length)
	local hitPart, worldPosition = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray)
	
	-- 如果用户点击的是一个部件，则在世界位置中创建一个新部件
	-- 如果用户点击的是空的天空盒，则不生成部件
		local part = Instance.new("Part")
		part.Parent = game.Workspace
		part.Anchored = true
		part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
		part.Position = worldPosition
	end
end

UserInputService.TouchTapInWorld:Connect(createPart)

@roblox/globaltype/UserInputService.User.documentation: 当指定虚拟现实设备的 DataType.CFrame 改变时触发
